text.ori_cn: (夫人引莺莺、红娘、欢郎上，云)老身姓郑，夫主姓崔，官拜前朝相国，不幸病薨。

text.ori_cn: 我只见头似雪，鬓如霜，面如少年得内养。

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 生前为人正直，死后没有留下遗产。

text.ori_cn: 闻你浑俗和光，果是风清月朗。
text.man_en: Brilliant as you're，you condescend to humble sphere；Pure as the wind and bright as the moon you appear．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I hear that you have a clear wind and a bright moon.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I smell your pure customs and light, and the wind is clear and the moon is bright.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You embody simplicity and integrity, truly like a clear breeze and a bright moon.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 灿烂如你，谦卑如你，纯洁如风，皎洁如月。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你虽辉煌，却屈尊于卑微；清如风，明如月。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 才华横溢的你，甘愿屈居卑微的地位；你宛若风之纯净，宛若月之明亮。

text.ori_cn: 小生呵，无意求官，有心听讲。
text.man_en: As for me，no office will I beseech；What l want is to hear you preach．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have no intention of seeking an official position, but to listen to the lecture.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Xiaosheng, I have no intention of seeking official positions, but I am interested in listening to lectures.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I, a humble person, seek not official rank but am eager to listen and learn.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 至于我，我不会恳求任何职位；我只想听你讲道。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 至于我，我不会恳求任何职位；我想要的是听你讲道。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 至于我，不求官职；我想要的是听你讲道。

text.ori_cn: 小生途路无可申意，聊具白金一两，与常住公用，伏望笑留。
text.man_en: He says:As a traveller has no means to show his respect to you，I can only offer an ounce of silver for the expenses of the monastery．Would you kindly accept it?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have nothing to declare, but I have one or two pieces of platinum to share with the permanent residents, so I hope you will smile and stay.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is nothing to say in the journey of a small life. I only have a few pieces of platinum and share it with my permanent resident.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他说：作为一个旅行者，我无法表达对您的敬意，我只能拿出一盎司银子作为寺院的费用，您能收下吗？

text.ori_cn: 秀才人情从来是纸半张，他不晓七青八黄。

text.ori_cn: 任凭人说短论长，他不怕掂斤播两。
text.man_en: He cares not for reproach or renown；He fears not being weighed up or down．

text.ori_cn: (本云)先生客中何故如此，先生必有甚见教。
text.man_en: Faben says:Why should you offer us gifts while travelling? You must have something to say to me，sir．

text.man_en: As I cannot study the classics in a crowded inn，

text.ori_cn: 尽无眠，手抵着牙儿慢慢地想。
text.man_en: Sleepless，I'll ruminate hand on cheek 0'er her grace．(Exit．)
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: As sleepless as he could be, he thought slowly with his hand against his teeth.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I had no sleep at all, I put my hand against my teeth and thought slowly.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sleeplessly, I ponder slowly with my hand against my teeth.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 无眠，我将手抚面颊，思念她的恩典。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 失眠了，我会把手放在脸颊上沉思，以表达她的优雅。（退出。）
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 失眠，我将手扶在脸颊上沉思她的优雅。（退场。）

text.ori_cn: (莺莺上云)母亲使红娘问长老修斋日期，去了多时，不见来回话。
text.man_en: Yingying enters and says: My mother has sent Rose to inquire of the abbot on what day he will perform the religious service．She has been absent for a long time without coming back．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying on the cloud) mother made the red lady ask the elders to fix the date of fasting, went for a long time, did not see the reply.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying goes up to the cloud) Mother asked the matchmaker to ask the elder about the date of fasting. She went there for a long time, but there was no reply.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Yingying on stage) Her mother sent Hong Niang to ask the elder monk about the date for the ceremony, but she had been gone for a long time without returning with an answer.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 盈盈进来说：母亲让蔷薇去打听住持哪天做礼拜，她去了很久都没回来。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹进来说：我母亲派罗丝来询问方丈哪一天举行法事。她已经离开很长时间了，没有回来。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹走进来说：我母亲已经派遣玫瑰去询问方丈他哪一天会进行宗教仪式。她已经离开很久了还没有回来。

text.ori_cn: (红娘上云)回夫人话了，去回小姐话去。
text.man_en: Rose enters and says:I have already reported to my mistress．Now I must go and tell my young mistress．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang Shangyun) Back to Madam's words, go back to Miss's words.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The matchmaker goes up to the cloud) I have replied to the madam, now I am going to reply to the young lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The matchmaker addresses Yun) I will convey madam's words and then inform the young lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰进来说：我已经向我的女主人报告过了，现在我必须去告诉我的小主人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝进来说：我已经向我的女主人报告了。现在我必须去告诉我年轻的女主人。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝进来说：我已经向我的主妇汇报了。现在我必须去告诉我的小主子。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)使你问长老几时做好事。
text.man_en: Yingying says:What about the religious service?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) So that you can ask the Elder when he did good.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying cloud) You ask the elders when they will do good deeds.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Ying Ying said) Let you ask the elder when he will do a good deed.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 盈盈说：那宗教仪式呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：宗教仪式呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹说：宗教仪式怎么样？

text.ori_cn: (红云)恰回夫人话也，正待回小姐话。
text.man_en: Rose says:I have just made a report to my mistress，and now I want to report to you．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red clouds) Just to return to the words of the lady, I am waiting to return to the words of the lady.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) I'm just about to say something to Madam, and I'm waiting to say something to Miss.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongyun) just returned from talking to the madam and is now about to reply to the young lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰说：我刚刚向我的女主人做了汇报，现在我想向你汇报。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：我刚刚向我的女主人做了报告，现在我想向你报告。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝说：我刚刚向我的主人报告了，现在我想向您报告。

text.ori_cn: 二月十五，佛什么供日，请夫人小姐拈香。
text.man_en: The fifteenth of the second moon is the date on which is offered I know not what sacrifice to Buddha，and the abbot requests your mother and you to burn incense on that date．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: On the 15th of February, the day of the Buddha's what offerings, please Madam and Miss Xiang Xiang.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: On the 15th day of the second lunar month, I would like to ask my lady to burn incense.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: February 15th is the Buddhist offering day, inviting ladies and young women to offer incense.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 二月十五，不知是什么祭佛的日子，方丈请你和你母亲在这一天烧香。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 二月十五是祭佛的日子，不知是什么祭佛的日子，方丈请你母亲和你在这一天烧香。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 二月十五是一个我不知名的日期，向佛陀献祭，住持请求您的母亲和您在那天烧香。

text.ori_cn: (红笑云)小姐，我对你说一件好笑的事。
text.man_en: (She laughs．)I have something amusing to tell you．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red laughs and clouds) Miss, I'll tell you something funny.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hong Xiaoyun) Miss, let me tell you something funny.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss Hongxiaoyun, let me tell you something funny.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: (她笑了）我有一件有趣的事情要告诉你。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: （她笑了。）我有一些有趣的事情要告诉你。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: （她笑了。）我有件好笑的事要告诉你。

text.ori_cn: 咱前日庭院前瞥见的秀才今日也在方丈里坐地。
text.man_en: The young scholar we met the other day was today sitting in the hall．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The scholar we glimpsed in front of the courtyard the day before yesterday is also sitting on the ground in the abbot today.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The scholar we saw in front of the courtyard the day before yesterday was also sitting in the abbot today.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The scholar we glimpsed in front of the courtyard the other day is also seated in the abbey today.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们那天见到的年轻学者今天就坐在大厅里．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 前几天我们遇到的那位年轻学者今天坐在大厅里。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我们那天遇见的年轻学者今天坐在大厅里。

text.ori_cn: 又道："小生姓张，名珙，字君瑞，本贯西洛人氏，年方二十三岁，正月十七日子时建生，并不曾娶妻。"
text.man_en: And he went on to say, "I am Zhang Gong，styled Junrui，a native of Luoyang．Born on the seventeenth of the first moon，I am twentythree years old，not yet married．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: And said: "I surnamed Zhang, name Gong, word Junrui, this Guan Xiluo people, the year is twenty-three years old, the seventeenth day of the first month of the day when the construction of the birth, and did not have a wife."
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He added: "Xiaosheng's surname is Zhang, given name is Gong, and given name is Junrui. His surname is from Xiluo. He is twenty-three years old. He was born on the seventeenth day of the first lunar month when he was born. He has never married a wife."
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He then continued, 'I am Zhang Gong, courtesy name Junrui, a native of Western Luo. I am twenty-three years old, born at the hour of the Rat on the seventeenth day of the first lunar month, and I have never married.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他接着说："在下张珙，字君瑞，洛阳人。 生于正月十七，今年二十三岁，尚未娶妻。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 又道：“吾名张公，字君睿，洛阳人。正月十七生，年二十三，未嫁。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他接着说：“我叫张公，字君睿，是洛阳人。正月十七出生，今年二十三岁，还未婚。”

text.ori_cn: 他还呼着小姐名字，说常出来么，被红娘一顿抢白，回来了。
text.man_en: He also mentioned your name and asked if you sometimes went outdoors．But I scolded him to the face and came back．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He also called out the name of the lady, said often out of it, by the red lady a snatch, came back.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He also called the lady by her name, saying he would come out often, but he was snatched away by the matchmaker and came back.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He kept calling out the young lady's name, asking if she came out often, but was sharply rebuked by the maid and had to return.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他还提到了你的名字，问你是否有时会去户外活动。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他还提到了你的名字，并问你是否有时去户外。但我当面斥责了他，然后就回来了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他也提到了你的名字，问你是否有时出去。可我当面骂了他一顿，然后回来。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)你不抢白他也罢。
text.man_en: Yingying says:It would be as well if you had not scolded him．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) It's okay if you don't snatch him.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingyingyun) It’s okay if you don’t steal him.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Yingying said) You don't need to scold him.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺说：你不骂他也罢．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：你没骂他就好了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹说: 你要是不骂他就好了。

text.ori_cn: (红云)小姐，我不知他想甚么哩。
text.man_en: Rose says:I don't know what on earth he was thinking about．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red Cloud) Miss, I don't know what he thinks.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) Miss, I don’t know what he is thinking.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss Hongyun, I have no idea what he is thinking.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗斯说：我不知道他到底在想什么。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗斯说：我不知道他到底在想什么。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗斯说：我不知道他到底在想什么。

text.ori_cn: (红云)我不曾告夫人知道。
text.man_en: Rose says:No，not a word．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red Cloud) I have not told Madam to know.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) I never told Madam about it.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongyun) I haven't informed the lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗斯说：没有，一个字也没有。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗斯说：不，一个字也没有。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝说：不，一句话也没有。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)你已后不告夫人知道罢。
text.man_en: Yingying says:You need not breathe a word to her．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) After you have done so, don't tell Madam to know about it.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying clouds) Just don’t tell my wife that you’re done.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Yingying Yun) You must not let the lady know about this.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 盈盈说：你不用跟她说一句话．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：你不需要对她说一句话。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹说：你不需要对她透露一个字。

text.ori_cn: 天色晚也，安排香案，咱花园里烧香去来。
text.man_en: It is getting late；arrange the table for incenseburner and we shall go to the garden to offer incense to Heaven．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It's getting late, let's arrange an incense burner in the garden.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It's getting late. Let's arrange the incense table and let's burn incense in the garden.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: It's getting late, let's set up an incense table and go to the garden to burn incense.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 天色已晚；摆上香炉，我们去花园上香吧。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 天色已晚，摆好香案，我们去花园上香。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 天色已晚，准备好香炉，我们去花园烧香拜天。

text.ori_cn: 正是：无端春色关心事，闲倚熏笼待月华。
text.man_en: How unexpected love affects my heart! Leaning on brazier, I wait for moonrise apart．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It is exactly the same: I have no reason to be concerned about the spring colours, but I lean idly on the smoked cage to wait for the moonlight.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Exactly: care about things in the spring scenery for no reason, leaning in the smoked cage to wait for the moonlight.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Indeed: Unwarranted spring colors elicit my concerns, idly leaning against the scented cage, I await the moonlight.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 蓦然回首，那人却在灯火阑珊处！我倚着火炉，等待月出的分别．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 多么意想不到的爱情牵动着我的心啊！倚着火盆，独自等待月出。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 情意难料，弄我心弦！倚着火盆，我独伫待月升。

text.ori_cn: (张生上云)搬至寺中，正得西厢居住。
text.man_en: Master Zhang enters and says:Having moved to the monastery，I occupy now my desired rooms near the western bower．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng on the cloud) moved to the temple, is getting the west wing to live.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengshangyun) moved to the temple and lived in the west wing.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Sheng went up to the clouds) and moved to the temple, securing a residence in the western wing.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张大师进来说：我搬到寺院后，现在占据了我想要的房间，就在西边的花房附近。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师进曰：已迁寺，今住西凉阁所欲房。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师进来说：搬到寺庙后，我现在占据了我理想中的西厢房。

text.ori_cn: 我问和尚，知道小姐每夜花园内烧香，恰好花园便是隔墙，比及小姐出来，我先在太湖石畔墙角儿头等待, 饱看他一回，却不是好。
text.man_en: As l was told by the monk，the young lady burns incense in the garden every night．Fortunately the garden is separated from my quarters only by a wall，so I can wait for her by the rocks at the corner of the wall and feast my eyes on her when she comes out．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I asked the monk, I know that the lady burns incense in the garden every night, and it so happens that the garden is a partition wall, than when the lady came out, I first waited in the corner of the wall by the Taihu Lake stone, to see him full of a time, but it is not good.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I asked the monk and found out that the lady burned incense in the garden every night, and the garden happened to be the partition wall. When the lady came out, I waited in the corner of the Taihu stone bank to watch him for once, but it was not a good idea.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I asked the monk if he knew that the young lady burns incense in the garden every night. The garden happens to be right beyond the wall. By the time the young lady comes out, I wait first by the corner of the wall near the Taihu rocks, taking a good look at her. Isn't that delightful?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 正如僧人告诉我的，这位小姐每晚都在花园里烧香。 幸运的是，花园与我的住处仅一墙之隔，所以我可以在墙角的岩石旁等她，等她出来时，我就可以大饱眼福了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 和尚告诉我，这位小姐每晚都会在花园里烧香。幸好花园与我的住处仅一墙之隔，我可以在墙角的岩石旁等她，享受我的美食。当她出来时，眼睛注视着她。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 正如那位和尚所说，这位年轻女子每晚都会在花园里焚香。幸运的是，我的住所与花园只隔一堵墙，因此我可以在墙角的岩石旁等她，当她出来时尽情欣赏她的美貌。

text.ori_cn: 且喜夜深人静，月朗风清，是好天气也呵。
text.man_en: What could be better than that! It is now midnight and there is no one about；the moon is bright and the air is clear, a truly delightful hour!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: And like the night is quiet, the moon is clear and windy, is a good weather also heh.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I also like that the night is quiet, the moon is bright and the wind is clear, it is a good weather.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: How delightful it is when the night is quiet, the moon is bright, and the breeze is gentle—it truly is wonderful weather.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 还有什么比这更好的呢？现在是午夜时分，四周空无一人；月光皎洁，空气清新，真是令人心旷神怡的时刻！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 还有什么比那个更好呢！现在已是半夜，无人，月明风清，真是令人心旷神怡！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 还有什么能比这更好呢！现在是午夜，周围没有人；月亮明亮，空气清新，真是一个令人愉快的时刻！

text.ori_cn: 闲寻方丈高僧坐，闷对西厢皓月吟。
text.man_en: At leisure I beseechTo hear the abbot preach；Sad in the room，I croon In the light of the moon．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I was looking for the Abbot to sit with the monks, and I was bored with the moon in the western room.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I am looking for the abbot and the eminent monk to sit there, silently chanting to the bright moon in the west chamber.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Leisurely seeking an audience with the abbot monk, I melancholically recite poems under the bright moon in the western wing.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 在闲暇时，我恳求聆听住持的布道；在房间里，我悲伤地在月光下吟唱。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 闲暇时，我恳求听方丈讲道；房间里悲伤，我在月光下低吟。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在闲暇时，我恳求聆听方丈的布道；悲伤地在房间，伴月光低吟。

text.ori_cn: 玉宇无尘，银河泻影，月色横空，花阴满庭。
text.man_en: No speck of cloud in jadelike sky, The Milky Way casts gentle light；The silver moon sails up on high；The courtyard shaded with flowers bright．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The jade is dustless, the Milky Way is in shadow, the moon is in the sky, and the flowery shade fills the garden.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The jade sky is dust-free, the Milky Way casts its shadow, the moon shines across the sky, and the garden is filled with shades of flowers.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The jade-like sky is free of dust, the Milky Way spills its reflection, moonlight stretches across the heavens, and shadows of flowers fill the courtyard.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 碧空万里无云，银河流光溢彩；银月高悬，庭院花影绰约。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 碧空无一朵云，银河光柔和；银月高挂；庭院花荫灿烂。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 碧空万里无云，银河轻轻撒放光辉；银月高高升起，庭院里花木掩映。

text.ori_cn: 罗袂生寒，芳心自警。
text.man_en: Through her silk sleeves she'd feel the cold；In her tender heart she'd know it's late．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The shivering of the robe is cold, and the heart is alerted.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Luo Bing is cold, and her heart is on guard.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The swaying sleeves feel the chill, and a gentle heart becomes cautious.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 透过她的丝袖，她会感到寒冷；在她温柔的心中，她会知道天色已晚。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 透过她的丝袖，她会感到寒冷；在她温柔的心里，她会知道已经晚了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 帷衣薄寒透，心感夜已深。

text.ori_cn: 侧着耳朵儿听，蹑着脚步儿行，悄悄冥冥，潜潜等等。
text.man_en: I incline my ear So as to hear；I walk on tiptoe So as to be slow．Furtively I go so that none may behold．And silently for her l wait．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Listen with your ears, walk with your feet, whisper, dive, and so on.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Listen attentively, walk on tiptoes, quietly, quietly, etc.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Listening attentively, tiptoeing quietly, moving silently and stealthily, and skulking about.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我侧耳倾听；我踮起脚尖，缓慢前行；我悄无声息地等待她的到来。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我侧耳倾听，以便聆听；我踮起脚尖，以便缓慢前进。我偷偷地走，以便没人看见。我默默地等待着她。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我侧耳倾听，为了能够听到；我踮着脚尖，为了能够慢行。我偷偷地走着，以免被任何人看到。静静地，我在等待她。

text.ori_cn: 等我那齐齐整整，袅袅婷婷，姐姐莺莺。
text.man_en: For Yingying so full of charm and grace I wait．

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 风吹进格子窗，吹来一阵寒意，撕碎的窗纸随风飘扬。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 风透过格子窗带来一丝寒意，使破碎的窗纸飘动。

text.ori_cn: 也坐不成，睡不能。
text.man_en: I can nor hate nor complain，But restless and sleepless remain．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nor can I sit, nor can I sleep.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I can't sit still or sleep.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Neither can I sit, nor can I sleep.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我不能憎恨，也不能抱怨，但我依然焦躁不安，辗转难眠。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我无法憎恨而不抱怨，但不安和失眠依然存在。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我既不能恨，也不能抱怨，只能感到不安和失眠。

text.ori_cn: 有一日柳遮花映，雾幛云屏，夜阑人静，海誓山盟，风流嘉庆，锦片前程，美满恩情，咱两个画堂春自生。
text.man_en: Some day, ' mid flowers and 'neath willow tree，In mistlike curtain or surrounded by cloudlike screen，We'd make an oath e'erlasting as mountain and sea At the dead of a night serene．We would enjoy our love at will，Facing a future bright；We might e'en love our fillTill in our painted hall spring has attained its height．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: One day the willow cover flowers, fog hanging scroll cloud screen, the end of the night, the sea oath of alliance, the wind flow of Jiaqing, Kam piece of the future, the beauty of love, the two of us paintings of the spring of their own life.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: One day, the willows cover the flowers, the mist and the clouds screen, the night is quiet and the people are quiet. We vow to each other, enjoy the romance, have a bright future, and a happy love. The two of us are born in spring.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: One day, beneath the willows and among the flowers, with misty curtains and cloud screens, in the quiet of the night, we made vows as eternal as the sea and mountains. In moments of elegance and celebration, looking forward to a bright future, filled with perfect affection, we, two, will create our own springtime in this painted hall.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 有一天，在花丛中，在柳树下，在薄雾般的帘幕中，在云雾般的屏风里，我们会许下山盟海誓，在宁静的夜深人静时，我们会尽情享受我们的爱情，面对美好的未来，我们会尽情享受我们的爱情，直到我们的画堂里春意盎然。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 总有一天，花中柳下，在雾帘里，在云幕围里，我们会在夜深人静的时候，许下山海长存的誓言。我们会随意享受我们的爱情，面对光明的未来；我们也许会爱得充实，直到在我们的彩绘大厅里，春天已经达到了它的高度。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 某日花前柳下， 纱幔如烟或云幕环绕， 我们会发出山海誓言 在寂静的深夜。 我们将尽情享受我们的爱情， 面对光明的未来； 我们甚至可能在粉墙的殿堂里 爱得无比充足，直到春天 达到了顶峰。

text.ori_cn: 我一天好事今宵定，两首诗分明互证。再不要青琐闼梦儿中寻，只索去碧桃花树儿下等。
text.man_en: So what good fortune to me beams!The verse exchanged is evidence clear．I need not seek her locked chamber in my dreamsBut wait beneath the flowering peach tree for my dear． (Exit．)
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The two poems are clear evidence of each other. I don't want to look for it in the dream of the green room anymore, I just want to go and wait under the peach blossom tree.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My good deeds are determined tonight, and the two poems clearly prove each other. Don't look for it anymore in Qingsuotai's dream, just ask for the peach blossom trees.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I have decided on today's good deed tonight; two poems clearly verify each other. No longer will I seek dreams beyond the green pavilion, I'll simply wait under the peach blossom tree.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我是多么幸运啊！换来的诗句证据确凿． 我不必在梦中寻找她紧锁的房间，只需在开花的桃树下等待我亲爱的．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 真是福气满面啊！交换的诗句就是明证。我不必在梦中寻找她上锁的密室，而是在桃花树下等待我的爱人。 （出口。）
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 瞧，我是多么幸运！这些交换的诗句是明白的证据。我不必在梦中寻找她的锁住的闺房，只需在盛开的桃树下等我的心上人。(退场。)

text.ori_cn: (张生上云)今日二月十五日，和尚请拈香，须索走一遭。
text.man_en: Master Zhang enters and says:Today is the fifteenth of the second moon．The priest has requested me to join in the service by burning incense，so I must go along．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng on the cloud) Today, the 15th day of the 2nd month, the monk please flick incense, must be asked to go through.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Sheng said) Today, February 15th, the monk asked me to hold some incense, and I had to take it away.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Sheng goes up to the clouds) Today is the fifteenth day of the second month, the monk invites to burn incense, must make a trip.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅进来说："今天是正月十五，道士叫我去烧香，我也要去。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师进来说：今天是二月十五，道士要我去烧香，所以我必须去。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅进来说：今天是二月十五。牧师请我参加烧香的仪式，所以我必须一起去。

text.ori_cn: 云睛雨湿天花乱，海涌风翻贝叶轻。
text.man_en: The preachers utter words as rain falls from the cloud；Like waves raised by the wind they turn palm leaves0'er loud．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The clouds and the rain are wet and the flowers are confused, the sea is surging and the wind is tumbling and the shell leaves are light.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The clouds are bright, the rain is wet, the sky is messy, the sea is surging and the wind is turning the bay leaves lightly.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Clouds clear and rain moistens, flowers scatter in the sky; the sea surges and winds turn, shell leaves flutter gently.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 传道者的言语就像雨点从云中落下；就像风掀起的波浪，把棕榈叶掀得哗哗作响。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 传教士们的话语如同雨从云中落下；就像风吹起的波浪，他们把棕榈叶吹得响亮。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 说教者的话语如同云中落下的雨点；如同风扬起的波浪，他们将棕榈叶翻动得声音响亮。

text.ori_cn: 梵王宫殿月轮高，碧琉璃瑞烟笼罩。
text.man_en: 0'er Buddha's Temple high the full moon shines in the skies；Around its greentiled roof the smokes of incense rise．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The moon wheel of Brahma's palace is high, and the blue-glazed Rui smoke covers it.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The moon in King Brahma's palace is high, shrouded in azure glass and auspicious smoke.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The palace of the Brahma King stands high under the moon, shrouded in auspicious mists of emerald glass.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 佛殿高高，圆月当空；香火缭绕，梵音缭绕。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 零尔佛寺高明圆月当空，青瓦顶香火缭绕。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 夜半钟声到客船，佛寺高悬月满天；绿瓦飞檐祥云绕，香烟缭绕绕佛前。

text.ori_cn: (法本引僧众上，云)今日是二月十五，释迦牟尼佛入大涅粱日，纯陀长者与文殊菩萨，修斋供佛，若是善男信女今日做好事，必获大福利。
text.man_en: Faben enters with all the other priests and says: Today is the fifteenth day of the second moon when Sakyamuni entered Nirvana and Bodhisattva Mandjusri and Auysman Cunda made offerings to Buddha．Those who perform religious service today，men and women，will secure great happiness and advantage．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Fa Ben cited the monks on, Yun) Today is the 15th of February, Shakyamuni Buddha into the Great Nirvana Day, pure Buddha elders and Manjushri Bodhisattva, cultivate fasting for the Buddha, if the good men and women do good deeds today, will be granted great benefits.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The text introduces the monks, it says) Today is the fifteenth day of the second lunar month, the day when Sakyamuni Buddha enters the Great Nirvana. Elder Cunda and Manjushri Bodhisattva are practicing fast to make offerings to the Buddha. If good men and women do good deeds today, they will surely receive great rewards. Welfare.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Faben leading the monks onto the stage, says) Today is February 15th, the day Shakyamuni Buddha entered Parinirvana. Elder Chunda and Bodhisattva Manjushri are performing a feast offering to the Buddha. If any good men or women do good deeds today, they will surely receive great blessings.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本与所有其他祭司一起进来说道：今天是释迦牟尼入涅槃的第二个月十五日，曼殊室利菩萨和奥依曼-昆达向佛陀献上了供品。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本与诸僧入，云：今日二月十五，释迦牟尼入涅槃，文殊菩萨、奥斯曼准陀供养佛。今日修事者，男女，得大安乐。优势。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本与其他所有的僧侣一起进入并说：今天是二月十五日，释迦牟尼进入涅槃，文殊菩萨和优婆塞作供佛。今天进行宗教服务的男女将获得巨大的幸福和利益。

text.ori_cn: 张先生早已在也。

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Mr. Zhang is already here.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Mr. Zhang has been here for a long time.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师傅，你来得早啊。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅，您来得很早。

text.ori_cn: 大众动法器者，待天明了请夫人小姐拈香。
text.man_en: Priests，play your sacred instruments now．When it dawns，I will request Madame Cui and her daughter to come to burn incense．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The public to move the magic weapon, wait until the dawn of the day to ask the lady lady incense.

text.ori_cn: 行香云盖结，讽咒海波潮。
text.man_en: Master Zhang continues to sing:The smoke of incense forms of clouds a canopy；The prayers sound like rolling waves of the sea．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Perform the incense and the cloud cover knot, satirise the mantra and the sea wave tide.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The moving incense clouds cover the knot, mocking the waves of the sea.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With the fragrance of incense forming a cloud-like canopy, incantations are recited to control the tide of the sea.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅继续唱道：香烟缭绕，云雾缭绕；祈祷声声，如海浪翻滚。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师继续唱：香烟成云华盖；祈福声如海涛滚滚。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅继续唱道: 香烟缭绕如云幕；祈祷声宛若海浪滚滚。

text.ori_cn: 幡影飘砜，诸檀越尽来到。
text.man_en: he banners undulate with shadows to and fro．All benefactors have come from high and low．

text.ori_cn: 法鼓金铙，二月春雷响殿角。

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 神鼓和铜钹在神庙的每个角落和四周响起，就像春天第二个月里的雷声一样；.............

text.ori_cn: 钟声佛号，半天风雨洒松梢。
text.man_en: The prayers to Buddha and the bells ringLike a half skyful of rain mingled with strong breeze．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The sound of bells and Buddha's call, half a day's rain and wind sprinkled the tops of the pines.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The bells rang out the Buddha's name, and the wind and rain sprinkled the pine trees for a long time.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The sound of bells and Buddhist chants mingles with the wind and rain that sprinkle the pine tips for half the day.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 念佛声声，钟声阵阵，犹如半边天雨夹杂着劲风。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 礼佛钟声如半天雨夹杂着大风。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 祈祷佛陀的经文与钟声响起，如同半边天的雨夹杂着强风。

text.ori_cn: 侯门不许老僧敲，纱窗也没有红娘报。
text.man_en: Sprinkling among the tips of green pine trees．The lordly house forbidden to the priest，Rose has not left her windowsill．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The old monk is not allowed to knock at the door of the marquee, and there is no red maiden to report at the screened window.

text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The noble house does not permit the old monk to knock, nor does the gauze window have a matchmaker to report.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 洒落在翠绿的松树枝桠间． 在牧师禁止入内的庄园里，玫瑰没有离开过她的窗台．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 洒落在青松树梢间。这座庄严的房子禁止牧师入内，罗斯还没有离开她的窗台。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在绿色松树的尖端洒下。那庄严的房子对神父是禁区，罗丝没有离开她的窗台。

text.ori_cn: (本见张生科，本云)先生先拈香，若夫人问呵，只说是老僧的亲。
text.man_en: Faben sees Master Zhang and says:You make your offering first．If Madame Cui asks you，please tell her you are a relation of mine．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Ben see Zhang Sheng Ke, Ben Yun) Mr first flick incense, if the lady asked He, just say it is the old monk's pro.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (original see Zhang Shengke, original version) Sir, please hold the incense first. If the lady asks, she will only say that she is a relative of the old monk.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Doctor Zhang Shengke, as you mentioned) Sir, please offer the incense first. If the lady asks, just say it's the old monk’s kin.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本见到张师傅说："你先供奉吧，如果崔夫人问起你，就说是我的亲戚。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本见张师曰：你先供养，若崔夫人问起，请告诉她你是我的亲戚。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本见到张大师，说：你先供奉。如果崔夫人问你，请告诉她你是我的亲戚。

text.ori_cn: 惟愿存在的人间寿高，亡过的天上逍遥，我真正为先灵礼三宝。
text.man_en: May those who are alive enjoy long life with glee! Be happy in Paradise，those who have passed away!For my ancestors' souls I worship the "Holy Three"
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I wish that those who have existed will live long on earth and those who have died will be free in heaven, and I truly salute the Three Jewels for the spirits of my ancestors.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I only hope that those who live in the world may live long and those who have died in heaven may live happily. I truly wish to pay homage to the Three Jewels for the deceased souls.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I only wish for those still living to enjoy longevity and for the departed to roam freely in heaven. I sincerely pay homage to the Three Jewels for the spirits of the ancestors.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 愿活着的人快乐长寿！愿逝者在天堂幸福快乐！我为祖先的灵魂祭拜 "三圣"
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 愿活着的人幸福长寿！为了我祖先的灵魂，我崇拜“圣三”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 愿在世的人们长寿欢喜！逝者在天堂快乐安息！为我祖先的灵魂，我敬拜“三圣”

text.ori_cn: 再焚香暗中祷告，只愿红娘休劣，夫人休觉，犬儿休恶，佛哕成就了幽期密约。
text.man_en: And then I bum the incense and in secret pray：May Rose not slap my wrist!May Madame be kept in the dark!May dogs not bark 10 Buddha，show your favor on our tryst!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Then burning incense and praying in secret, only wishing that the red lady will not be bad, the lady will not be aware, the dog will not be evil, the Buddha retched to achieve the secret promise.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Then he burned incense and prayed secretly, wishing that the matchmaker would stop being evil, the wife would stop sleeping, and the dog would stop being evil. The secret agreement in the quiet period was fulfilled.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Incense is burned again in secret prayer, wishing that the matchmaker wouldn't be troublesome, the lady wouldn't awaken, the dog wouldn't be vicious, and Buddha would fulfill the secret rendezvous and hidden agreement.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 然后，我焚香祷告：愿玫瑰不打我的手腕！愿夫人被蒙在鼓里！愿狗不叫 10 佛祖，请眷顾我们的约会！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 然后我烧香，暗暗祈祷：愿玫瑰不要打我的手腕！愿夫人蒙在鼓里！愿狗不叫十佛，承蒙我们幽会！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 接着我点燃香炉，暗暗地祈祷：愿玫瑰不要打我的手腕！愿夫人生不知情！愿狗不叫，佛陀，请保佑我们的幽会！

text.ori_cn: (夫人引莺莺、红娘上，云)长老请拈香，咱走一遭。
text.man_en: Madame Cui enters with Yingying and Rose and says:We are now going to bum the incense as requested by the abbot．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (The lady led Yingying and Hongniang on, Yun) Elder, please flick the incense, let's go for a walk.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madam introduces Yingying and Matchmaker.) Elder, please hold some incense while we take a walk.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Enter Mrs. Cui, Ying Ying, and Hong Niang. She says) 'Master, please light the incense; let's take a walk.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人带着盈盈和蔷薇走进来，说：我们现在要按照方丈的要求去焚香了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人带着莺莺、玫瑰进来说道：我们现在按照住持的要求去烧香。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人带着莺莺和玫瑰进来说：我们现在按照方丈的要求去上香。

text.ori_cn: 我只道玉天仙离碧霄，原来是可意种来清醮。
text.man_en: She seems a fair angel from the blue skies，But she's a lovely maiden coming to say grace．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I only thought that the Jade Heavenly Fairy had left the blue sky, but it turned out to be the Koyi Seed who came to perform the Bun Festival.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I only thought that the Jade Heavenly Immortal was away from Bixiao, and it turned out that he was able to plant a kind of seed to pray for the sake of peace.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I thought the jade celestial maiden had departed from the emerald sky, but it turns out she's here for the serene festival.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她似乎是来自蓝天的美丽天使，但她是来向你行礼的可爱少女。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她看上去是一位来自蓝天的美丽天使，但她是一位前来施恩的可爱少女。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她似乎是从蓝天来的美丽天使，但她却是一个前来祈祷的可爱少女。

text.ori_cn: 我是个多愁多病身，怎当你倾国倾城貌。
text.man_en: Lovesick for her, can I refrain from heaving sighsFor such a beauty with such a captivating face?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I am a sickly body, how can I be your beautiful face?
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I am a troubled and sick person, how can I treat you as a beautiful person who has conquered the country and conquered the city?
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I am a person fraught with worries and frailties; how could I withstand your overwhelming beauty?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我为她痴狂，能不为这样一位拥有迷人容颜的美人叹息吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 为她相思，我能不为她如此绝美的容颜而叹息吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 为她相思难忍，我岂能不叹息？如此美丽的容颜怎能不令人心醉？

text.ori_cn: 你看檀口点樱桃，粉鼻倚琼瑶。
text.man_en: Her lips are cherryred，you see，Her nose jadewhite，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Look at the mouth of the sandalwood cherry, the pink nose leaning on the Qiongyao.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You see, the tan mouth is lit with cherries, and the pink nose is leaning against Qiong Yao.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You see lips like cherry blossoms, and a delicate nose leaning against jade-like skin.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她的嘴唇是樱桃红的，你看，她的鼻子是洁白的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她的嘴唇是樱桃红色的，你看，她的鼻子是玉白的，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她的嘴唇像樱桃一样红，你看，她的鼻子像玉一样白，

text.ori_cn: 淡白梨花面，轻盈杨柳腰。
text.man_en: Her face like the flower of a pear tree，Like willow branch her figure slight．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Pale white pear blossom face, light willow waist.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Pale white pear blossom noodles, light willow waist.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Her face as fair as pear blossoms, her waist as slender as willow branches.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她的脸庞像梨树的花朵，她的身材像柳枝，她的脸庞微胖。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她的脸像梨花，她的身材像柳枝。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她的脸像梨花般美丽，她的身姿像柳枝般纤细。

text.ori_cn: 妖娆，满面儿堆着俏。
text.man_en: Lovely and sweet，In her charms she's complete；
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Enchanting, and full of playfulness.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Enchanting, her face is full of beauty.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Alluring, her face is adorned with charm.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 可爱甜美，魅力无穷；
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 可爱又甜美，魅力十足；
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 可爱又甜美，她的魅力无可挑剔；

text.ori_cn: 苗条，一团儿衡是娇。
text.man_en: Slim and slender, She's delicate and tender．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Slim, a ball of balance is dainty.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Slender and delicate.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Slim, a graceful bundle of elegance.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 苗条纤细，娇嫩欲滴．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 苗条而苗条，她精致而温柔。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 苗条纤细，她娇弱温柔。

text.ori_cn: (本云)老僧一句话敬禀夫人，有敝亲，是上京秀才，父母亡后，无可相报，央老僧带一分斋。
text.man_en: Faben says:I have something to tell you，Madame．A relation of mine，who is a scholar on his way to the capital，has asked me to include him in the religious service to show his gratitude to his deceased parents．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (This cloud) the old monk a word of respect to the lady, there are my relatives, is on the capital of the scholar, after the death of his parents, there is nothing to report, begged the old monk to bring a point of fasting.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (original version) The old monk said a word of respect to my wife. I have a relative who is a scholar in Beijing. After the death of my parents, I have nothing to repay, so the old monk asked me to take a break.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (This monk) has a word of respect to the lady. I have a relative, a scholar from the capital, who, after the death of his parents, feels indebted and unable to repay the kindness. He requested this monk to offer a portion of the alms.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本说：我有件事要告诉你，夫人． 我的一位亲戚，他是一位学者，正在前往首都的途中，他请求我让他参加宗教仪式，以表达他对已故父母的感激之情。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本说：夫人，我有件事要告诉你。我的一个亲戚，一位正在前往首都的学者，要求我让他参加宗教仪式，以表达他对已故父母的感激之情。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本说道：夫人，我有件事要告诉您。我的一位亲戚，他是个学者，现在正前往京城，他请求我让他参加宗教仪式，以表达对已故父母的感恩之情。

text.ori_cn: 老僧一时应允了，恐夫人见责。
text.man_en: I have promised him I would，but I am afraid I might have incurred your displeasure．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The old monk agreed for a moment, fearing that the lady would be blamed.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The old monk agreed immediately, fearing that his wife would be blamed.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The old monk agreed for the moment, fearing reproach from the lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我答应过他，但我担心会引起您的不快。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我已经答应他我会的，但我担心我可能会引起你的不满。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我已经答应了他，但我怕我可能惹您不高兴了。

text.ori_cn: 请来相见咱。
text.man_en: Please ask him to come and see me．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Please come and meet us.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Please come and meet us.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Please come and see me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 请他来见我．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 请请他来看我。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 请让他来见我。

text.ori_cn: 大师年纪老，高座上也凝眺。
text.man_en: The abbot，though advanced in years，From his high seat，bends his eyes on the belle．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The Master is old, and gazes from his high seat.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The master is old and looks down from the high seat.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The master, aged and venerable, gazed steadily from his high seat.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 修道院长虽然年事已高，但还是从他的高座上俯视着这位美女。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 方丈虽然年事已高，但坐在高位上，却将目光投向了美女。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 虽然年事已高，方丈从高座上俯视这位美人。

text.ori_cn: 举名的班首真呆傍，将法聪头做磬敲。
text.man_en: What a fool the head monk appears!He's striking Facong's head and not the bell．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The head of the class who lifted the name is really dumb, and the head of Fazhong will be struck as a chime.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The leader of the class who named him was so stunned that he knocked Fa Cong's head on a chime.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The leader of the class, Ju Ming, stood dumbfounded, while Fa Cong banged his head like a gong.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 和尚头真是个傻瓜！他敲的是法空的头，而不是钟。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 和尚真是个傻子！他敲的是法聪的头，而不是钟。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 真是个傻瓜，主持看起来像在敲法聪的头，而不是钟。

text.ori_cn: 老的少的，村的俏的，没颠没倒，胜似闹元宵。
text.man_en: The old and young，the foul and fair, All stand in great confusion thereAs on the Lantern Day．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The old and the young, the village and the pretty, no upside down, better than the Lantern Festival.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Young and old, beautiful people from the village, no matter how beautiful they are, it's better than celebrating the Lantern Festival.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The old and young, the charming ones of the village, all together gathered, it felt like the Lantern Festival.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 老的少的，脏的靓的，都像元宵节一样乱哄哄地站在那里。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 老老少少，污秽美白，都站在那里，如同元宵节一样。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 老少皆有，美丑杂陈，元宵佳节里人们齐齐困惑纷呈。

text.ori_cn: 稔色人儿，可意冤家，怕人知道，看人将泪眼偷瞧。
text.man_en: Their looks beseechingAnd hers bewitchingAs if all had something to say．She casts a furtive glance from her eyes full of tearsAs if she had some lurking fears．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nim colourful person, may be interested in the wrongdoer, afraid of people know, to see people will be tearful eyes peeping.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: A pretty person can be an enemy, but he is afraid that people will find out, and will peek into his eyes with tears in his eyes.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sophisticated and charming person, a dear but troublesome one, afraid of being discovered, secretly glancing with tearful eyes.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他们的眼神恳求，她的眼神迷惑，仿佛所有人都有话要说。 她从满是泪水的眼睛里偷偷瞥了一眼，仿佛她有什么潜伏的恐惧。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他们的眼神恳求，她的眼神迷惑，仿佛都有话要说。她满含泪水的眼睛偷偷地看了一眼，仿佛有什么潜藏着的恐惧。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他们的眼神恳切，而她的眼神充满魅力，仿佛都有话要说。她的眼睛里满是泪水，偷偷瞥了一眼，仿佛心中藏着一些恐惧。

text.ori_cn: 着小生心痒难挠。
text.man_en: She fills my heartWith a longing that cannot be put apart．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I've been itching for a long time.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It's hard to scratch the little boy's heart.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: This makes me feel unbearably itchy.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她让我的心充满了无法割舍的渴望．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她让我的心充满了无法割裂的渴望。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她填满了我的心，让我产生了一种无法割舍的渴望。

text.ori_cn: 哭声儿似莺啭乔林，泪珠儿似露滴花梢。
text.man_en: All hear her weepLike an oriole warbling in a forest deep，And see her tearsAs pearly dew on a flower appears．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The sound of weeping is like a warbler singing in the forest, and the teardrops are like dew dripping from the tops of flowers.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The cries are like orioles chirping in the forest, and the tears are like dewdrops.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Her cries resemble the oriole's song in the dense forest, and her tears are like dewdrops on the flower's tip.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 所有人都听到她的哭泣，就像黄鹂在森林深处婉转鸣叫；所有人都看到她的泪水，就像珍珠般的露珠滴落在花朵上。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 皆闻其泪如林深黄莺鸣，见其泪如花上珠露。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 大家都听见她哭泣，像深林中莺儿在啼鸣，看到她的泪水，像花上的露珠晶莹。

text.ori_cn: 大师难学，把个慈悲脸儿朦着。
text.man_en: The inimitable abbot grievesAnd hides his kindly face with both his sleeves．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Masters are hard to learn and put a hazy face of compassion.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It is difficult for the master to learn, and his compassionate face is dimmed.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Mastery is hard to achieve, veiling a face of compassion.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 无与伦比的修道院长悲痛欲绝，用衣袖遮住了慈祥的面容。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 无与伦比的方丈悲伤并用双袖遮住了他慈祥的脸。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 独特的住持哀伤不已，用双袖掩盖他那慈祥的脸。

text.ori_cn: 点烛的头陀可恼，烧香的行者堪焦。
text.man_en: The acolyteForgets the candles he should light，And the monk who should burnThe incense forgets his concern．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The head who lights candles can be annoyed, and the practitioner who burns incense can be burnt.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: A tutu who lights a candle is annoyed, a traveler who burns incense is anxious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The monk lighting candles is vexing, and the pilgrim burning incense is worrisome.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 该点蜡烛的助手忘了点，该焚香的和尚忘了焚。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 学徒忘记了应该点的蜡烛，应该烧香的和尚忘记了自己的关心。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 侍僧忘了自己应该点燃的蜡烛，而应燃香的和尚也忘记了他的忧虑。

text.ori_cn: 烛影红摇，香霭云飘，贪看莺莺烛灭香消。
text.man_en: So flicker candles redAnd cloudlike smokes of incense spread．To Yingying they are so devoutThat incense ceases to bum and candles all go out．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Candle shadows are shaking red, the fragrance is floating in the clouds, and I am greedy to see Ying Ying's candle extinguished and her fragrance disappearing.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The shadow of the candle is red, the fragrance is floating in the clouds, and the orioles are greedy to watch as the candle goes out and the fragrance disappears.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The candlelight flickered red, the fragrant mist drifted like clouds, greedily staring at Yingying as the candle extinguished and the incense dissipated.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 烛光摇曳，香烟缭绕，莺莺虔诚，香消烛灭。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 于是红烛闪烁，香火缭绕，烟雾缭绕。对莹莹来说，他们是如此虔诚，以至于香不再燃烧，蜡烛都熄灭了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 红烛摇曳香烟袅袅，敬之虔诚香燃尽烛燃消。

text.ori_cn: 我情引眉梢，心绪他知道。
text.man_en: My love's revealed at the point of my brows；She knows my lovesickness．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: My love leads to my brow, my heart he knows.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My eyebrows are drawn with emotion, and he knows my mood.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: My feelings show in my brows, and he understands my heart.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的爱在眉尖流露；她知道我的相思．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的爱在我的眉尖显露；她知道我的相思。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我爱意流露在眉梢，她知晓我的相思。

text.ori_cn: 他愁种心苗，情思我猜着。
text.man_en: Her heart which sorrow plowsIs stirred by love，I guess．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: His sorrows planted the seedling of his heart, and his feelings I guessed.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He is worried about his feelings, and I can guess his feelings.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He planted seeds of sorrow in his heart, guessing my emotions and thoughts.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我想，她那颗被悲伤犁过的心是被爱撩动的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我猜，她那颗被悲伤犁过的心是被爱所搅动的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她那被悲伤耕犁的心，我猜，是被爱所激动。

text.ori_cn: 畅懊恼，响铛铛云板敲，行者又嚎，沙弥又哨，你须不夺人之好。
text.man_en: But I dislike The loud sound of the gong the monks strike And the prayers the novices recite，For l would not be robbed of my delight．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The people of the city are not happy, but they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy, and they are happy.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chang is upset, there is a clanging sound, the cloud board is beating, the traveler is howling, the novice is whistling, you must not take away the good things from others.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Chang is annoyed; the loud clang of the cloud-shaped chime resounds, the traveler howls again, the novice monk whistles again, you must not deprive people of their joy.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 但我不喜欢僧侣敲锣打鼓的声音，也不喜欢初学者诵读的祷文，因为我不想失去我的快乐。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 但我不喜欢僧人敲响的锣声和沙弥背诵的祈祷文，因为我不会被剥夺我的喜悦。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 但我不喜欢僧侣们敲击的锣鼓声，也不喜欢新手们吟诵的祈祷词，因为我不愿失去我的喜悦。

text.ori_cn: 你有心争似无心好，我多情蚤被无情恼。
text.man_en: A longing heart is sadder than a longing eye；For the enchantress I，enchanted，can only sigh．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You have the heart to be as good as the heartless, and I am annoyed by the mercurial flea.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You are willing to fight but it seems that you have no intention to be good. I am passionate and ruthless.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Your feigned interest is worse than genuine disinterest; my deep affections are vexed by your indifference.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 渴望的心比渴望的眼更悲伤；对于我所迷恋的女魔法师，我只能叹息。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 思念的心比思念的眼睛更悲伤；我对着魔的人只能叹息。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 渴望的心比渴望的眼更悲伤；因为我这迷人的人，被迷住的，只能叹息.

text.ori_cn: (本宣疏烧纸科，云)天明了也，请夫人小姐回宅。
text.man_en: Faben, reciting the prayers for the service and burning paper money, says: It is dawn now．Please return to your quarters，Madame and Mademoiselle．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Ben Xuan Shu burning paper section, cloud) daybreak also, please lady lady back to the house.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (This Xuan Shu Shao Zhi Ke, cloud) It's dawn, please Madam, Miss, go back to the house.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Written request for burning paper) Dawn has broken. Please, Madam and Miss, return to the residence.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本一边诵读祈祷文，一边焚烧纸钱，然后说：现在天亮了，请回到你们的住处，夫人和小姐。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本一边背诵祈祷词，一边烧纸钱，说道：现在已经是黎明了。请回到你们的住处，夫人和小姐。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本一边诵念着仪式的祷文，一边烧着纸钱，说道：天亮了。夫人和小姐，请回房休息吧。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)再做一日也好，那里发付小生。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:Another day like this would be a joy indeed! What am I to do now?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) It would be good to do it for another day, where I was sent to pay the youngest student.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) It doesn’t matter if I work for one more day, I will pay a small salary there.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) If it's for just one more day, it's all right. Where do you want me to go?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：再过一天这样的日子，就真的很开心了！我现在该怎么办？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师傅说：再有这样的一天，真是高兴啊！我现在该怎么办？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅说：再过这样的一天，真是一种乐趣啊！我现在该怎么办呢？

text.ori_cn: 劳攘了一宵，月儿早沉，钟儿早响，鸡儿早叫。
text.man_en: He continues to sing:A busy night，The moon is out of sight；The bell has rung；The cock has sung．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: After labouring all night, the moon sinks early, the clock rings early, and the cock crows early.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: After working hard all night, the moon sets early, the bells ring early, and the chickens crow early.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: After a bustling night, the moon had already set, the bells had already rung, and the roosters had already crowed.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他继续唱道：一个忙碌的夜晚，月亮已经看不见；钟声已经敲响；雄鸡已经歌唱。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他继续唱：忙碌的夜晚，月亮不见了；钟声已响；公鸡已歌唱。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他继续唱着：忙碌的夜晚，月亮不见了；钟声响起；雄鸡啼叫。

text.ori_cn: 玉人儿归去得疾，好事儿收拾得早。
text.man_en: The fair is gone，The service done，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Jade's return was quick, and the good things were packed up early.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The beautiful lady is ill when she returns home, and the bad things are dealt with early.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The beautiful lady left in haste, good things were taken care of early.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 展会结束，服务完成，
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 展会走了，服务做好了，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 集市已散，服务完毕，

text.ori_cn: 道场散了，酩子里各回家，葫芦提已到晓。
text.man_en: Deserted is the place．At an easy pace All worshippers go on their homeward way．Soon breaks the day (Exeunt．)
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The dojo was dispersed, and the Moet went home to his own house, and Huluti had reached the dawn.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The monastery has dispersed, everyone has gone home, and the gourd has arrived at dawn.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The gathering at the dojo dispersed, and everyone made their way home in the drunken haze; the dawn had already broken.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 这里荒无人烟，信徒们迈着轻盈的步伐踏上归途。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 这里荒无人烟。所有信徒都踏上回家的路。很快就会破晓（下。）
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 这个地方空无一人。以轻松的步伐，所有崇拜者都踏上了回家的路。天很快就亮了（退场）。

text.ori_cn: (孙飞虎领卒子上，云)自家孙飞虎的便是。
text.man_en: Sun Feihu (The Flying Tiger) enters with a company of soldiers and says: I am Sun Feihu．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Sun Feihu led the pawns on, Yun) I am Sun Feihu.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Sun Feihu leads the pawns forward, cloud) This is his Sun Feihu's.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Sun Feihu enters with his soldiers, saying) I am Sun Feihu.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 孙飞虎带着一队士兵走进来，说：我是孙飞虎。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 孙飞虎带着一连士兵进来，说道：我是孙飞虎。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 孙飞虎（飞虎）带着一队士兵进来了，说道：我是孙飞虎。

text.ori_cn: 方今天下扰攘，主将丁文雅失政，俺分统五千人马，镇守河桥。
text.man_en: Now the Empire is in a state of disorder My commander chief has failed to discharge his duties．I have been given a separate command of five thousand men to guard the Bridge on the River．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Fang today is disturbed, the main general Ding Wenya is out of order, I divided into 5,000 men to guard the river bridge.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Fang today is in chaos, the general Ding Wenya is out of power, and I have 5,000 men and horses to guard the river bridge.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Today, the world is in turmoil. The main commander, Ding Wenya, has misgoverned. I am in charge of five thousand soldiers and horses, guarding the Heqiao (River Bridge).
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 现在帝国一片混乱，我的总司令没有履行他的职责． 我被分派了一个五千人的单独指挥部，负责守卫河上的大桥．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 现在帝国一片混乱，我的统帅失职了。我被单独指挥五千人去守卫河桥。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 现在帝国处于混乱状态，我的总指挥官没有履行他的职责。我被授予一支五千人的独立指挥队，负责守卫河上的大桥。

text.ori_cn: 探知相国崔珏之女莺莺，眉黛青颦，莲脸生春，有倾国倾城之容，西子太真之色，现在河中府普救寺停丧借居。
text.man_en: It is said the late Prime Minister Cui has a daughter called Yingying whose black eyebrows with winning expressions and whose face as beautiful as the lotus in spring are of such an overwhelming charm that she matches the most famous beauties of old．She is now in the Salvation Monastery where the coffin of her late father is resting．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I found out that Cui Jue's daughter Yingying, eyebrows green knit, lotus face spring, has the face of the Kingdom of the city, Xizi too true colour, now the Hezhong Province Pujiao Temple stop mourning to live on borrowed time.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I found out that Yingying, the daughter of Cui Jue, the Prime Minister, with dark eyebrows and green eyebrows, a lotus face full of spring, a look that would captivate a country, and a look that was too true for Xizi, is currently staying in Pujiu Temple in Hezhong Prefecture for mourning.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Upon learning about Prime Minister Cui Jue's daughter, Yingying, with her delicate eyebrows, lotus-like face brimming with springtime charm, possessing a beauty capable of toppling nations, resembling the legendary beauties Xishi and Yang Yuhuan, she is currently staying at Pujue Temple in Hezhong Prefecture while mourning a loss.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 据说已故的崔丞相有一个女儿叫盈盈，乌眉胜目，面如春莲，风韵犹存，堪比古时最有名的美人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 相传已故崔总理有一个女儿，名叫莺莺，她的眉目乌黑，神采飞扬，面容如春莲，魅力十足，可与古代最有名的美女相媲美。救世寺安放着她已故父亲的灵柩。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 据说已故崔首相有一个女儿叫莹莹，她眉黑如黛，脸若春荷，美貌绝伦，堪比古代名姝。她现在在安灵寺，守护着她已故父亲的灵柩。

text.ori_cn: 前日二月十五，做好事追荐父亲，多曾有人看见。
text.man_en: She was seen by many people on the fifteenth of the second moon when a religious service was held in memory of her father．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The day before yesterday, on the 15th day of the 2nd month, I did a good deed in honour of my father, and many people saw it.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The day before yesterday, February 15th, I had been seen doing good deeds and recommending my father.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The day before yesterday, on February 15, I did a good deed to honor my father, and many people witnessed it.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 很多人都在二月十五那天看到了她，当时正在举行纪念她父亲的宗教仪式。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 二月十五日，当人们为纪念她的父亲举行宗教仪式时，很多人都看到了她。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 许多人在二月十五日举行的为她父亲的宗教纪念仪式上看到了她。

text.ori_cn: 谁想孙飞虎领半万贼兵，围住寺门，犹如铁桶，鸣锣击鼓，呐喊摇旗，要掳小姐为妻。
text.man_en: Who would have thought that Sun Feihu would have led five thousand men to surround the monastery as tightly as iron hoops round a barrel? They are sounding gongs，beating drums，waving flags and loudly shouting that Sun Feihu would make Miss Oriole his wife．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Who would have thought that Sun Feihu led half a million thieves, surrounded the temple door, like an iron barrel, sounding gongs and drums, shouting and waving the flag, to take the lady as his wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Who would have thought that Sun Feihu would lead half a million thieves and surround the temple gate like iron barrels, sounding gongs and drums, shouting and waving flags, and want to kidnap the young lady as his wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Who would have thought that Sun Feihu would lead five thousand bandits to surround the temple gates, turning it into an iron fortress, beating gongs, drumming, shouting, and waving flags, all in an attempt to abduct the young lady to be his wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 谁能想到，孙飞虎会率领五千人马，像铁箍一样把寺院围得水泄不通？他们敲锣打鼓，摇旗呐喊，高喊着孙飞虎要娶黄鹂姑娘为妻。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 谁能想到，孙飞虎竟率领五千人马，将寺院围得如铁桶般严严实实。他们敲锣打鼓，挥舞旗帜，高呼孙飞虎娶黄莺小姐为妻。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 谁会想到孙飞虎会带领五千人把寺院围得像铁箍桶一样紧？他们敲锣打鼓，挥舞旗帜，大声喊叫，孙飞虎要迎娶莺小姐为妻。

text.ori_cn: 老僧不敢违误，只索报知与夫人、小姐。
text.man_en: I dare not hush up the matter but must inform Madame and her daughter at once．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The old monk did not dare to disobey, but only asked to report to the lady and the lady.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The old monk did not dare to violate the rules and only asked to report to his wife and young lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The old monk dared not delay, he could only report to the lady and the young mistress.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我不敢隐瞒此事，必须立即通知夫人和她的女儿。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我不敢隐瞒此事，但必须立即通知夫人和她的女儿。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我不敢隐瞒此事，必须立刻告知夫人和她的女儿。

text.ori_cn: 长老，俺便同到小姐房前商议去。
text.man_en: Abbot，1et us go to discuss the matter outside my daughter's room．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Elder, I'll go to the lady's room to discuss it with her.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Elder, I will go to the young lady’s room to discuss this with you.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Elder, I'll go with you to discuss this matter in front of the young lady's room.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 方丈，让我们到我女儿的房间外商议此事吧。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 方丈，1我们去我女儿的房间外面讨论一下这件事吧。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 方丈，让我们到我女儿房间外面去讨论这件事。

text.ori_cn: 正是：好句有情怜皓月，落花无语怨东风。
text.man_en: Blooms fallen from the trees Resent the eastern breeze．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It is exactly that: a good sentence has the feeling of pitying the white moon, the fallen flowers have no words to complain about the east wind.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Exactly: A good sentence pities the bright moon, but the falling flowers are speechless and blame the east wind.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Indeed: beautiful phrases cherish the bright moon, while fallen flowers silently lament the east wind.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 树上的花儿落了，怨恨东风的吹拂．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 树上落花怨东风。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 花落树影，怨东风。

text.ori_cn: 恹恹瘦损，早是多愁，那更残春。
text.man_en: Sorrow and grief are wearing me away．How can I bear late spring's departing day!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sickly and thinly damaged, early is much sorrow, that more remnants of spring.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Being thin and thin means that you are already worried, which makes your spring even more waning.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Languid and emaciated, already fraught with worries, made worse by the remnants of spring.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我怎能忍受暮春离去的日子！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 忧伤愁苦，我怎能忍受暮春的离去！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 愁肠百结难消散，怎堪暮春离别日！

text.ori_cn: 我只是风袅香烟不卷帘，雨打梨花深闭门。
text.man_en: The curtain not uprolled，the incense wafts in breeze；I shut the door and let the rain beat on pear trees．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I just wind curling cigarettes do not roll curtains, rain hit pear blossom deep closed door.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I just don’t roll up the curtains when the wind blows, and the pear blossoms close the door when the rain hits me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I am but the breeze teasing the smoke without rolling up the curtain, the raindrops hitting the pear blossoms behind tightly closed doors.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 帘卷西风，人比黄花瘦；闭门听雨，梨花带雨。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 帘未卷，香风飘；关门任雨打梨树。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 帘不卷，香风流；闲倚门，让雨打梨花深闭户。

text.ori_cn: 莫去倚阑干，极目行云。
text.man_en: I dare not lean on balcony：The clouds are blown as far as the eyes can see．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Don't go leaning on the railing, looking at the clouds.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Don't lean on the langan, and watch the clouds as far as the eye can see.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Do not lean against the railing, gazing afar at the drifting clouds.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我不敢倚在阳台上：天边的云彩被吹得很远。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我不敢靠在阳台上：天上的云朵被吹得一望无际。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我不敢倚靠在阳台上：目光所及，云被风吹得很远。

text.ori_cn: 况是落红成阵，风飘万点正愁人。
text.man_en: What's more, red flowers Are falling in showers．It saddens me to see．Ten thousand petals twirl in wind and flee．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The wind is blowing all over the place and it's a sad sight.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: What's more, the fallen reds form a formation, and the wind blows with thousands of points, which makes people sad.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Now red petals fall in clusters, the wind scatters countless pieces, deepening my sorrow.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 更有红花零落成泥碾作尘，化作春泥更护花。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 更何况，红花纷纷落落，看得我心酸。万片花瓣随风飘散。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 更何况，红花纷纷落下。这让我很伤心。千万片花瓣在风中飞舞逃离。

text.ori_cn: 昨夜池塘梦晓，今朝阑槛辞春。
text.man_en: Last night I dreamed of seeing poolside green grass grow, This morning spring has left my chamber in the west．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Last night I dreamed of the pond, but today I am leaving the threshold in spring.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Last night there was a dream in the pond, now I am leaving the spring.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Last night, the pond dreamt of dawn; this morning, the railing bids farewell to spring.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 昨夜梦见池边绿草生，今朝春色出西厢。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 昨夜梦见池边青草长，今晨春已离西屋。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 昨夜池畔青萋萋，今朝西厢春已息。

text.ori_cn: 蝶粉乍沾飞絮雪，燕泥已尽落花尘。
text.man_en: White butterflies and willow down mingle like snow；The soil from fallen blooms is made the swallows' nest．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Butterfly powder is first dipped in the snow, swallow mud has been exhausted in the dust of fallen flowers.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The butterfly powder is stained with flying snow, and all the flower dust has fallen from the swallow mud.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Butterfly powder lightly touches flying snowy willow fluff, and the swallow mud has already turned into falling flower dust.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 白蝶与柳絮交融如雪；落花的泥土是燕子的巢。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 白蝴蝶柳絮交融如雪；落花土作燕窝。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 白蝶柳絮如雪飞，落花泥土筑燕巢。

text.ori_cn: 系春情短柳丝长，隔花人远天涯近。
text.man_en: The willow branch so long can't make spring stay；The man beyond the blooms seems farther off than the sky．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The spring is short and the willows are long, but the flowers are far away and the sky is near.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The spring love is short and the willow silk is long. The flowers are far away and the world is close.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The fleeting spring sentiment extends like the willow's long threads, with flowers dividing us apart, yet our hearts remain close despite the vast distance.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 柳枝那么长，也不能让春天停留；花开之外的人，似乎比天空还遥远。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 柳枝长不留春，花外人似天远。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 柳条如此长也难把春天留下；花丛后的那人似乎比天空还要遥远。

text.ori_cn: 有几多六朝金粉，三楚精神。
text.man_en: How many beauties like me have pined away By heaving sigh on sigh!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: There are many six dynasties of gold dust and three Chu spirits.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: How many golden powders of the Six Dynasties and the spirit of the Three Chus are there.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: How much of the splendor of the Six Dynasties and the spirit of the Three Chus remain?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 有多少像我这样的美人在叹息中憔悴！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 多少美人如我，在叹息中憔悴！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 有多少像我这样的美人儿因为不断叹气而憔悴不堪！

text.ori_cn: (红娘云)小姐情思不快，我将这被儿熏得香香的，小姐睡些则个。
text.man_en: Rose says:My young mistress is pensive and melancholy．I will make her coverlet fragrant so that she may sleep well．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang Yun) Miss is not happy, I will smoke this quilt fragrant, Miss sleep some.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Matchmaker cloud) Miss is feeling unhappy, I will make this quilt smell fragrant while Miss sleeps for a while.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongniang Yun) Miss seems troubled. I have infused this quilt with fragrance. Miss, please take a rest.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰说：我年轻的女主人正沉思着，忧郁着，我要让她的被子散发出芳香，让她睡个好觉。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：我的少妇心情忧郁，我会让她的被子香起来，让她睡个好觉。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 玫瑰说:我的年轻主人很沉思和忧郁。我会让她的被子充满芳香，这样她就能睡得好。

text.ori_cn: 翠被生寒压绣锢，休将兰麝熏，便将兰麝熏尽，我不解自温存。
text.man_en: My coverlet and broidered mattress grow so cold That you can't warm them with musk perfumes spread．Even if you used all the perfumes manifold，You could not warm and sweeten a lonely bed．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The emerald was cold and pressed the embroidery confinement, don't smoked the orchid musk, then the orchid musk smoked all, I don't understand since the warmth of coexistence.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The green grass is embroidered by the cold pressure. If you don't smoke the orchid musk deer, you will smoke out the orchid musk deer. I don't understand how to be gentle.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The jade bedding brings coldness, pressing down on the embroidered pattern. Don't use orchid and musk to fragrance it; even if you use up all the orchid and musk, I won't understand how to keep myself warm.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的被子和锦缎床垫变得如此冰冷，你用麝香香水也无法温暖它们． 即使你用了所有的香水，你也无法温暖和甜美一张孤独的床．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的被​​单和绣花床垫变得如此寒冷，以至于你无法用麝香香水来温暖它们。即使你使用了所有的香水，你也无法温暖和甜蜜一张孤独的床。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我那织锦的床褥已变得冰冷，就算洒满麝香也无法温热。即使你用尽各种香料，也无法暖和这孤独的床。

text.ori_cn: 分明锦囊佳句来勾引，为何玉堂人物难亲近。
text.man_en: It is clear his fine verse tried to lure me away．Why can't I get in touch with him today?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It is clear that the good words of the brocade bag have come to seduce, but why is it difficult for the characters in the jade hall to get close to each other.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It is clear that there are good tips and phrases to seduce, why is it so difficult to get close to the characters in Yutang.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Clearly, the exquisite verses entice, yet why are the distinguished figures of the jade hall difficult to approach?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 很明显，他的优美诗句是在引诱我离开。 为什么我今天联系不上他？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 显然他优美的诗句试图引诱我离开。为什么我今天联系不上他呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 显然，他的精美诗句试图引诱我离开。今天为什么我联系不上他？

text.ori_cn: 这些时坐又不安，立又不稳，登临又不快，闲行又困，镇日价情思睡昏昏。
text.man_en: I do not like to sit on the one handNor on the other to stand．No vista brings me pleasure；I'm wearied when l walk at leisure．Lost in a love so strong，I'm drowsy all day long．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: These times sitting and uneasy, standing and unsteady, climbing and not fast, idle line and sleepy, the town day price of love and sleepy.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: During these times, I feel restless when sitting, unsteady when standing, uncomfortable when I climb up, sleepy when walking around, and feel sleepy due to the sun.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sitting feels uneasy, standing feels unstable, climbing offers no delight, strolling brings fatigue, and all day long one's thoughts are drowsy and lethargic.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我不喜欢坐着，也不喜欢站着；没有什么美景能给我带来快乐；闲暇散步时我感到疲惫；迷失在强烈的爱情中，我整天昏昏欲睡。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我不喜欢一侧坐着，也不喜欢另一侧站着。没有远景可以给我带来快乐；闲走时我很疲倦。迷失在如此强烈的爱中，我整天昏昏欲睡。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我不喜欢坐着，也不喜欢站着。没有景色能让我感到愉悦；悠闲地走路让我感到厌倦。沉浸在如此深切的爱中，我整天昏昏欲睡。

text.ori_cn: 我依你搭伏定，鲛绡枕头儿上盹。
text.man_en: I can but on my pillow rest my headIn my embroidered bed．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm going to sleep on a pillow of raw silk.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I will lay down with you and take a nap on the silk pillow.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I lean on you, drowsing on the shark silk pillow.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我只能在我的绣床上枕着我的头休息．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我只能把头枕在我的绣花床上的枕头上。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我只能在枕头上安放头颅，在绣花床上安眠。

text.ori_cn: 我但出闺门，你是影儿似不离身。
text.man_en: When I go out of door, My maid won't leave me，shadowlike，no more．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When I go out of my house, you are a shadow that never seems to leave me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When I go out of my boudoir, you are like a shadow and never leave me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Once I step out of my boudoir, you follow like a shadow.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 当我出门时，我的女仆不会再离开我，像影子一样，再也不会了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当我走出家门时，我的女仆不会再离开我，像影子一样，不再。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当我出门时，我的女仆不会离开我，就像影子一样，再也不会了。

text.ori_cn: 这些时他恁般陧备人，小梅香服侍得勤，老夫人拘系得紧，不信俺女儿家折了气分。
text.man_en: Of late she's been so cautious as not to let me free，Ever in close attendance on me．My mother rules me with a strict control Lest I should play an indecent role．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: These times he is so unsettled to prepare people, Xiao Mei Xiang served diligently, the old lady detained tightly, do not believe that my daughter's family folded the gas points.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: During these times, he was very kind and prepared, Xiao Meixiang served diligently, and the old lady restrained her tightly. I don’t believe that my daughter’s family has lost its temper.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: During these times, he treats people in such a heartless manner. Xiao Meixiang serves diligently, the old lady keeps her tightly in check, yet she doesn't believe that a woman like me would lose her spirit.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 近来，她小心翼翼，不让我自由活动，总是紧紧地盯着我。 我的母亲严格地管教着我，生怕我扮演不雅的角色。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 最近她一直小心翼翼地不让我自由，一直密切关注着我。我妈妈严格控制着我，以免我扮演不雅的角色。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 近来她一直如此谨慎，不放我自由，时刻伴随着我。我母亲严格管束我，唯恐我做出不体面的举动。

text.ori_cn: 你知道我但见个客人，愠的早嗔，便见个亲人，厌的倒褪。
text.man_en: You know whene'er I see a stranger, I'm annoyed；Even relations l would fain avoid．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You know that when I see a guest, I will be angry, and when I see a relative, I will be disgusted.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You know that when I see a guest, I get angry early, but when I see a relative, I get tired of it.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You know me, I get annoyed and frown when I see a guest, but I frown and turn away in disgust when I see a relative.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你知道，每当我看到陌生人，我就会感到厌烦；即使是有关系的人，我也想避而远之。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你知道，当我看到陌生人时，我会很生气；即使是亲戚我也会避开。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 每当我见到陌生人，我就心烦；即便是亲戚，我也愿意避开。

text.ori_cn: 独见了那人，兜的便亲!我前夜诗依前韵，酬和他清新。
text.man_en: But on that day when I saw him appear, At once I felt he was my dear．So I composed a verse the other nightTo rhyme with his so bright．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I saw that man alone and kissed him! I have been writing a poem in the same rhyme as the one I wrote the night before, to reward him for his freshness.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When I saw that person alone, I kissed him! My poem on the eve of the night followed the previous rhyme and rewarded him with freshness.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I saw that person alone, instantly feeling a connection! The poem I wrote the night before, following the same rhyme scheme, was just as refreshing in response to his.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 那天，当我看到他出现在我面前时，我立刻觉得他就是我亲爱的人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 但那天晚上，当我看到他出现时，我立刻就觉得他是我亲爱的。所以那天晚上我写了一首诗，与他如此明亮的韵律。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 但是那天当我看到他出现，我立刻觉得他是我的亲人。于是我在前一晚写了一首诗，来与他的明亮相对应。

text.ori_cn: 不但字儿真，不但句儿匀，我两首新诗，便是一合回文。
text.man_en: Not only were the words so fine，But also natural was each line．Two poems read as one．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Not only are the words true, not only are the lines even, but my two new poems are a collection of refrains.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Not only are the words true and the sentences even, my two new poems are a palindrome.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Not only are the characters true, and not only are the sentences even, but my two new poems are also a palindrome together.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 不仅字字珠玑，而且句句自然。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 不仅词句优美，而且每一行也很自然。两首诗读起来就像一首诗。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 不仅词句如此精美，每一行也都如此自然。两首诗读起来像是一首。

text.ori_cn: 谁做针儿将线引，向东墙通个殷勤。
text.man_en: Oh，who would thread the needle and run 0ver the eastern wall to revealTo him what in my heart I feel?

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Who makes a needle to guide the thread towards the east wall?
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Who threads the needle to lead the thread, earnestly connecting to the eastern wall?

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 哦，谁会穿针引线，跑过东墙，向他透露我内心的感受？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 哦，谁能穿过针眼，翻过东墙，把我心中的感受告诉他?

text.ori_cn: 风流客，蕴藉人，相你脸儿清秀身儿韵，一定性儿温克情儿定，不由人不口儿作念心儿印。
text.man_en: He's gallant and benign，With handsome face and figure fine．He must be kind and constant in love．Can I not repeat his name and think of him alone?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The wind flow guest, the impeccable people, the face of your body rhyme, must be sexually warm grams of love, can not help people not mouth for the idea of the heart of the seal.

text.ori_cn2gpt_en: A charming guest, a cultured person, with your lovely face and graceful figure, surely you possess a gentle temperament and steady affection, leaving an indelible impression on one's mind and lips.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他英勇善良，面容俊美，身材魁梧。 他一定很善良，对爱情始终如一。 我可以不重复他的名字，只想着他吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他英俊善良，面容英俊，身材姣好。他一定是善良的，爱情不变。我能不重复他的名字，独自想起他吗？

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)我的孩儿，你知道么，如今孙飞虎领半万贼兵，围住寺门。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:Have you not heard，my dear child，that Sun Feihu has besieged the monastery with his five thousand men?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) My child, do you know, now Sun Feihu lead half a million thieves, surrounded the temple door.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) My child, do you know that now Sun Feihu has led half a million thieves to surround the temple gate.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Madam says) My child, do you know? Now Sun Feihu is leading five thousand soldiers to surround the temple gate.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：孩子，你没听说孙飞虎率领五千人马围攻寺院吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人道：孩子，你没听说孙飞虎率领五千人围困了寺院吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：亲爱的孩子，你难道没有听说孙飞虎带着他的五千人围攻了寺庙吗？

text.ori_cn: 我魂离壳，这祸灭身，袖梢儿韫不住啼痕。
text.man_en: My soul is gone，my body full of woe，My sleeves can't stop my tears which overflow．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: My soul is out of my shell, and I can't hide my tears from my sleeve.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My soul has left my shell, this disaster has destroyed my body, and I can't help but cry on the tips of my sleeves.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: My soul departs its shell, this calamity destroys the body, traces of tears can't be hidden within the sleeves.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的灵魂已逝去，我的身体充满哀伤，我的衣袖止不住我溢出的泪水。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的灵魂已逝，我的身体充满悲伤，我的袖子无法阻止我的泪水溢出。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的灵魂已逝，我的身体充满悲伤，我的衣袖无法阻止我溢出的泪水。

text.ori_cn: 一时去住无因，教我那埚儿人急偎亲。
text.man_en: I cannot stay，Nor go away．Where can we find a friend on whom we can depend?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: A moment to go and live without cause, teach me that crucible child people anxious to snuggle relatives.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is no reason to go and stay for a while, which makes me anxious to kiss the people in the pot.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With no reason to stay or leave for a moment, you force me to seek refuge and cling to my beloved.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我不能留下，也不能离开。 我们到哪里去找一个可以依靠的朋友呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我不能留下来，也不能走开。我们到哪里去寻找可以依靠的朋友呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我不能留下，也不能离开。我们在哪里能找到一个可以依靠的朋友？

text.ori_cn: 孤孀母子无投奔，赤紧的先亡了我的有福之人。耳边金鼓连天震，征云冉冉，土雨纷纷!
text.man_en: My widowed mother finds not one before；At such a crisis my blessed father is no more．I hear the drums resounding loud；The bandits raise a dust as high as the cloud．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Widow, mother and child have no place to turn to, the red tight first died my blessed one. The golden drums in my ears are shaking the sky, the levitating clouds are waning, and the earth is raining down!
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The orphaned widow, mother and son had no refuge, and my blessed man died naked first. The golden drums are ringing in my ears, the sky is shaking, the clouds are rising, and the rain is falling!
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The widow and her son have no one to turn to, as the one who could have ensured happiness for me is gone. The sound of war drums and gongs reverberates endlessly in my ears, as the clouds of war loom, and the rain of earth falls countless and chaotic!
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我寡居的母亲找不到前一个；在这样的危机时刻，我有福气的父亲不在了。 我听到鼓声响彻云霄；强盗扬起的尘土像云一样高。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 寡母前无寻，危难时父已不复。闻鼓声震耳，盗贼扬尘如云。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我那守寡的母亲找不到人；在这个危急关头，我敬爱的父亲已不在。我听到战鼓轰鸣；强盗们扬起的尘土高入云霄。

text.ori_cn: 风闻，胡云，道我眉黛青颦，莲脸生春，倾国倾城，西子太真。
text.man_en: It is reported the bandits sayI have black eyebrows with winning wayAnd a face full of such overwhelming charm As to disarmThose who behold，Like a peer of famous beauties of old
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Windy, Hu Yun, said my eyebrows green knit, lotus face spring, dumping the country to the city, Xizi too true.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: According to rumors, Hu Yun said that my eyebrows are dark and green, my lotus face is full of spring, I can conquer the country and the city, Xizi is so true.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: It is said, Hu Yun, that my brows gathered like clouds, my face blossomed like a lotus in spring, as beautiful as Xi Shi and Yang Guifei, captivating the nation with my beauty.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 据说匪徒们说我眉毛乌黑，举止得体，面容妩媚动人，让人一见倾心，宛若古时的绝代佳人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 据说土匪说我黑眉有胜道，脸庞充满了压倒性的魅力，看的人缴械，就像古代的名媛一样
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 据说土匪们说：我有一双黝黑的眉毛，气质迷人，脸上充满了压倒性的魅力，能使看到我的人丧失抵抗力，就像古代著名的美人一样。

text.ori_cn: 把三百僧人，他半万贼军，半霎儿便待剪草除根。
text.man_en: These bandits might do away with priests in mass Just as uprooted grass．

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: With three hundred monks and half a thousand thieves, they were ready to be cut and eradicated in a short time.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He planned to annihilate the five thousand bandits and three hundred monks in an instant.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 这些强盗可能会像连根拔起的小草一样，大规模地杀害牧师。

text.ori_cn: 那厮于家于国无忠信，恣情的掳掠人民。
text.man_en: How could I bear them to loot and rob their fill
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He has no loyalty to his family or his country, and he takes the people captive at will.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: That guy had no loyalty to his family or country, and ruthlessly plundered the people.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: That scoundrel is disloyal to both family and country, wantonly plundering the people.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我怎么忍心让他们去抢劫，让他们饱餐一顿
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我怎能忍心他们掠夺抢尽
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我怎么能忍受他们肆意抢劫掠夺呢

text.ori_cn: 他将这天宫般盖造焚烧尽，便做出诸葛孔明博望烧屯。
text.man_en: And burn the palacelike monastery at will?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He burned down this heavenly palace-like cover, and then he made Zhuge Kongming Bowang burnt Tun.
