text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He burned down this palace-like structure, replicating Zhuge Liang's burning of Bowang Camp.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 随意烧毁宫殿式修道院？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 还随意烧毁宫殿般的寺院？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 随意焚烧宫殿般的修道院？

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)孩儿想来，只是将我献与贼汉，庶可免一家性命。
text.man_en: Yingying says:I think all that can be done is to hand me over to the bandit so that the lives of our family can be saved．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) I thought that I would offer myself to the thief, so that I could save my family's lives.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying clouds) I want to come here, but if I offer myself to the traitor, I can spare the lives of my whole family.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Yingying says) I think that if I sacrifice myself to the bandit, it might save the lives of my entire family.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺说：我想能做的就是把我交给土匪，这样我们一家人的性命就能保住了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：我想唯一能做的就是把我交给强盗，这样我们一家人的性命就可以保住了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莺莺说：我认为唯一能做的就是把我交给土匪，这样我们全家的生命才能得救。

text.ori_cn: 第一来，免摧残老太君；第二来，免堂殿作灰尘；第三来，诸僧无事得安存；第四来，先公的灵柩稳；第五来，欢郎虽是未成人，算崔家后代儿孙。
text.man_en: Firstly，dear mother, your safety may be ensured；Secondly，the temple from fire may be secured；Thirdly, the priests may pray without alarm；Fourthly，my father's coffin protected from harm；Fifthly, Merry Boy, although young，will be A scion of our family．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The first is to avoid destroying the old lady; the second is to avoid making dust in the hall; the third is to ensure that the monks have nothing to worry about; the fourth is to ensure that the coffin of the late father is stable; and the fifth is to ensure that the Huanlang, though not yet an adult, will be considered as a descendant of the Cui family.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The first one is to avoid destroying the old lady; the second one is to avoid the hall becoming dust; the third one is that all the monks can live in peace; the fourth one is that the ancestor’s coffin is safe; the fifth one is that although Mr. Huan is Those who are underage are considered the descendants of the Cui family.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First, to spare Old Lady from suffering; second, to prevent the hall from turning to dust; third, so that the monks may live in peace; fourth, to ensure the stability of the ancestor’s coffin; fifth, although the young man has not yet come of age, he is considered a descendant of the Cui family.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 第一，亲爱的母亲，您的安全可以得到保障；第二，庙宇可以免遭火灾；第三，祭司可以安心祈祷；第四，我父亲的灵柩不会受到伤害；第五，Merry Boy 虽然年幼，但将成为我们家族的子孙。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 第一，亲爱的母亲，您的安全可以得到保证；第二，寺庙可以免遭火灾；第三，祭司可以安心祈祷；第四，我父亲的棺材不会受到伤害；第五，快乐的男孩，虽然年轻，但会成为一个我们家的后裔．
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 首先，亲爱的母亲，您的安全可以得到保障；其次，神庙可以确保免受火灾；第三，僧侣们可以无惊无险地祈祷；第四，我父亲的棺材可以免遭损害；第五，即使年轻，快乐的男孩也会成为我们家族的后裔。

text.ori_cn: 若莺莺惜己身，不行从乱军，伽蓝火内焚，诸僧血污痕，先灵为细尘。
text.man_en: Should I not make this sacrificeAnd disobey the bandit steeped in vice，The temple with the coffin would be burned to ashesAnd the monks stained with bloody splashes．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If Ying Ying cherish their own bodies, not from the chaos of the army, Galan fire burning, all the monks blood stain marks, the first spirit for the fine dust.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If Yingying cherishes her own body and cannot join the rebellious army, she will be burned internally by the Jialan fire, the monks will be stained with blood, and the spirits of the ancestors will be reduced to fine dust.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If Oriole cherishes her own life and does not follow the chaotic army, in the blaze of the temple, monks' blood becomes stains, and the spirits of the departed turn to fine dust.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 倘若我不献祭，忤逆淫贼，棺庙将被焚为灰烬，僧侣将血溅当场。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果我不做出这样的牺牲，不服从这个罪恶深重的强盗，那座棺材的寺庙就会被烧成灰烬，僧侣们也会沾满血迹。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我若不做此牺牲，违背那满身罪恶的盗贼，就会使存放灵柩的庙宇化为灰烬，僧人们沾满血迹。

text.ori_cn: 俺一家儿不留龆龀。
text.man_en: NOt a child would be left to continue our race．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: My family will not leave the milk teeth.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is no room for quarrels in my family.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: There are no children left in my family.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 没有一个孩子会留下来继续我们的种族．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 没有一个孩子会留下来继续我们的比赛。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 不会有一个孩子能延续我们的种族。

text.ori_cn: 待从军，果然辱没家门。
text.man_en: Should I follow the rebel host．To our family it would be a disgrace．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When I joined the army, I really dishonoured my family.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Joining the army will indeed bring disgrace to the family.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Upon enlisting in the army, I have indeed brought disgrace to my family.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我是否应该追随叛乱的主人？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果我跟随叛军主人。对我们家族来说这将是一种耻辱。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我应该跟随叛军吗？对于我们的家庭来说，这将是一个耻辱。

text.ori_cn: 俺不如白练套头，寻个自尽，将尸榇献贼人，你们得远害全身。
text.man_en: The best for me to do is to give up the ghost So that you may present to the headOf the brigands my body dead．Thus you all may escape injuryAnd save our family．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I might as well train my head, find a way to kill myself, and offer my corpse to the thieves, so that you can harm the whole body.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It's better for me to practice tying for nothing, commit suicide, and offer my body to the thieves, and you will be harmed all over the body.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I might as well practice strangling myself and find a way to kill myself, then present my corpse to the enemy so that you all can escape danger and save yourselves.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 对我来说，最好的办法就是放弃鬼魂，这样你们就可以把我的尸体交给强盗头子，这样你们就可以躲过一劫，拯救我们的家庭。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 对我来说，最好的办法就是放弃鬼魂，这样你们就可以将我的尸体献给强盗首领，这样你们就可以免受伤害并拯救我们的家人。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 最好的选择就是让我放弃生命，这样你们可以将我的尸体呈现给劫匪首领。如此一来，你们都可以避免受伤并拯救我们的家庭。

text.ori_cn: (本云)咱每同到法堂上，问两廊下僧俗，有高见的，一同商议个长策。
text.man_en: Faben says: Let us go to the preaching hall and inquire of the monks and laymen in the two corridors if they have any suggestions to offer so that we can make a workable plan．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Benyun) Let's go to the Dharma Hall together and ask the monks and laymen under the two corridors if they have any high opinions to discuss a long strategy together.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Original version:) Whenever we go to the Dharma Hall together, we will ask the monks and laypeople in the corridors if they have any opinions, and we will discuss a long-term strategy together.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Every time we come to the Dharma hall, I ask the monks and laypeople from both corridors whether they have any insightful opinions, so we can discuss and formulate a long-term strategy together.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本说：让我们去布道堂，向两条走廊上的僧侣和俗家弟子询问他们是否有任何建议，以便我们制定出可行的计划。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本说：我们去讲经堂，问问两廊里的僧俗们有没有什么建议，以便我们制定一个可行的计划。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本说：我们去讲经堂，问问两边走廊里的僧侣和居士是否有什么建议，这样我们才可以制定一个可行的计划。

text.ori_cn: 你母亲有一句话，本不舍得你，却是出于无奈。
text.man_en: I have something to say to you：Not that I can bear to be separated from you，but that I know no way out．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Your mother had a saying that would not have spared you, but out of necessity.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Your mother has a saying: She doesn't want to let you go, but it's out of helplessness.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Your mother has a saying: she didn't want to let you go, but she had no other choice.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我有话要对你说：不是我不忍心与你分离，而是我无路可走。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我有话要对你说：不是我不能忍受与你分离，而是我无路可走。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我有话对你说：不是我能忍受与你分离，而是我无路可走。

text.ori_cn: 如今两廊下众人，不问僧俗，但能退得贼兵的，你母亲做主，倒陪房奁，便欲把你送与为妻。
text.man_en: If any one in the corridors，priest or layman，is able to induce the bandits to withdraw, I will present you to him as his wife and give him a handsome dowry．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Now the people under the two corridors, not to ask the monks and laymen, but can retreat from the thieves, your mother made the decision, and accompanied the trousseau, then want to send you to be his wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Now there are people in the two corridors, regardless of monks or laymen, but if you can defeat the rebels, your mother has made the decision and will accompany you as a dowry, so she wants to give you as your wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Now, in both corridors, it doesn't matter if one is a monk or a layperson. As long as one can repel the bandits, your mother has decided that she will provide a dowry and give you in marriage to them.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果走廊里有谁，无论是牧师还是普通人，能让强盗们撤走，我就把你送给他做妻子，并给他丰厚的嫁妆。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果走廊里的任何人，无论是牧师还是俗人，能够劝退强盗，我就把你嫁给他为妻，并给他一份丰厚的嫁妆。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 如果走廊中的任何人，无论是神父还是俗人，能够说服劫匪撤退，我将把你嫁给他，并给他一笔可观的嫁妆。

text.ori_cn: 虽不门当户对，还强如陷于贼人。
text.man_en: Though a lopsided alliance，such a match would be better than falling into the hands of the brigand．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Though it is not a good match, it is still as strong as being trapped in the hands of thieves.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Even though they are not a good match, it is still better than being trapped by a thief.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Though not an equal match in status, it's far better than falling into the hands of bandits.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 虽然是一边倒的联盟，但这样的比赛总比落入强盗之手要好。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 虽然是一边倒的联盟，但这样的搭配总比落入强盗手中强。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 尽管是个不平等的联盟，这样的结合总比落入土匪之手要好。

text.ori_cn: (夫人哭云)长老，便在法堂上，将此言与我高叫者。我的孩儿，只是苦了你也。
text.man_en: (Weeping) Abbot，please proclaim my proposal in the preaching hall．My dear child，it is you who will suffer．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady weeping) Elder, in the Hall of Law, will say this to me. My child, it's just that you are suffering.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The lady cried) Elder, you shouted this to me in the Dharma Hall. My child, I am just suffering from you.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Lady cries) Elder, please, in the Dharma hall, proclaim these words loudly for me. My child, it is you who have suffered.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: (我亲爱的孩子，受苦的将是你。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: （哭泣）方丈，请在讲堂宣讲我的建议。我亲爱的孩子，受苦的将是你。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: （哭泣）方丈，请在讲经堂宣布我的提议。亲爱的孩子，是你将会受苦。

text.ori_cn: (本云)此计较可。
text.man_en: Faben says:．This is a better proposal．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Benjamin) That's a good idea.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (This cloud) This calculation is OK.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Ben Yun) This calculation is feasible.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本说：． 这是一个更好的建议．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本说：．这是一个更好的提议．
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本说：这是一个更好的提议。

text.ori_cn: 母亲你都为了莺莺身分，你对人一言难尽，你更莫惜莺莺这一身，不拣何人，建立功勋，杀退贼军，扫荡烟尘，倒陪家门，愿与英雄结婚姻，为秦晋。
text.man_en: You think of none but me，my mother dear；What you have said is not for other ears to hear．But be not anxious for poor me!It matters little who it be．So long as he can displayHis bravery to drive the bandits away，With handsome dowry l would be his wife To the end of my life．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Mother you are all for Yingying identity, you have a word for people, you more than cherish Yingying this body, do not choose who, to establish merit, kill off the thieves, sweep away the smoke and dust, down with the family, willing to marry with the heroes, for the Qin Jin.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Mother, you are all for the identity of Yingying, you can't say enough to others, and you cherish Yingying even more. You do not choose anyone, build meritorious deeds, kill the bandit army, sweep away the smoke and dust, stay with the family, and are willing to marry a hero, for the Qin and Jin Dynasties.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Mother, for the sake of Yingying's reputation, you've faced countless difficulties. You shouldn't care what others think, but instead have someone of great merit and achievements, who has driven away the bandits and cleared the smoke of war, join our family. We hope to forge a matrimonial alliance with a hero, akin to the unity of Qin and Jin.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你只想着我，我亲爱的母亲；你说的话别人听不见，但不要为可怜的我着急！是谁并不重要，只要他能表现出他的勇敢，把强盗赶走，只要有丰厚的嫁妆，我愿意做他的妻子，直到生命的尽头。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你只想到我，我亲爱的母亲；你所说的话不是给别人听的。不过别为可怜的我担心！是谁并不重要。只要他能表现出他的勇敢，赶走土匪，有了丰厚的嫁妆，我将成为他的妻子，直到我生命的尽头。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 亲爱的母亲，您只为我操心；您所说的话，不该被其他人听见。但请不要为我担忧！他是谁并不重要。只要他能赶走土匪，展示勇气，我愿意以丰厚的嫁妆成为他的妻子，终身相伴。

text.ori_cn: (本云)禀夫人，这秀才便是前十五日附斋的敝亲。
text.man_en: Faben says: I beg to tell you，Madame，this scholar is my relative who joined in the religious ceremony on the fifteenth of the month．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Benyun) Madam, this Xiucai is my relative who attached the fast on the 15th day before last.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Original:) Madam, this scholar is my relative who stayed in the fasting room fifteen days ago.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Your servant) reports to madam: This scholar is our respected relative who stayed at the study fifteen days ago.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本说：我要告诉你，夫人，这位学者是我的亲戚，他在本月 15 日参加了宗教仪式。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本说：夫人，我想告诉您，这位学者是我的亲戚，他参加了十五号的宗教仪式。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本说道：夫人，请允许我告诉您，这位学者是我的亲戚，他在这个月的十五号参加了宗教仪式。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)禀夫人，重赏之下，必有勇夫，赏罚若明，其计必成。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says, 'I beg to say, Madame，large reward will secure brave men．Since a handsome reward is offered，I think my plan will work．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun), madam, under the heavy reward, there will be a brave man, if the reward and punishment are clear, the plan will be successful.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) Madam, under a heavy reward, there must be a brave man. If the reward and punishment are clear, his plan will definitely come true.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) reports to the Madam, 'Under rich rewards, there will be brave men. When rewards and punishments are clear, the plan will surely succeed.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：'夫人，重赏之下必有勇夫嘛！既然有丰厚的奖赏，我想我的计划一定会成功的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师曰：“夫人，重赏必得勇者。既然重赏，我想我的计策可以成功。”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师说，“夫人，小人斗胆说一句，重赏之下必有勇夫。既然有重赏，我认为我的计划会奏效。”

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)恰才与长老说下，但有退得贼兵的，便将小女与他为妻。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:I have just told the abbot：1 will give my daughter as wife to anyone who can drive the bandits away．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) just said with the Elder, but there is a retreat from the thieves, will be the daughter with him as a wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) Chacai told the elders that if there was a rebel who retreated, he would make his daughter his wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Madam says) I just told the abbot that whoever can drive back the enemy troops will have my daughter as his wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：我刚跟方丈说了，谁能把山贼赶走，我就把女儿嫁给谁。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：我刚刚告诉住持：谁能赶走土匪，就把我的女儿嫁给他。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：我刚刚告诉了住持，我愿将女儿嫁给任何能驱赶盗贼的人。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)既是恁的，小生有计，先用着长老。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:If that is the case，I have a plan which，first of all，requires the assistance of the abbot．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) Since this is the case, I have a plan to use the Elder first.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) Since you are a traitor, if you have a plan for a niche, use the elders first.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) Since it's like this, I have a plan. Let's first utilize the elder.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张大师说：如果是这样，我有一个计划，首先需要方丈的协助。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师曰：既然如此，我有一个计划，首先需要方丈的协助。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师说: 如果是这样的话，我有一个计划，首先需要方丈的协助。

text.ori_cn: (本云)老僧不会厮杀，请先生别换一个。
text.man_en: Faben says:An old priest is no fighter．I must ask you，sir, to find someone else in my place．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Ben Yun) The old monk does not know how to kill, please don't change one, sir.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Original saying) The old monk doesn't know how to fight. Please, sir, don't change him.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (This old monk) does not know how to fight, please choose someone else.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 法本说："老牧师不是战士，我必须请求你，先生，找别人代替我。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 法本说：老牧师不是战士。先生，我必须请你找一个人来代替我。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 法本说：一个年迈的牧师不是战士。我必须请您，先生，找别人代替我。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)休慌，不要你厮杀。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:Be not afraid．I do not want you to fight．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) Don't panic, I don't want you to kill each other.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) Don't panic, I don't want you to fight.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) Don't panic, you don't need to fight.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：别怕． 我不想让你们打架．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师傅说：别害怕。我不想让你打架。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师说：不要怕。我不想让你们打架。

text.ori_cn: 你出去与贼头说，夫人钧命，小姐孝服在身，将军要做女婿呵，可按甲束兵，退一箭之地，等三日功德圆满，拜别相国灵柩，改换礼服，然后方好送与将军。
text.man_en: You just go out and tell the rebel chief the decision of Madame that her daughter in mourning cannot marry a general in arms．If he wishes the marriage，he must take off his armour, lay down his arms and withdraw as far as an arrow can shoot．He must wait as long as three days until the religious service is finished．After she bids farewell to her father's coffin and changes into her bridal robes，she will be escorted to him．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You go out and say to the head of the thieves, the lady's order, the lady's filial piety dress, the general wants to be a son-in-law, you can press the armour to bind the troops, retreat a arrow, and wait for three days to complete the work, to bid farewell to the coffin of the Sangguo, and to change the dress, and then to send to the general.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You go out and tell the leader of the bandits that Madam Jun is destined to be filial to you, and the general is going to be your son-in-law. You can put your troops in line with your armor and retreat to a stone's throw. After three days of merit, you can bid farewell to the Prime Minister's coffin, change into his formal attire, and then Good to send to the general.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You go out and tell the bandit leader that it's the lady’s command: the young miss is in mourning attire. If the general wishes to become her son-in-law, he should lay down his arms and retreat a bow-shot distance. After waiting for three days until the mourning period is complete and saying farewell to the chancellor’s coffin, she can change her attire and then be properly sent to the general.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你只要出去告诉叛军首领，夫人的决定是，她服丧的女儿不能嫁给征战沙场的将军、他必须等待三天，直到宗教仪式结束。 她告别父亲的棺材，换上新娘的袍子后，她将被护送到他身边。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你出去告诉叛军首领夫人的决定，她的哀女不能嫁给武装将军。如果他愿意结婚，他必须脱下盔甲，放下武器，箭能退到多远。他必须等待长达三天的时间才能完成宗教仪式。在她告别父亲的棺材并换上新娘礼服后，她将被护送到他身边。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你只需出去告诉叛军首领，夫人的决议是她在守孝期间的女儿不能嫁给持械的将军。如果他愿意成婚，他必须脱下铠甲，放下武器，退至一箭之地。他必须等三天，直到宗教仪式结束。等她告别父亲的灵柩并换上新娘礼服后，她将被送给他。

text.ori_cn: 不争便送来呵，一来孝服在身，二来于军不利。你去说来。
text.man_en: If she should be escorted at once，it would be unlucky for his army because she is still in mourning．Go and tell him as above．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If you don't fight, then send me, firstly, the mourning clothes are in your body, and secondly, it's not good for the army. You go and tell me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Just send it without arguing. On the one hand, you will be filial to me, and on the other hand, it will be disadvantageous to the army. Go ahead and say it.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I shouldn't go and argue. First, I am in mourning. Second, it's detrimental to the army. Go and tell them this.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果马上护送她，那对他的军队就不吉利了，因为她还在服丧。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果立即护送她，对他的军队来说将是不吉利的，因为她还在服丧。你去告诉他如上所述。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 如果她一时被护送，那对他的军队将是不吉利的，因为她还在守丧。按照上述去告诉他。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)小生有一故人，姓杜，名确，号为白马将军，见统十万大军，镇守蒲关。小生与他八拜至交，我修书去，必来救我。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:I have a friend whose name is Du Que and whose title is General on the White Horse．He is now in command of an army of a hundred thousand men，guarding the Pu Pass．He and I are sworn brothers．If I write a letter to him，he is sure to come to my rescue．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) I have an old friend, surnamed Du, the name is indeed, the name of the White Horse General, see 100,000 troops, the town of Puguan. I've been friends with him for eight years, so I'll send a letter to him and he'll come to save me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) Xiaosheng has an old friend, his surname is Du, his given name is correct, and his title is General Baima. He commanded an army of 100,000 and guarded Puguan. Xiaosheng has been a close friend of him for eight times. When I go to study books, he will come to save me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) I have an old friend, surnamed Du, first name Que, known as General White Horse. He commands an army of a hundred thousand soldiers, guarding the Puguan Pass. We are sworn brothers. If I send him a letter, he will certainly come to my rescue.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张大人说：我有一个朋友，名叫杜阙，官拜白马将军，现在统领十万大军，镇守蒲关，我和他是结拜兄弟，如果我给他写一封信，他一定会来救我的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师曰：吾有友人，名杜却，号白马将军，现统领十万大军，镇守濮关。我与他结拜兄弟。我写信给他，他一定会来救我的。

text.ori_cn: (本云)禀夫人，若果得白马将军肯来时，何虑有一百孙飞虎，夫人请放心者。

Brother, wrap the remaining meat and dip it in green salt.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Your luxurious soup and wide noodles mixed with grains, the sour yellow pickle and stinky tofu have a truly bland taste. My ten thousand pounds of black flour seem hidden, while I make a meal of buns for five thousand people. Please don't delay me, brother, don't delay me, brother, pack the leftover meat and dip it in green salt.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你的汤那么稀，面那么稠，还掺了面粉，真叫人反胃。 你的韭菜黄，腐乳臭，无味又可笑！如果他们的肉有一点不好吃，我就撒上盐，把它保存好．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你的汤那么稀，面条那么厚，掺着面粉，胃不舒服。你的黄韭菜，臭豆腐，无味又荒唐。万斤饺子很好吃，拿这五千土匪当肉末。别威慑我！不要阻止我！如果他们的肉没有吃完，我会撒上盐并妥善保存。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你的汤这么稀——面又很硬——和面粉掺合在一起——会让我胃里不舒服。你的黄韭菜和味很重的豆腐——没有味道，而且很荒谬。万斤饺子很好吃，里面有五千土匪的肉馅。不要阻止我! 不要阻止我! 如果有任何他们的肉没吃完，我会撒上盐，把它好好保存。

text.ori_cn: 我经怕谈，禅懒参，戒刀新蘸，无半星儿土渍尘淹。
text.man_en: I will not read my sacred booksNor meditate in my religious nooks．My newly polished sword remains without rust stains
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I am afraid to talk about the scriptures, I am lazy in Zen, I have dipped my precepts into the new knife, and I am not drowning in dirt and dust.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I've been afraid of talking, I've been too lazy to meditate, my sword has been freshly dipped, and not a single star is stained with dirt or dust.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I seldom discuss, rarely seek enlightenment, and avoid using a freshly dipped knife, ensuring it remains free from even the smallest stain.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我不会阅读我的圣书，也不会在我的宗教角落里冥想。 我新擦亮的宝剑依然没有锈迹
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我不会阅读我的神圣书籍，也不会在我的宗教角落冥想。我新擦亮的剑仍然没有锈迹
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我不会读我的圣书，也不会在我的宗教角落冥想。我的新磨剑依旧没有染上锈迹。

text.ori_cn: 别的女不女，男不男，大白昼把僧房门胡掩，那里管焚烧了七宝伽蓝。
text.man_en: When other priests look like laymen Shut up by daylight in their den，They care not if the entire Monastery is on fire．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Other women are not women, men are not men, daytime to the monk door Hu cover, there pipe burned the seven treasures of the gamut.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The other women are not women, and the men are not men. They keep the door of the monk's room closed in broad daylight, and the seven treasures and blues are burned there.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Regardless of men or women, in broad daylight, they carelessly cover the doors of the monastery, paying no heed to the burning of the precious seven-treasure pagoda.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 当其他牧师像俗人一样在被窝里闭目养神时，即使整个修道院失火，他们也毫不在意。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当其他牧师看起来像外行人在白天被关在他们的书房里时，他们不在乎整个修道院是否着火。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当其他僧侣像平民一样白天呆在他们的窝里时，即使整个修道院着火了，他们也不会在意。

text.ori_cn: 着几个小沙弥，把幢幡宝盖擎，病行者，将面杖火叉担。
text.man_en: Send with me some young monks with banners and parasolsAnd weakling acolytes with rolling pins and poles．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: There are several small sanyas, put the banner treasure cover, the sick walker, will face the staff fire fork burden.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: A few young novice monks held up banners and flags, and those who were sick carried rolling sticks and fire poles on their shoulders.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Several young monks are holding ceremonial banners and treasure canopies, while the sick travelers carry staffs and fire forks.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 给我派一些带着旗帜和阳伞的年轻僧侣，以及带着擀面杖和竹竿的弱小信徒。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 派一些年轻的僧侣带着旗帜和阳伞和弱小的弟子带着擀面杖和棍子跟我一起去。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 带上几名带着旗帜和伞盖的小和尚，以及一些拿着擀面杖和杆子的弱小侍僧。

text.ori_cn: 你自立定脚把众僧安，我撞钉子将贼兵探。
text.man_en: If you are firm to calm down the whole community, I'11 boldly go to meet the enemy
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You set your feet and put the monks at ease, but I'll hit the nails and probe the thieves and soldiers.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You stand on your own feet and put the monks in peace, while I hit the nail and detect the thieves.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You stand firm to stabilize the monks, while I probe the enemy troops by taking risks.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果你能坚定地镇住整个社区，我就大胆地去迎敌
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果你坚定地镇定整个社会，我'11就大胆去迎敌
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 如果你坚定要安抚整个社区，我将大胆地去迎战敌人。

text.ori_cn: (惠云)他敢不放我过去? 你宽心。
text.man_en: Huiming says:Don't worry if they don't let me pass!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hui Yun) How dare he not let me pass? Don't worry.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hui Yun) He dares not to let me pass? Don't worry.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Huiyun: Does he dare not let me pass? Rest assured.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 慧明说：如果他们不让我过去，不用担心！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 慧明说：别担心他们不让我过去！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 慧明说：如果他们不让我通过，不要担心！

text.ori_cn: 我瞅一瞅，古都都翻海波，喊一喊，厮琅琅振山岩。
text.man_en: He sings to the tune of A Second Stanza：My angry glance would make the billows leap andbound；With my thundering voice the mountains would resound．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When I look at it, the ancient capital turns over the waves of the sea, and when I shout, I hear it shake the mountain rocks.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I took a look and saw that the ancient capital was rolling over the sea waves. When I shouted, the mountains and rocks were shaking.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I glance around, ancient cities churn like waves; I shout aloud, resounding clangs shake the mountain cliffs.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他用《第二节》的曲调唱道：我愤怒的目光会使波涛跳跃和束缚；我雷鸣般的声音会使群山响彻。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他唱着第二节的曲调：我的愤怒的目光将激起波涛跳跃；我的雷鸣般的声音将响彻群山。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他唱起《第二节》的曲子：我愤怒的目光能使波涛跳跃；我的雷鸣般的声音让山岳回响。

text.ori_cn: 脚踏得赤力力地轴摇，手攀得忽刺剌天关撼。
text.man_en: I stamp my feet and there would come an earthquake；I raise my arms and Heaven's gates would shake．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The foot is so strong that it shakes the earth's axis, and the hand climbs up to shake the heavenly barrier.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The feet are so powerful that the earth is shaking, and the hands are climbing so hard that the sky is shaking.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Feet firmly press the axle with a ceaseless force, hands grasp and shake the heavenly gate with abrupt intensity.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我跺一跺脚，地震就会发生；我举一举手，天门就会震动。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我跺脚，地震就会来临；我举起双臂，天堂之门就会震动。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我跺脚，大地震动；我举起双臂，天堂之门也会摇晃。

text.ori_cn: 我从来斩钉截铁常居一，不学那惹草拈花没掂三，就死也无憾。
text.man_en: I've ever been decisive and determined．Unlike the thoughtless straw in the wind．Even to death I'm not afraid to go．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have never been determined to always live in one, do not learn that the grass and flowers did not weigh three, then die with no regrets.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I have always been categorical and always stayed on the same side. If I don’t follow the example of those who mess with things and pick flowers without considering the three, I will die without regrets.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I have always been resolute and steadfast, never one to flirt around or think twice. I would have no regrets, even in death.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我从来都是果断而坚定的．不像风中不经意的稻草． 即使是死，我也不怕．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我一向果断、坚定。不像风中那根没有思想的稻草。即使死我也不怕走。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我一向果断坚定，不像随风飘荡的无谓稻草，即使面对死亡我也无所畏惧。

text.ori_cn: 便提刀仗剑，谁勒马停骖。
text.man_en: With sword in hand, Would I stay my horse before the foe?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Whoever has a sword, whoever has a horse, whoever has a horse, whoever has a horse.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He raised his sword and held it, but whoever reined in his horse stopped.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With swords and sabers in hand, who would rein in their steeds and halt their chariots?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 手持利剑，我还能在敌人面前停下我的战马吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 剑在手，我会在敌人面前留马吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 手持宝剑，岂肯在敌人面前停下马步？

text.ori_cn: 我从来欺硬怕软，吃苦辞甘，我休只因亲事胡扑掩。
text.man_en: I'd help the weak；the strong I'd beat．Preferring the bitter to the sweet．Don't worry about me more than your wouldbe wife．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I've never been a bully, I've never been afraid of softness, I've never suffered or resigned, and I've never done so just because of my marriage.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I have always bullied the strong and feared the weak, and I have endured hardships and refused to accept the hardships. I will not hide it just because of my marriage.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I have never feared the strong but bullied the weak, I endure hardships and decline sweetness, and I won't compromise on matters of principle just for personal reasons.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我会帮助弱者；我会打败强者；宁愿吃苦也不愿吃甜。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我会帮助弱者；强者我会打败。宁可苦也不要甜。别担心我胜过担心你未来的妻子。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 助弱者，击强者。宁苦味，不甜味。毋须为我操心，胜似你的未来妻子。

text.ori_cn: 若杜将军不把干戈退，你张解元也干将风月担。
text.man_en: If no armed troops of WhiteHorsed General came．It is not I but your letter that is to blame．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If General Du does not retreat from the war, you, Zhang Xieyuan, will also be responsible for the wind and moon.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If General Du doesn't withdraw from the war, you, Zhang Jieyuan, will also take the blame.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If General Du does not put down his arms, Master Zhang will take on the world with grace and elegance.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果白马将军的军队不来，那就不是我的错，而是你的信的错了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果没有白马将军的武装部队到来。这不是我的错，而是你的信的错。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 假如不是白马将军的武装部队来了。那就是你的信的错，而不是我的错。

text.ori_cn: 便是言辞赚，一时纰缪，半世羞惭。
text.man_en: Fair words alone could not persuade，And a mistake once madeWould cause you shame for the rest of your life．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It is the words that earn, a moment's mistake, half a lifetime of shame.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It means making money with words, being wrong for a moment, and being ashamed for half a lifetime.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: A moment's slip in speech can lead to a lifetime of regret and shame.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 仅凭美言是无法说服人的，而一旦犯了错，就会让你羞愧终生。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 光有花言巧语是说服不了的，一旦犯错就会让你一生蒙羞。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 光靠甜言蜜语无法说服，错误一旦犯下，会让你一生感到羞愧。

text.ori_cn: 你助威神，擂三通鼓，仗佛力，呐一声喊，绣幡开，遥见英雄俺。
text.man_en: You beat the drum three times to stir my spirit high，And blessed by Buddha，I'11 utter a loud war cry．Behold from far a hero' mid their flags appear
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You help the God of Wisdom, beat the three drums, rely on the power of Buddha, na a shout, embroidered streamers open, see the hero me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You support the gods, beat the three-tone drum, rely on the power of Buddha, shout, open the embroidered flags, and see me, the hero, in the distance.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You rally the gods, beat the drum thrice, relying on Buddha's power, shout aloud, the embroidered banner unfurls, and from afar, you see the hero me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你击鼓三声，激起我的斗志，在佛祖的庇佑下，我发出一声响亮的战吼。 远方来了英雄，他们的旗帜出现在我的面前。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你击鼓三声，振奋我的精神，得到佛陀的加持，我发出一声响亮的战吼。远远看去，英雄的旗帜出现在他们中间。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你击鼓三次鼓舞了我的精神，而在佛祖的保佑下，我会发出响亮的战吼。远望之下，英雄在他们的旗帜中出现。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)老夫人吩咐小姐放心，此书一到，雄兵即来。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:Madame，you may tell Miss Oriole not to worry．Assoon as my letter is received，the army will come at once．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) The old lady instructed Miss to rest assured that once this book arrives, the male soldiers will come.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) The old lady told the young lady to rest assured that as soon as this book arrives, the heroes will come.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The old madam instructed Miss Zhang Shengyun to rest assured that once this book arrives, the mighty troops will follow.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：夫人，你可以告诉黄鹂小姐不要担心，我的信一收到，军队马上就会来。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师曰：夫人，请吩咐黄鹂姑娘不要着急。我的信一收到，军队就来了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张将军说：夫人，您可以告诉黄莺小姐不要担心。一旦我的信被收到，军队就会立刻赶来。

text.ori_cn: 鲤鱼连夜飞驰去，白马从天降下来。
text.man_en: If through the night my letter flies，The White Horse would come from the skies．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The carp sped off in the night, and the white horse descended from the sky.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The carps galloped away through the night, and the white horses descended from the sky.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The carp sped away through the night, while the white horse descended from the heavens.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果我的信飞过黑夜，白马就会从天而降。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果我的信一夜之间飞来，白马就会从天而降。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 假如信件能在夜里飞翔，白马将从天而降。

text.ori_cn: (杜将军引卒子上，云)自家姓杜，名确，字君实，本贯西洛人也，幼与张君瑞同学儒业，后弃文就武。
text.man_en: General Du enters with his soldiers and says:I am Du Que，styled Junshi，born west of Luoyang．While young, I studied Confucian classics together with Zhang Junrui．Then I gave up the pen for the sword and came out first in the military examinations
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (General Du led the pawn on, Yun) my family name Du, name indeed, word Junshi, this Guan Xiluo people, young and Zhang Junrui students Confucianism, and then abandoned the literature to the military.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (General Du introduces his pawns, it goes:) His family name is Du, his given name is correct, and his courtesy name is Junshi. He is a native of Xiluo. He studied Confucianism with Zhang Junrui when he was young, and later abandoned literature to pursue martial arts.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (General Du leads the soldiers and says) My family name is Du, my given name is Que, and my courtesy name is Junshi. I am originally from Xiluo. In my youth, I studied Confucianism together with Zhang Junrui, but later I abandoned the literary for the military arts.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 杜将军带着士兵走进来，说道：我叫杜阙，字君实，出生于洛阳城西。 年少时与张君瑞一起学习儒家经典，后来弃笔从戎，考取了第一名。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 杜将军率兵入曰：吾名杜却，号君实，洛阳西人。少时与张君睿共同研习儒家经典，遂弃笔换剑，名列军中第一。考试
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 杜将军带着他的士兵进来，说：我是杜确，字君实，生于洛阳以西。我年轻时与张君瑞一起学习儒家经典。后来我弃文从武，在军事考试中名列前茅。

text.ori_cn: 武状元及第，官拜征西大将军，正授管军元帅，统领十万之众，镇守蒲关。
text.man_en: I was appointed General of the Western Front，commanding a hundred thousand men stationed at the Pass of Pu．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Wushu yuan and the first, the official appointment of the General of the West, is authorized to control the army marshal, commanding 100,000 people, defending the Puguan Pass.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: After attaining the rank of Wu Zhuangyuan, he was officially worshiped as the General of the Western Expedition, and was awarded the title of Marshal in charge of the army. He commanded a hundred thousand people and guarded Puguan.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Upon earning the title of martial champion, he was appointed as the General of the Western Expedition and formally granted the position of Commander-in-Chief, leading an army of 100,000 troops to garrison at Puguan.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我被任命为西线将军，统帅十万大军驻扎在普鲁山口。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我被任命为西线将军，指挥十万军队驻扎濮关。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我被任命为西部前线的将军，指挥驻扎在蒲关的十万大军。

text.ori_cn: 有人自河中府来，探知君瑞兄弟在普救寺中，不来看我，不知甚意。
text.man_en: A man coming from the MidRiver Prefecture told me my sworn brother Junrui is staying in Salvation Temple．Why does he not come to see me? I do not understand．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Someone from Hezhongfu learnt that the Junrui brothers were in Puzha Temple and did not come to see me, I don't know what the intention was.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Someone came from Hezhong Prefecture and found out that brother Junrui was in Pujiu Temple. He didn't come to see me. He didn't know what he meant.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Someone came from Hezhongfu and learned that Junrui and his brother are at Puyou Temple. They haven't come to see me, and I don't know why.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 一个从中江县来的人告诉我，我的结拜兄弟君瑞就住在救国寺． 他为什么不来见我？我不明白．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 一个来自中江府的人告诉我，我的结义兄弟君瑞住在救世寺，他为什么不来看我呢？我不明白。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 有一位从中河州来的人告诉我，说我的结拜兄弟俊瑞现在停留在救济寺。为什么他不来看我？我不明白。

text.ori_cn: 近日丁文雅失政，纵军劫掠人民，即当兴师剪而朝食，奈虚实未的，不敢造次。
text.man_en: Recently General DingWenya，instead of fulfilling his duty, has allowed his men to plunder the people and I must dispatch my troops to wipe them away．But as I do not yet know the whole truth，I cannot make a well considered decision．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Recently, Ding Wenya's failure to govern, the army looted the people, that is, when the division cut and Chaojiao food, Nai false reality is not yet, do not dare to make a move.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Recently, Ding Wenya lost power and set up an army to plunder the people. He immediately raised an army to cut off the troops and go to the imperial court for food.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Recently, Ding Wenya has failed in governance, allowing the army to plunder the people. Although immediate military action is warranted, due to uncertainties, we dare not act rashly.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 近来丁文雅将军不尽忠职守，纵容部下劫掠百姓，我必须派兵将他们一网打尽。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 最近丁文亚将军非但不履行职责，反而任由部下掠夺人民，我必须派兵消灭他们。但由于我还不了解全部真相，我无法做出深思熟虑的决定。

text.ori_cn: 前日所望无成，倒是一缄书，为了媒证。

text.ori_cn: 这生后生，怎免相思病。
text.man_en: Could such a youth as he be free from lovesickness?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: In this life and the life after, how can I avoid the sickness of lovesickness.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: How can we avoid lovesickness in this life and after this life?
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: In this life and the next, how can one escape the affliction of longing?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 像他这样的年轻人能不相思吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 像他这样的年轻人，还能没有相思之苦吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 像他这样的年轻人能不耳鬓厮磨吗？

text.ori_cn: 天生聪俊，打扮又素净，夜夜教他孤另。
text.man_en: Wise and welldressed，could he bear nightly loneliness?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Born smart and handsome, dressed and plain, night after night to teach him to be alone another.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He was born smart and handsome, and dressed plainly. He was taught to be alone every night.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Born with intelligence and good looks, and dressed simply, his nights are made lonely.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 睿智、衣冠楚楚，他能忍受夜晚的孤独吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 聪明又衣冠楚楚，他能耐得住夜晚的孤独吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 睿智而衣着考究的他，能忍受每晚的孤独吗？

text.ori_cn: 曾闻才子多情，若遇佳人薄幸，常要耽搁了人性命。
text.man_en: I've heard a genius' love despised by a beautyMay make him lose his life and forget his duty．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have heard that talented men are sentimental, and if they meet a beautiful woman who is not as lucky as they should be, they often have to delay people's lives.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It has been said that a talented man is passionate, but if he meets a beautiful woman and is unlucky, he will often delay his life.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: It is often heard that talented men are prone to deep affection, and when they encounter a beautiful but faithless woman, it often leads to the ruination of lives.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我听说一个天才的爱情被一个美人鄙视，可能会使他失去生命，忘记自己的职责．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我听说天才的爱情被美人所鄙视，可能会使他失去生命，忘记自己的职责。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我听说，一个天才的爱情若被美人唾弃，可能会使他丧失生命，忘记职责。

text.ori_cn: 他的信行，他的志诚，你今夜亲折证。
text.man_en: But you will have good proof tonightOf my young mistress' faith and true delightAnd her sincerity．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: His deeds of faith, his will and sincerity, you have witnessed this night.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: His faith and deeds, his sincerity, you can personally prove it tonight.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: His integrity and honesty, you have witnessed it firsthand tonight.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 但你今晚就能充分证明我的小情妇的信心和真正的喜悦，以及她的真诚。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 但今晚你将得到充分的证明，证明我年轻情妇的信念和真正的快乐以及她的真诚。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 但你今晚会有一个好证据，证明我年轻的主人翁的忠诚、真正的快乐和她的真诚。

text.ori_cn: 灯前交头，端详可憎，好煞人无干净。
text.man_en: When you cross her legs by lampside，You may contemplate your bewitching bride，And love your fillAt your sweet will．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The head is crossed in front of the lamp, and the detail is abominable, and the people are unclean.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Crossing hands in front of the lamp, looking at each other is abominable, it is so evil that people are not clean.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Whispering under the lamp, scrutinizing with an unbearable look, utterly devoid of any decency.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 当你在灯边翘起她的双腿，你可以凝视着你迷人的新娘，按照你甜蜜的意愿，尽情享受你的爱。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当你在灯边交叉双腿时，你可以凝视你迷人的新娘，并按照你甜蜜的意愿爱你如意。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当你在灯旁将她双腿交叉时，你可以凝视你那迷人的新娘，并尽情爱她，随你所愿。

text.ori_cn: 俺那边落花满地胭脂冷，一霎良辰美景。
text.man_en: The grounds there covered with rougered flowers，Don't miss the pretty scene and happy hours I
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: On my side, the fallen flowers are full of rouge and cold, a good moment of beauty.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Over there, the ground was covered with fallen flowers, and it was a beautiful sight for a brief moment.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The fallen flowers covered the ground over there, and the rouge turned cold, for a brief moment, a beautiful scene.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 这里的地面上开满了胭脂花，不要错过这美丽的景色和快乐的时光。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 那里的地面开满了胭脂花，不要错过美丽的景色和欢乐的时光我
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 那里遍地都是鲜艳的花朵，不要错过美丽的景色和快乐的时光！

text.ori_cn: 夫人遣妾莫消停，请先生切勿推称。
text.man_en: My mistress ordered me not to delay．Dear sir, don't fail to go at once，I pray．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Her Ladyship has sent her concubine to do nothing, so please don't push the title, sir.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Madam, don't stop sending concubines, sir, please don't push her.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Madam sent me to beseech you earnestly; please do not decline.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的女主人嘱咐我不要耽搁．亲爱的先生，请您务必马上动身．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的女主人命令我不要拖延。亲爱的先生，我祈祷不要不立即去。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 女主人命令我不要耽搁。亲爱的先生，我恳求您一定要马上去。

text.ori_cn: 正中是鸳鸯夜月销金帐，两行是孔雀春风软玉屏。
text.man_en: We have prepared a curtain embroidered aboveWith a round moon and below with birds of love，Two screens of jade adorned with peacocks standing at ease
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: In the centre is the Mandarin ducks night moon pin gold tent, and the two rows are the peacock spring breeze soft jade screen.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: In the middle is a gold tent with mandarin ducks selling gold at night, and two rows are soft jade screens with peacocks in the spring breeze.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: In the center is a golden canopy under the moonlight for a pair of mandarin ducks, flanked by soft jade screens depicting peacocks basking in the spring breeze.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们准备了上绣圆月、下绣鸳鸯的帷幕，两扇玉屏上装饰着悠然自得的孔雀。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我们准备了一帘，上绣圆月，下绣爱情鸟，两屏玉屏，孔雀翩翩而立。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我们准备了一块绣有圆月的窗帘，上面有一轮圆月，下面有爱情鸟；两个玉屏风上装饰着悠然自得的孔雀。

text.ori_cn: 下边是合欢令，一对对凤箫象板，雁瑟鸾笙。
text.man_en: Enjoying the vernal breeze；A music band consisting of phoenix flute，Ivory castanets and wild swan lute．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Next is the Order of Harmony, a pair of pairs of phoenix xiao and elephant boards, geese and luan sheng.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Below is the Hehuan Order, pairs of phoenix flutes and elephant boards, and wild goose, luan and sheng.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Below are the tokens of joyous reunion: pairs of phoenix flutes and elephant panels, the sounds of swans and phoenix pipes.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 享受春风；由凤笛、象牙蓖子和野天鹅琵琶组成的乐队。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 春风徐徐；凤笛、象牙响板、野天鹅琵琶组成的乐队。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 沐浴在春风中；凤凰笛、象牙响板和野天鹅琵琶组成的乐队.

text.ori_cn: 聘不见争，亲立便成，新婚燕尔天教定。
text.man_en: When no betrothal money is needed，The marriage will be all the more speeded．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The bridegroom does not have to fight for the marriage, but the marriage will be concluded, and the newlyweds will be taught by heaven.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There will be no fight over the appointment, it will be settled immediately after getting married, and the newlyweds will be settled by the Heavenly Teachings.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Without contest or dispute, the union is formed effortlessly, as heaven decrees the bliss of newlyweds.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 不需要订婚钱，婚姻就会更快。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当不需要聘金时，结婚的速度就会更快。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 不要彩礼婚姻快，没有拖拉事事顺。

text.ori_cn: 真篌幸，不费半丝红线，已就一世前程。
text.man_en: How lucky to be joined in nuptial bed Without the tying of a red silk thread!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm so glad that I don't have to spend half a thread of red thread, but I have a life ahead of me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Fortunately, you can have a bright future without spending even a single red thread.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: True happiness lies in not wasting an ounce of effort, but achieving a lifetime of success.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 不系红丝线，共结连理，何其有幸！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 不用系一根红丝线就可以一起入洞房，这是多么幸运啊！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 真是幸运，无需红线相牵便结为夫妻！

text.ori_cn: 想是灭寇功，举将能，你两般功效如红定。
text.man_en: The rebels being driven away, The General coming in array，I think your merits worth more than a red silk thread．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I think it's a good idea to exterminate the bandits and raise the generals, and your two effects are as effective as the Red Determination.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Think of it as the merit of destroying the bandits, and you will be able to do so, and your two effects will be like red fixation.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Desiring to annihilate the enemy and elevate the generals, your dual merits are as certain as the crimson.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 叛军被赶走，将军列阵来，我看你的功劳胜过一根红丝线。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 贼被驱走，将军来阵，我看你的功德胜过红丝。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 叛军被驱逐，阵列将军来，我认为你的功绩比红丝线更有价值。

text.ori_cn: 先是莺娘心下十分顺，总为君瑞胸中百万兵。
text.man_en: You have entirely won Miss Oriole's heart，And you're as strong as a million soldiers in your head．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: First, Yingniang's heart is very smooth, always for Junrui's chest of millions of soldiers.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: First of all, Ying Niang was very obedient and always had millions of soldiers in mind for Jun Rui.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First, Yingniang felt an immense sense of approval, always considering Junrui's strategy as equivalent to commanding a million soldiers in his heart.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你完全赢得了黄鹂小姐的芳心，而且你的脑袋里像有无数士兵一样坚强。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你已经完全赢得了黄鹂小姐的心，而且你的头脑就像百万士兵一样强大。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你彻底赢得了奥里奥尔小姐的心，而且你的头脑像百万士兵一样强大。

text.ori_cn: 自古文风盛，那见珠围翠绕，不出黄卷青灯。
text.man_en: Since olden days true talents take a leading part·Who has e'er seen a pearladorned maiden bright Not wed to one who studied by a dim lamplight?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Since ancient times, the literary style has been prevalent, that see the beads surrounded by green, not out of the yellow scrolls and green lamps.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Since ancient times, the literary style has been flourishing. There are pearls surrounded by greenery, but there are no yellow scrolls or green lanterns.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Since ancient times, literary styles have thrived, yet one seldom sees luxury and extravagance emerging from the scholarly pursuit under the dim light of books and lamps.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 自古英雄出少年--谁曾见过珠光宝气的少女不嫁给在昏暗灯光下学习的人呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 自古真才子当道·谁见过明珠少女不嫁给灯火阑珊的人？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 自古才子领风骚·谁见珠围翠绕之晓媛 不嫁寒窗苦读之书生？

text.ori_cn: 夫人只一家，先生无伴等，并无繁冗真幽静。
text.man_en: My mistress here has only her own family，And you，sir, have no other company·It will be quiet ceremony indeed．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The lady has only one family, the gentleman has no companion, etc., and there is no redundancy and seclusion.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The wife only has one family, and the husband has no companions to wait for. There is no complication and it is really quiet.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The lady has only one household, the gentleman has no companions, which makes it truly quiet and serene without any unnecessary complexity.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的女主人在这里只有自己的家人，而您，先生，没有其他同伴--这将是一个非常安静的仪式。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的情妇在这里只有她自己的家人，而您，先生，没有其他陪伴·这确实会是一个安静的仪式。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的女主人这里只有她自己家人，而您，先生，没有其他的陪伴。这将是一场非常安静的仪式。

text.ori_cn: 立等你有恩有义心中客，回避他无是无非廊下僧。
text.man_en: You are awaited with hearty welcome，so speed! We won't invite a priest who caresNot for worldly affairs．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The people of the world, such as you have grace and righteousness in your heart, avoiding his no-rights-no-wrongs porch monks.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Immediately wait for you to be kind and righteous, and avoiding him is nothing more than a monk in the corridor.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Stand by those who are kind and righteous, and avoid those who are indifferent and detached.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们热烈欢迎你们的到来，请尽快！我们不会邀请一个不关心世俗事务的牧师。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 热烈欢迎您的光临，速度快！我们不会邀请一位不关心世俗事务的牧师。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你受到了热情的欢迎，所以快点来吧！我们不会邀请那些不关心世俗事务的神父。

text.ori_cn: 夫人命，不须推托，即便同行。
text.man_en: So do not disobeyMy mistress．Come without delay!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If you are ordered by the lady, you do not have to excuse yourself, even if you are travelling with her.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is no need to shirk my wife's fate, even if I go with you.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Madam orders it, no need to refuse, let us go together at once.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 所以，不要违抗我的女主人！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 所以不要违抗我的女主人。快来吧！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 所以不要违抗我的主人，赶快来吧！

text.ori_cn: (张生云)既如此，红娘姐请先行一步，小生随后便来。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:If so, will you please go ahead，Miss Rose? I will follow at once．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) In that case, Sister Hongniang please go ahead, I will come later.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) In this case, please go ahead, Miss Matchmaker, and Xiaosheng will come later.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) In that case, dear Hongniang, please go ahead; I will follow shortly.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：如果是这样，请你先走，玫瑰小姐？我马上跟上。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师傅说：如果可以的话，请继续吧，罗丝小姐？我马上就跟上。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅说：如果是这样的话，罗斯小姐，请继续。我马上就跟上来。

text.ori_cn: 先生休作谦，夫人专意等。
text.man_en: Be not too modest，sir, I pray．My mistress waits for only you．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Sir, don't be so modest. Madam is waiting.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Don't be modest, sir, and wait patiently, madam.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sir, please refrain from being overly modest, and Madam, please remain attentive.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 请不要太谦虚，先生，我的女主人只等你一个人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 别太谦虚，先生，我祈祷。我的情妇只等你。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 先生，不要太谦虚，我恳求您。我的主人只在等您。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)红娘去了，小生拽上书院门者。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:Rose has gone．Let me close the door of the library．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) Hongniang has gone, and I dragged him up to the door of the academy.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) The matchmaker has gone, and the young man drags him to the academy gate.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) The matchmaking maid has left; young scholar pulls the academy's gate.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：玫瑰已经走了． 让我把书房的门关上吧．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师傅说：玫瑰走了。让我关上图书馆的门。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅说：玫瑰已经走了。让我关上图书馆的门。

text.ori_cn: 比及我到得夫人那里，夫人道：张生，你来了也，与俺莺莺做一对儿，饮两杯酒便去卧房内做亲。
text.man_en: When I arrive in the presence of Madame，she will say, “Here you are，Master Zhang．You and my Yingying will make a happy couple，so drink two cups of wine before you go to the bridal chamber．”
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When I got to the lady's place, the lady said: "Zhang Sheng, you have come, and I Yingying to be a couple, drink two glasses of wine, then go to the bedroom to do marriage".
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When I arrived at Mrs. De's place, she said: "Zhang Sheng, you are here. Make a couple with me, Yingying. After drinking two glasses of wine, we will go to the bedroom to have sex."
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: When I arrived at the lady's place, she said, 'Zhang Sheng, you have arrived. Pair up with Yingying, drink a couple of cups of wine, and then head to the bedroom to consummate the marriage.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 到了夫人跟前，夫人说："张大人，你来了，你和我的莺莺是一对欢喜冤家，喝两杯酒再入洞房吧。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当我到了夫人面前时，她会说：“张老爷子来了，你和我盈盈会是一对幸福的夫妻，所以先喝两杯酒，然后去洞房。”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当我面见夫人的时候，她会说：“你来了，张公子。你和我的莺莺会成为幸福的一对，所以在去洞房之前先喝两杯酒吧。”

text.ori_cn: 多亏了他，我改日空闲，索破十千贯足钱，央法本做好事超荐他。
text.man_en: I owe you so much．When I have leisure，I will not grudge spending ten thousand coins and asking Faben to perform a religious ceremony to save your soul．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Thanks to him, I'll be free some day, so I'll ask for 10,000 kanji, and ask Fa Ben to do a good job of recommending him.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Thanks to him, I had free time the next day and asked for more than ten thousand guan. He was highly recommended by the central government for his good deeds.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Thanks to him, I managed to free up some time; gathered the sufficient sum of ten thousand kan; entrusted Hōben to do good deeds on his behalf for his redemption.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我欠你的太多了，等我有闲暇的时候，我不会吝惜花一万个金币，请法本举行一场宗教仪式来拯救你的灵魂。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我欠你太多了。等我有空的时候，我会不惜花费一万金币，请法本为你举行一个宗教仪式来拯救你的灵魂。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我欠你太多了。等我闲下来时，我绝不吝惜花费万钱，邀请法本为你做一场法事，超度你的灵魂。

text.ori_cn: 惟愿龙天施法雨，暗酬虎将起朝云。
text.man_en: I wish the Dragon's rain would wash away his vice To help the Flying Tiger rise to paradise．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I wish that the dragon and the sky would give the rain of law, and secretly reward the tiger and the general for raising the clouds of the morning.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I only hope that the dragon and the sky will cast spells and rain, and the tiger will rise up in the dark clouds.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: May the dragon and heaven bestow rain through their spell, secretly rewarding the tiger general as morning clouds gather.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 但愿龙吟雨洗恶习，助飞虎上天堂。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 愿龙雨洗去恶习，助飞虎升天。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我希望龙的雨水能够洗去他的恶习，帮助飞虎升上天堂。

text.ori_cn: (红娘见夫人云)张生着红娘先行，随后便来也。
text.man_en: Rose enters, sees Madame Cui and says:Master Zhang told me to go ahead and he will follow at once．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang meets Madam Yun) Zhang Sheng told Hongniang to go ahead and come later.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The matchmaker says when she meets her wife) Zhang Sheng asked the matchmaker to go first and then come later.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The matchmaker speaks to the lady) Zhang Sheng asked the matchmaker to go ahead and he will follow shortly.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰进来，看到崔夫人，说：张老爷让我先走，他马上就来。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝进来，见了崔夫人，说道：张老爷吩咐我先走，他马上就跟来。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝走进来，看到崔夫人说道：张师傅让我先走，他很快就会跟上来。

text.ori_cn: 我一家之命皆先生所活。
text.man_en: Our survival is due to you．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The lives of my family are in your hands.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The lives of my family are all lived by my husband.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The lives of my entire family have been saved by you, sir.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们的生存多亏了你们．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我们的生存归功于你。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我们的生存归功于你。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)一人有庆，兆民赖之。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says:It is said that on the good fortune of one person may depend that of the millions．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) One person is blessed, and the people depend on him.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) One person is happy, and the people rely on it.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) Celebrates alone, but the entire populace benefits from it.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张大师说：所谓一人之福，千万人之福。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师云：俗话说，一个人的福气，可以影响千万人的福祉。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师说：据说一个人的好运气可能关系到数百万人的命运。

text.ori_cn: 此贼之败，皆夫人之福。
text.man_en: The defeat of the bandits was due to your good fortune，Madame．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The defeat of this thief is all the blessing of the Lady.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The defeat of this thief is all the blessing of the lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The defeat of this thief is all thanks to the lady's fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 剿匪有功，夫人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 夫人，打败强盗是您的好运气。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 夫人，土匪的失败是因为您的好运气。

text.ori_cn: 此为往事，不足挂齿。
text.man_en: As it is a thing of the past，it is not worthy of mention．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: This is a matter of the past, and it is not worth mentioning.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: This is a thing of the past, nothing to mention.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: This is a past event, not worth mentioning.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 既然已经成为过去，就不值得一提了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 既然已经是过去的事了，就不值得再提了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 既然这是过去的事，就不值得一提了。

text.ori_cn: (夫)将酒来，先生满饮此杯。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:Bring wine here．Drink off this cup please，sir．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Husband) Bring the wine, sir, and drink this cup to the brim.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Husband) Bring the wine. Sir, drink this cup full.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Bring the wine! Let the gentleman drink this cup to the fullest.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：拿酒来。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：请把酒拿来。先生，请把这杯喝掉。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：拿酒来。请喝完这杯，先生。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)长者赐，不敢辞。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says: 1 will comply with the order of my elder．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) The elder gave it to me, I dare not resign.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) The elders gave it to me, but I dare not refuse.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: "A gift from an elder is not to be declined," said Zhang Shengyun.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说："我一定遵从长辈的命令．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师曰：一谨遵长辈之命。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅说：我会遵从长辈的命令。

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)先生请坐。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:Sit down please，sir．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) Sir, please sit down.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madam said) Sir, please sit down.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Madam said, 'Please have a seat, sir.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：请坐，先生．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：先生请坐。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：先生，请坐。

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)道不得个"恭敬不如从命"。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says：Do you not know the old saying that politeness is not so good as compliance?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) I can't say "respect is better than obedience".
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) There is no saying that "it is better to obey orders than to be respectful".
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The lady said, 'I cannot but follow the saying: Respectful refusal is not as good as compliance.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：你难道不知道 "礼多人不怪 "这句老话吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：难道你不知道“礼不如顺”这句老话吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：你难道不知道那句老话，礼不如从吗？

text.ori_cn: (莺莺上云)迅扫风烟还净土，双悬日月照华筵。
text.man_en: Yingying enters and says:The foe like smoke by wind are swept away．The sun and moon will shine on festive day．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Ying Ying went up to the clouds) Swiftly sweeping away the wind and smoke to return to the pure land, the sun and moon shine on the Chinese banquet.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying ascends the cloud) The wind and smoke are quickly swept back to the pure land, and the sun and moon hang over each other to illuminate the beautiful feast.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The oriole flies to the clouds) Swiftly sweeping away the winds and mists, restoring the pure land; two hanging suns and moons illuminate the splendid banquet.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺进来说："风卷残云，日月无光。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莺莺入曰：仇敌如风烟，一扫而光。日月当明。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹进来，诗曰：敌人如同烟云被风吹散，太阳和月亮将在节日里照耀。

text.ori_cn: 排酒果，列笙歌，篆烟微，花香细，卷起东风帘幕。
text.man_en: The banquet spread，The music played，Incense like thread，Flowers ne'er fade．The eastern wind uprolls curtain and screen
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Wine and fruits are lined up, pianos and songs are sung, the seal smoke is faint, the fragrance of flowers is fine, and the curtain of the east wind is rolled up.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Arranging wine and fruit, playing Sheng songs, the seal smoke is faint, the fragrance of flowers is fine, and the east wind rolls up the curtain.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Arrange wine and fruits, set up flutes and songs, light traces of incense, faint scents of flowers, lift the curtain to the gentle eastern breeze.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 宴席散开，音乐响起，香气如丝，花朵永不凋谢，东风卷起帷幕和屏风
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 酒席蔓延，乐曲奏响，香火如丝，花香不凋。东风卷起帘幕。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 筵席铺开，乐声响起，香如丝线，花儿永不凋谢。东风卷起幕帘和屏风。

text.ori_cn: 他救了咱全家祸，殷勤呵正礼，钦敬呵当合。
text.man_en: For one who saved our family from woe．On him it's proper to be keen；To him it's right respect to show．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He has saved our family from disaster, and we are very solicitous and honourable to him.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He saved our whole family from trouble. He was diligent and courteous, and respectful and respectful.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He saved our entire family from disaster. His diligence warrants respect and his devotion should be honored.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 对于拯救我们家族于水深火热之中的人，对他热心是应该的；对他表示敬意是应该的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 对于一个使我们的家庭免遭灾难的人。对他表示热切是正确的；对他表示尊重是正确的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 对于拯救我们家庭免于苦难的人，对他热忱是应当的，对他表示尊敬也是理所当然的。

text.ori_cn: (红娘云)小姐今日起得早也。
text.man_en: Rose says:My young mistress，how early you have got up this morning!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang Yun) Miss got up early today.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Matchmaker cloud) Miss, you got up early today.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss Hong Niang Yun got up early today.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰说：我的小情人，你今天起得真早！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：我的少奶奶，你今天早上起得真早啊！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 露丝说：我的年轻女主人，今天早晨你起得好早啊！

text.ori_cn: 恰才向碧纱窗下画了双蛾，拂绰了罗衣上粉香浮污，将指尖儿轻轻的贴个钿窝。
text.man_en: I have just painted my eyebrows near the window screen，And swept away the powder soiling my robe green．I've with my fingertips adjusted my hairpin．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Just now to the blue window painted double moth, whisked more than the powder on the clothes floating dirt, the fingertips will gently paste a tin nest.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Just then he drew a pair of moths under the blue screen window, brushed off the pink fragrance and dirt on his clothes, and gently pressed his fingertips into a nest.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Just now, I drew a pair of eyebrows beneath the green silk curtain, brushed the powdery fragrance from my silk garments, and gently pressed a small decorative indentation with my fingertips.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我刚在窗纱旁画好眉毛，又扫去了弄脏我绿色长袍的粉末． 我用指尖调整了我的发簪．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我刚刚在纱窗边画了眉毛，扫掉了沾染绿袍的粉。我用指尖整理了我的发夹。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 才涂黛眉倚窗纱，轻拂衣袂淡黛花。我用指尖轻理发髻。

text.ori_cn: 若不是惊觉人呵，犹压着绣衾卧。
text.man_en: Had I not been awakened in my bed，On my embroidered pillow I'd still rest my head．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If I hadn't been surprised, I would have been lying on the embroidered coverlet.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If he hadn't been surprised, he would still be lying under his embroidered quilt.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Had I not been startled awake, I would still be lying under the embroidered quilt.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果不是在床上被惊醒，我还会在我的绣花枕头上枕着头。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果我不在床上被吵醒，我的头仍会枕在绣花枕头上。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 如果不是被唤醒，我的头还会枕在我的绣枕上。

text.ori_cn: (红云)小姐梳妆早毕也。
text.man_en: Rose says:You have finished your toilet，my young mistress?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red Cloud) Miss has finished her make-up early.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) The lady finished dressing up early.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss Hongyun has finished her grooming early.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰说：小主人，您上完厕所了吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：你上厕所了吗，我的少妇？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝说：你洗漱完毕了吗，我的小主人？

text.ori_cn: 小姐洗手咱。
text.man_en: Will you please wash your hands?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Miss wash our hands.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Miss, wash your hands.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss, please wash your hands.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 请你洗手好吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 请你洗手好吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 请你洗手好吗?

text.ori_cn: 我觑小姐脸儿吹弹得破，张生你好有福也。
text.man_en: I see your face seems so delicate that it would be hurt by a breath of air．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I see that you have a beautiful face, Mr Zhang, you are very lucky.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I looked down upon you, Miss Zhang, and you are so lucky. You are so blessed.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I saw Miss's face as smooth as jade, Zhang Sheng, you are truly fortunate.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我看你的脸似乎很娇嫩，呼吸一口空气都会受伤．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我看你的脸看起来是那么娇嫩，呼吸一口空气就会感到疼痛。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我看到你的脸似乎是如此娇嫩，仿佛一阵微风就能伤害到它。

text.ori_cn: 小姐真乃天生就一位夫人。
text.man_en: What a lucky man is Master Zhang! My young mistress，you were indeed born to be the wife of a lord．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Miss is truly a born lady.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The lady is really born to be a lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The young lady is truly a natural-born lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张老爷真是个有福气的人！小娘子，你真是天生的诰命夫人啊
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师傅真是太幸运了！少奶奶，你果然是天生的王妃啊。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师真是个幸运的人啊！我的小小姐，您真是天生的贵夫人。

text.ori_cn: 你看没查没例谎偻科，道我宜梳妆的脸儿吹弹得破。
text.man_en: What are you thinking without rhyme or reason there?Could my fair face be hurt by a breath of air?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You can see that there is no checking or lying, and my face is so beautifully made up that it can be broken.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Didn't you see that there was no case of rheumatoid arthritis? I said it was better to dress up, and my face was scratched.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Study my face, seldom yet falsely aged, as if it were so delicate that even a breath could mar it.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你在想什么呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你无缘无故地在想什么？难道我白皙的脸会被一丝空气伤害吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你在那儿没头没脑地想什么？我的美貌还能被一口气伤到吗？

text.ori_cn: 你那里休聒，不当一个信口开合。
text.man_en: Don't talk nonsense and freely wag your tongue!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You don't have to talk about it, you're not the right person to talk about it.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Stop talking there, don't make random remarks.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Stop your babbling there; it is inappropriate to speak recklessly.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 不要胡言乱语，随意摆弄舌头！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 废话不多说，随意吐舌头！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 别胡说八道，随便乱讲！

text.ori_cn: 知他命福如何，我做夫人便做得过。
text.man_en: How could you know his fate and mine while we're still young?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If I know what his fate is, I will be able to make it as a wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Knowing how blessed he is, I can do my best as a wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Knowing his fate and fortune, I can surely be his wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你怎么能在我们还年轻的时候就知道他和我的命运？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我们还年轻，你怎么能知道他我的命运呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我们还年轻，你怎么能知道他的命运和我的命运呢？

text.ori_cn: 除非说我相思为他，他相思为我，今日相思都较可。
text.man_en: You say I am lovesick for him and he for me，But cured today our lovesickness will be．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Unless it is said that I am in love with him and he is in love with me, and that both are more agreeable today.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Unless you say that I miss him because of him and he misses me because of him, it is more acceptable to miss him today.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Unless I say that my yearning is for him and his yearning is for me, today's yearning is somewhat more tolerable.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你说我为他相思，他为我相思，但今天我们的相思病会好的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你说我为他相思，他为我相思，但今天我们的相思病就会痊愈。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你说我是为他相思，他为我相思，但今天我们的相思病将痊愈。

text.ori_cn: 这酬贺，当酬贺。
text.man_en: Our gratitude should be shown by a special feast．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: This is a reward for congratulations, when it is a reward for congratulations.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: This congratulation should be congratulated.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: This celebration, indeed, calls for a celebration.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们应该用一场特别的盛宴来表达我们的感激之情．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我们应该用一场特别的盛宴来表达我们的谢意。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我们的感激之情应该通过一顿特别的宴席来表达。

text.ori_cn: 我虽是赔钱货，亦不到两当一弄成合。
text.man_en: My marriage would cause loss to our family, true，So mother'd show her gratitude and celebrateIt by one feast instead of two．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Although I'm a money-loser, I'm not a two-timer, I've got it all worked out.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Even though I'm a loser, I still can't make a deal.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Even though I'm considered a worthless figure, I would never stoop to such a low level for a mere pittance.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的婚姻会给我们的家庭带来损失，是真的，所以母亲为了表示她的感激之情，就用一桌酒席而不是两桌酒席来庆祝。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的婚姻确实会给我们的家庭带来损失，所以母亲会用一顿而不是两顿的盛宴来表达她的感激之情。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的婚姻确实会给我们的家庭带来损失，所以母亲只办一场宴席表示感谢和庆祝，而不是两场。

text.ori_cn: 况他举将除贼，便消得你家缘过活。
text.man_en: The general's coming to exterminateThe foe is worth the money we can give For him to liveThe rest of his life．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If he is going to get rid of the thieves, he will be able to get rid of your family's edge to live.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If he can get rid of the thieves, your family ties will disappear.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Since he is taking the initiative to eliminate the bandits, your family will have a chance to survive and prosper.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 将军来剿灭敌人，我们给他多少钱，他就能活多少年．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 将军来消灭敌人值得我们给他钱让他度过余生。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 将军为了铲除敌人而来，我们付出的金钱值得让他度过余生。

text.ori_cn: 你费甚么便结丝萝。
text.man_en: Why should my mother fear
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Why do you have to do this?
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It doesn't cost you anything to get Silo.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Why do you bother entwining the vines?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的母亲为什么要害怕
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 为什么我妈妈要害怕
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 为什么我的母亲要害怕

text.ori_cn: 休波，省钱的你你忒虑过，恐怕张罗。
text.man_en: It would cost her dearTo make me his wife?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Hubert, save money for you you've thought about it, I'm afraid to open up.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Xiu Bo, you are too worried about saving money, I'm afraid there will be nothing left to do.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hughbo, in your efforts to save money, have you considered all aspects? I fear you may be struggling.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 让我成为他的妻子会让她付出沉重的代价吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 让她付出高昂的代价才能让我成为他的妻子？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 为了让我成为他的妻子，她会付出高昂的代价吗？

text.ori_cn: 门帘前，未将小脚儿挪，我先目转秋波。
text.man_en: Outside the curtained door．Before I move my lotus feet，I take a furtive glance to explore．

text.ori_cn: 如今情愿多以金帛奉酬，愿先生别拣豪门贵宅之女，各谐秦晋，似为两便。
text.man_en: Now I think the best we can do is to reward you with a large sum of money so that you may select another lady of a noble family and that both of us may carry out our matrimonial arrangements to our satisfaction．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Now I would like to be rewarded with more gold and silk, and I hope that you will not choose a woman from a luxurious house, so that each of us can be in harmony with the Qin Jin, which seems to be a convenient solution.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Now I would rather be rewarded with more gold and silk. I hope that my husband will not choose the daughter of a wealthy family and harmonize with the Qin and Jin Dynasties. It seems to be two conveniences.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 现在，我想我们能做的最好的事情就是奖励你一大笔钱，这样你就可以挑选另一位贵族小姐，我们双方都可以满意地完成我们的婚姻安排。

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)先生住者，你今日有酒了也!红娘，扶哥哥去书房中歇息，到明日咱别有话说。

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madam said) Sir, you have a drink today! Matchmaker, help my brother to rest in the study. We have nothing to say until tomorrow.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The lady says) Sir, you are staying here, and you have had wine today! Hongniang, help brother to the study to rest, we will talk about other matters tomorrow.

text.ori_cn: 小生自从瞥见小姐，忘餐废寝，直到如今，受无限苦楚，不可告诉他人，须不敢瞒你。前日之事，小生这一封书，本何足道?
text.man_en: Since I saw your young mistress，I have neither eaten nor slept well．Up to now I have suffered so much．I cannot tell my suffering to others．But how can I not tell you? he letter I wrote to General Du the other day may not be worthy of mention．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Since I glimpsed the lady, I forgot to eat and waste my sleep until now, and suffered infinite pain, I can't tell others, but I dare not hide it from you. The day before yesterday, I have this letter, this is not enough to say?
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ever since I saw the young lady, I have forgotten meals and slept. Until now, I have suffered endless suffering. I cannot tell others, and I must not dare to hide it from you. What happened the day before yesterday, what is the meaning of this letter from Xiaosheng?

text.ori_cn: 此事几时是了，就小娘子跟前，只索解下腰带，寻个自尽!可怜闭户悬梁客，真作离乡背井魂。

text.ori_cn: 俺小姐酷好琴音，今夕妾与小姐，少不得花园烧香。

text.ori_cn: 看小姐说甚言语，便好将先生衷曲禀知。

text.ori_cn: 若有说话，明日早来回报。

text.ori_cn: 寻思此言，深有至理。

text.ori_cn: 只许心儿空想，口儿闲题，梦儿相逢。

text.ori_cn: 昨日个大开东阁，我只道怎生般炮凤烹龙。朦胧，却教我翠袖殷勤捧玉钟。要算主人情重。
text.man_en: A feast was given yesterday；I fondly thought of my bridal array．My visions fade：I raised green sleeves to fill with wine his cup of jade．How could I knowMy mother showed her love

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Yesterday, I opened the east pavilion, and I just wondered how it was possible to create a cannon and a phoenix and a dragon. It's hazy, but it taught me that the green sleeves hold the jade bell diligently. It must be considered as a loving host.

text.ori_cn: 将我雁字排连，着他鱼水难同。
text.man_en: By parting fish from water belowAnd severing lovebirds above!
