text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng pushed the qin Yun) Madam is ungrateful, but Miss, you should not lie.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Sheng Tui Qin Yun) Madam is ungrateful. She is just a young lady, but you should not lie.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Sheng pushes the qin cloud) Madam, you are ungrateful, but Miss, it is not proper for you to lie.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅放下琵琶说："你的母亲可能是忘恩负义的，但你，我亲爱的黄鹂小姐，你怎么能欺骗一个相信你的人呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师放下琵琶，说道：你的母亲或许忘恩负义，但你，我亲爱的黄鹂姑娘，你怎能欺骗相信你的人呢！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅放下琵琶，说：你母亲或许忘恩负义，但你，我亲爱的黄莺小姐，怎么能欺骗信任你的人呢！

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)你错怨了也。
text.man_en: Yingying says:Your plaint is unjustified．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) You are wrong to complain.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingyingyun) You made the wrong complaint.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Yingying Yun: You have wronged me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 盈盈说：你的原告是没有道理的．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：你的抱怨毫无道理。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹说：你的抱怨是不合理的。

text.ori_cn: 他由得俺乞求效鸾凤。
text.man_en: I would do like a phoenix seeking for a mate．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He by I begged to be effective luanfeng.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He allowed me to beg to imitate Luan Feng.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He allowed me to implore for a union like that of a phoenix and a dragon.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我愿做一只求偶的凤凰．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我会像凤凰寻找配偶一样。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我愿意像凤凰一样寻觅伴侣。

text.ori_cn: 他无夜无明并女工，无有些儿空。
text.man_en: I'm ordered to do needlework night and day，And have no leisure what e'er．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He has no night, no light and no women's work, and no some children are empty.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He has no time to sleep with his female workers, and he has no time to spare.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He works day and night with the female workers, without any free time.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我被命令夜以继日地做针线活，没有任何闲暇。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我奉命日夜做针线活，再也没有闲暇。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我被命令日日夜夜做针线活，根本没有空闲时间。

text.ori_cn: 便道十二巫峰，也有高唐来梦中。
text.man_en: High as the Twelve Mountain Peaks seem，The lovers could still cross them to meet in dream．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Even the Twelve Witch Peaks have come to Gao Tang in their dreams.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: On the way to the Twelve Witch Peaks, there is also Gaotang who comes to the dream.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Along the path to the Twelve Witch Peaks, dreams of Gao Tang also come.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 十二峰虽高，有情人仍可越过，在梦中相会。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 十二山峰虽高，恋人仍可跨越十二峰，梦中相会。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 纵然十二峰高耸，情人梦中仍相逢。

text.ori_cn: 走将来气冲冲，不管人恨匆匆，吓得人来怕恐。
text.man_en: Hurriedly she appears；About my grief she does not care．She has struck in me sudden fears，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm going to be angry, no matter how much people hate the rush, and I'm scared to death of people.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He will be very angry when he walks away, not caring about people's anger, and frightening people.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He stormed off into the future, heedless of others' hatred, leaving people frightened and in terror.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她匆匆地出现；她对我的悲伤毫不关心；她让我感到突然的恐惧。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她匆匆出现；她不在乎我的悲伤。她让我突然感到恐惧，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她匆匆地出现了；对此我的悲伤她毫不在意。她在我心中突生恐惧，

text.ori_cn: 我又不曾转动，女孩儿家恁响喉咙。
text.man_en: Though I have not moved anywhere．Why should a girl speak in such a loud voice?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I've never turned, and I'm a girl with a loud throat.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I didn't turn around, the girl's throat was loud.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I haven't moved an inch, it's the girl's loud voice.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 虽然我哪儿也没去． 一个女孩为什么要这么大声说话呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 虽然我哪里都没有动过。为什么一个女孩子要大声说话呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 虽然我没有移动过任何地方。一个女孩为什么要用这么大的声音说话？

text.ori_cn: 我待紧磨砻，将他拦纵，怕他去夫人行把人葬送。
text.man_en: But I must pat her and keep her hereLest she should make much noise Before my mother dear.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm going to tighten the hull and stop him, for fear that he will go to the lady's house and bury the people.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I waited closely and stopped him, fearing that he would go to Madame's house and bury people.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I will wait with patient diligence, intercepting him, fearing that he may go to the lady and bring ruin upon her.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 但我必须拍拍她，让她待在这里，免得她在我亲爱的母亲面前吵闹。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 但我必须拍拍她，把她留在这里，以免她在我亲爱的妈妈面前发出太大的声音。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 但我必须拍拍她并把她留在这里，以免她在我亲爱的母亲面前发出很大的噪音。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)红娘，你便与他说，再住两三日儿。
text.man_en: Yingying says:You may go，Rose，and tell him to stay two or three days longer．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) Hongniang, tell him to stay for two or three more days.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying cloud) Matchmaker, tell him to stay for another two or three days.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Yingying) Hongniang, tell him to stay for another two or three days.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 盈盈说：你走吧，玫瑰，让他多住两三天。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：罗斯，你可以走了，让他再多呆两三天。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莺莺说：你可以去，罗斯，并告诉他多停留两三天。

text.ori_cn: 只说到，夫人时下有些唧哝，好和歹你不脱空。
text.man_en: Tell him my mother still has something to say, And good or bad，he'd not go empty away．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I just said, "Madam, there are some mumbles now, good and bad you do not get rid of the empty.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I just said that Madam is a bit mumbling at the moment, good or bad, you will not be spared.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: All that was said is that the lady has been grumbling a bit lately. No matter the outcome, you won't escape unscathed.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 告诉他，我妈妈还有话要对他说，不管是好是坏，他都不会空手而归的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 告诉他我妈妈还有话要说，无论好坏，他都不会空手而去。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 告诉他，我母亲还有话要说，不管好坏，他不会空手而归。

text.ori_cn: 我那口不应的狠毒娘，你定要别离了这志诚种。
text.man_en: Why don't you keep your word，oh，mother most unkind，And sever me from one who loves with heart and mind?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: My cruel mother, who should not have been told, you must not leave this Zhicheng seed.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My cruel and vicious mother, you must say goodbye to this Zhicheng.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: My heartless and malicious mother, you are bound to leave this steadfast kin.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你为什么不遵守诺言，哦，最不近人情的母亲，让我与全心全意相爱的人分离？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你为什么不信守诺言，哦，最不仁慈的母亲，让我与一个全心全意爱着的人断绝关系？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 为何你不守承诺，哦，最无情的母亲，将我与心灵相爱的那人分开？

text.ori_cn: (红娘云)小姐不必吩咐，我知道了也，明日我看他去。
text.man_en: Rose says:You need not give me orders，my young mistress．I know what should be done．I will go to see him tomorrow．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang Yun) Miss do not have to command, I know also, tomorrow I see him go.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hong Niang Yun) Miss, there is no need to give instructions, I understand. I will see him tomorrow.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss Hongniang, you don't need to instruct me. I already know, and I will go see him tomorrow.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰说：你不必对我发号施令，我的小主人，我知道该怎么做，我明天就去见他。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：你不必给我命令，我的年轻情妇。我知道该怎么做。明天我会去看他。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝说：我的小主人，你不需要命令我。我知道该怎么做。明天我会去见他。

text.ori_cn: 红娘姐呵，你便迟不得一步儿，今夜便回复小生波。
text.man_en: Why did you not stay a little longer, Miss Rose，so that you might tell me her response tonight?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm not going to be able to get back to you tonight, but I'm going to be able to get back to you tonight.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Matchmaker sister, you can't wait a step too late, you will reply to Xiaoshengbo tonight.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Dear Matchmaker, you mustn’t delay even a step. Give my reply to the young scholar tonight.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗丝小姐，你为什么不多留一会儿，好告诉我她今晚的反应？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝小姐，你为什么不多呆一会儿，以便今晚告诉我她的反应呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝小姐，您为什么不多待一会儿，这样今晚就可以告诉我她的回答了？

text.ori_cn: 没奈何，且只得睡去。
text.man_en: But as things are，what I can do is only to go to bed．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: There was nothing to be done, and I had to go to sleep.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I had no choice but to sleep.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: There was no other choice, so I had to sleep.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 但事已至此，我能做的只有上床睡觉。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 但事已至此，我能做的只有去睡觉了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 事已至此，我所能做的就是上床睡觉。

text.ori_cn: 红娘，你左则闲着，你到书院中看张生一遭，看他说甚么，你来回我话者。
text.man_en: Rose，as you have nothing to do at the moment，you had better go to see Master Zhang in the library，hear what he has to say and come back to tell me．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Hongniang, you are idle, you go to the academy to see Zhang Sheng for a while, see what he said, you reply to me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Matchmaker, you are free on the left. You go to the academy to see Zhang Sheng and see what he says. You can talk to me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Matchmaker, since you are free on the left, go to the academy to see Zhang Sheng. See what he says and come back to report to me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗斯，既然你现在无事可做，最好去图书馆找张师傅，听听他怎么说，然后回来告诉我。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝，你现在没什么事可做，你最好去图书馆看看张老师，听听他要说什么，然后回来告诉我。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗斯，既然你现在没事做，你最好去图书馆见张大师，听听他说什么，然后回来告诉我。

text.ori_cn: 你便去咱。
text.man_en: You had better go now．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You go to us.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You go to us.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You go, then.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你最好现在就走．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你最好现在就走。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你最好现在就走。

text.ori_cn: (红云)我便去了，单说张生你害病，俺的小姐也不弱。
text.man_en: Rose says:All right，1 will go just to tell him that you are no less ill than he is．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hong Yun) I will go, and say only that Zhang Sheng you are sick, and my lady is not weak.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) I went and said, Zhang Sheng, you are sick, but my lady is not weak either.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hong Yun) I went and told him: Master Zhang, you are sick, and my lady is not in any better condition.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗斯说：好吧，我去告诉他，你的病不比他轻。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：好吧，我去告诉他你的病并不比他轻。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝说：好吧，我会去的，只是为了告诉他你病得和他一样重。

text.ori_cn: 春昼不曾双劝酒，夜寒无那又听琴。
text.man_en: You've not yet drunk your cup of nuptial dayBut heard on chilly night his lute's sweet lay．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: In the spring day, I have never been persuaded to drink wine, and in the cold night, I have never listened to the qin again.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is no time to drink wine in the spring day, and there is no time to listen to the piano in the cold night.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: During the spring day, we never drank together twice, and on cold nights, I hear the qin again.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你还没有在新婚之夜一醉方休，却在寒夜里听到了他的琵琶声．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你还没有喝过你的新婚之杯，但在寒冷的夜晚听到了他的琵琶的甜蜜的歌声。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你杯中喜酒尚未饮一口，却已先聆伫冷宵筝声幽。

text.ori_cn: 针线无心不待拈，脂粉香消懒去添，春恨压眉尖。
text.man_en: She won't attend to needle and threadNor renew the rouge and powder on her face．Spring sorrow knits the brows on her forehead，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Needles and threads are not to be flicked, powder and incense are not lazy to add, spring hate pressure on the tip of the eyebrow.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 不顾针线，不重脸上的胭脂粉，春愁眉紧眉，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她不再理会针线，也不再为脸上添红妆。春愁紧锁着她的眉头，

text.ori_cn: 灵犀一点，医可了病恹恹。
text.man_en: Which only mutual love can erase．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: A little bit of spirituality heals the sickly.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: A little understanding can cure the illness.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With a spark of insight, a physician can heal the ailing.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 只有彼此的爱才能消除．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 只有相互的爱才能抹去。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 唯有相互的爱才能抚平。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)红娘去了，看他回来说甚么。
text.man_en: Yingying says:Now Rose is gone．I'11 wait and see what she has to tell me on her return．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) Hongniang has gone, let's see what he says when he comes back.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying cloud) The matchmaker has gone, let's see what he says when he comes back.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Ying Ying says) Hongniang has gone, let's see what she comes back to say.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 盈盈说：现在玫瑰走了． 我等着看她回来后有什么话要对我说．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：现在罗丝走了。我等着看她回来后要告诉我什么。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹说: 现在玫瑰已经走了。我会等着看她回来后会告诉我什么。

text.ori_cn: 十分心事一分语，尽夜相思尽日眠。
text.man_en: I can express in words only onetenth of what I'11say；Thinking of him all night long．I'm drowsy all day．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have a lot of things on my mind and a lot of things to say, and I sleep all night and all day.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: A single word from my deepest thoughts, I miss you all night long and sleep all day long.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ten parts of worry are spoken in one word, the entire night of longing and all day of sleep.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我只能用十分之一的语言来表达；整夜想着他．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我只能用语言表达我所说的十分之一；整夜都想着他。我一整天都昏昏欲睡。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 一言难尽我所有的情感；整夜思念他，整天昏昏欲睡。

text.ori_cn: 困思上来，我睡些儿咱。
text.man_en: Now I am tired．I'11go and sleep for a while．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm sleepy. I'm going to sleep.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When I feel sleepy, I'll take some sleep.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I'm feeling sleepy, let me take a nap.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 现在我累了． 我想去睡一会儿．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 现在我累了。我去睡一会儿。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 现在我累了，我要去睡一会儿。

text.ori_cn: (红娘上云)奉小姐言语，着俺看张生，须索走一遭。俺想来，若非张生，怎还有俺一家儿性命呵!
text.man_en: Rose enters and says:On my young mistress' order，I am going to see Master Zhang．If it were not for him，how could our family be still alive?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang Shangyun) I was told by the lady that I should see Zhang Sheng, and that I should go for a walk. I think, if it were not for Zhang Sheng, how could my family still be alive?
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The matchmaker goes up to the cloud) Miss Feng said that if I look at Zhang Sheng, I must ask him to go away. I think about it, if it weren’t for Zhang Sheng, how could our whole family still be alive?
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongniang goes onstage) Following the lady's instructions, I must go see Mr. Zhang and hasten there at once. I think, if it weren't for Mr. Zhang, how could there still be the lives of my entire family!
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰进门说："奉我家少奶奶之命，我要去见张老爷。 如果不是他，我们家怎么可能还活着？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝进来说道：奉少奶奶之命，我要去见张老爷子。要不是他，我们一家人怎么可能还活着呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 玫瑰走进来说：奉我小主人的命令，我要去见张大师。如果没有他，我们家怎么还能活着呢？

text.ori_cn: 相国行祠，寄居萧寺。
text.man_en: The premier's coffin had to restIn lonely Temple for the Blessed．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The Sangguniang Shrine and the Sentinel Temple.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Xiangguo went to the temple and stayed in Xiao Temple.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The prime minister stayed at the memorial temple, taking temporary residence in Xiao Temple.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 总理的灵柩不得不安放在孤零零的祈福庙里。

text.man_en2gpt_cn: 总理的灵柩不得不安放在孤独的受福庙中。

text.ori_cn: 遭横事，幼女孤儿，将欲从军死。
text.man_en: When suddenlyCame a calamity：My fair young mistress in an alien landWas in danger of falling in the bandit's hand．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He has been struck by an accident, and his young daughter has been orphaned, and he will die in the army.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The young girl was orphaned due to misfortune, and she was about to join the army and die.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Having met with a misfortune, leaving behind a young daughter and an orphan, he intends to join the army and face death.

text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当我与快乐的朋友交谈时，太阳很快就会向西沉去。今天我要与爱人见面；太阳似乎被粘在了空中。

text.ori_cn: 再等一等，又看咱，今日百般的难得下去呵。
text.man_en: I must still wait for a long time．When I look again，I find everything seems against the sun's setting today．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Wait a little longer, and look at us, it's hard to get down there today in a hundred different ways.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Wait a moment, look at us again, it’s going to be a rare day in every possible way.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Wait a bit longer, look at us, it's been a really tough day today.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我还得等很长时间． 当我再看时，我发现一切似乎都与今天的夕阳背道而驰．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我还得等很长一段时间。当我再看时，我发现一切似乎都与今天的夕阳相反。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我还得等很久。再看一眼，我发现今天的一切似乎都不利于太阳的落山。

text.ori_cn: 空青万里无云，悠然扇作微薰。
text.man_en: No cloud in azure skyWith fragrance drifting by．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The air is green and cloudless, and the leisurely fan is a slight fumigation.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The sky is blue and cloudless, with a gentle fan blowing leisurely.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The sky is vast and cloudless, a gentle breeze wafts leisurely.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 蔚蓝的天空没有一丝云彩，飘过阵阵清香．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 蔚蓝的天空无云，飘香飘过。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 碧空无云，芳香飘散。

text.ori_cn: 呀，初倒西也。
text.man_en: Ah! The sun begins to sink in the west．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Yikes, first pouring west too.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Yeah, it’s my first time to fall to the west.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Wow, the first snow has fallen in the west.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 太阳开始西沉．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 啊!太阳开始西沉。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 啊！太阳开始在西方落下。

text.ori_cn: 再等一等咱。
text.man_en: I have to wait still for a long while．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Let's wait a little longer.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Wait a moment for us.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Let's wait a moment.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我还要等很长时间．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我还得等很长一段时间。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我还得再等很长一段时间。

text.ori_cn: 谁将三足鸟，来向天上阁。
text.man_en: The sun's a golden crow In Heaven's palace high．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Who brings a three-legged bird to the heavenly pavilion.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Who will bring the three-legged bird to the pavilion in the sky?
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Who will bring the three-legged crow to the heavenly pavilion?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 太阳是天宫高悬的金乌．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 太阳是一只金乌，高高挂在天宫。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 太阳是一只金乌，住在天宫之上。

text.ori_cn: 呀，却早上灯也。
text.man_en: Ah! lamps are lit．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Yikes, but the morning light too.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Yeah, but there is no light in the morning.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ah, but the lights are on in the morning.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 啊！灯点亮了．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 啊!灯亮了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 啊！灯亮了。

text.ori_cn: 呀，却早发擂也。
text.man_en: Ah! drums are beaten．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Yikes, but early hair ring too.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Yeah, but it was early.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ah, yet they have already announced the challenge.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 啊！鼓声响起．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 啊!锣鼓已敲响。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 啊！鼓声阵阵。

text.ori_cn: 拽上书房门，到得那里，手挽着垂杨，滴溜扑碌跳过墙去，抱住小姐。
text.man_en: I'11 close the door of the library and go out．When I arrive there．I'11 clasp the branch of the drooping willow tree and climb over the wall in a trice．I'11 hold my young lady in my arms．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Dragged up the door of the study, and when he got there, he took the hanging poplar by the hand, and jumped over the wall with a dripping flutter, and hugged the lady.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He pulled the study door shut, and when he got there, holding Chuiyang in his arms, he jumped over the wall and hugged the young lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Pulling the study door shut, upon reaching there, he grasped the drooping willow and swiftly leaped over the wall, embracing the young lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我11关上书房的门，走了出去． 当我到了那里． 我11紧紧抓住垂柳的枝条，三下五除二就翻过了墙． 我11把我的小姐抱在怀里．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我'11关上图书馆的门出去。当我到达那里时。我'11抓住下垂的柳树的树枝，一下子就翻过墙。我'11把我的小姐抱在怀里。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我要关上图书馆的门然后出去。当我到达那里时，我会抓住垂柳的树枝，一下子翻过墙。我会把我的小姐搂在怀里。

text.ori_cn: (红娘上云)今日小姐着俺寄书与张生，当面偌多假意儿，诗内却暗约着他来。
text.man_en: Rose enters and says: When my young mistress ordered me to take her letter to Master Zhang，she pretended to assume a cool air, but actually she made a secret assignation with him in her poem．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang Shangyun) Today, the lady asked me to send a letter to Zhang Sheng, so much pretence in front of him, but the poem secretly asked him to come.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The matchmaker goes up to the cloud) Today, the lady asked me to send a letter to Zhang Sheng. She was so pretentious in person, but she secretly made an appointment with him in the poem.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongniang goes on stage) Today, my lady asked me to deliver a letter to Scholar Zhang. While she pretends to be indifferent in person, her poem secretly invites him to come.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰进来说：当我的小主人吩咐我把她的信带给张老师时，她装出一副冷淡的样子，其实她在诗中与张老师暗中约会了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝进来说道：当我的少奶奶让我把她的信带给张老爷时，她假装一副冷漠的样子，实际上她在诗中与他有一个秘密的约会。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 玫瑰进来，说：当我的年轻女主人命令我把她的信带给张先生时，她假装很冷静，其实她在诗中与他秘密约会。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺上云)花香重叠晚风细，庭院深沉早月明。
text.man_en: Yingying enters and says:The evening breeze is heavy with fragrance of flowers；The rising moon has brightened the deep，silent bowers．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Ying Ying went up to the clouds) The fragrance of flowers overlaps the evening breeze, the courtyard is deep and the early moon is bright.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying ascends the cloud) The fragrance of flowers overlaps and the evening breeze is gentle, the courtyard is deep and the moon shines brightly in the early morning.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Yingying goes to the clouds) The fragrance of flowers overlaps with the gentle evening breeze, the courtyard is deep, and the early moon shines brightly.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺进屋说："晚风拂过，花香扑鼻；明月升起，照亮了深邃寂静的山谷。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莺莺入曰：晚风花香浓；明月明深幽亭。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莺莺走进来，说：晚风带着浓郁的花香；升起的月亮照亮了幽深宁静的亭台楼阁。

text.ori_cn: 晚风寒峭透窗纱，控金钩绣帘不挂。
text.man_en: The evening breeze so cold has come through window screen；The golden hooks have not kept up the curtains green．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The evening wind is chilly and penetrates the window screen, and the control of the golden hooks and embroidered curtains is not hung.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The cold night wind blew through the window screens, and the gold-embroidered curtains were not hung.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The chilly evening breeze pierces the window screen, but the embroidered curtains remain unhooked.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 晚风凉透窗纱，金钩未挽窗帘绿。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 晚风寒透窗纱，金钩未撑帘绿。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 透过窗纱，晚风沁寒；金钩未扣，帘幕依旧绿意盎然。

text.ori_cn: 阑凝暮霭，楼阁抹残霞。
text.man_en: The door is open to the evening haze，The bower steeped in the sun's departing rays．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The pavilions are covered in a haze of twilight, and the pavilions are covered in a haze of sunset.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The dusk is gathering in the sky, and the pavilions are covered with residual clouds.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With twilight settling, the pavilions are brushed with the last hues of sunset.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 大门敞开着，迎着晚霞，花房沉浸在夕阳的余晖中。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 门向晚霞敞开，凉亭沐浴在夕阳的余晖中。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 大门敞开迎晚霞，亭阁沐浴夕阳斜。

text.ori_cn: 恰对菱花，楼上晚妆罢。
text.man_en: Before her mirror in her boudoir my young mistressHas just put on her evening dress．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to do that.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Just in time for Linghua, let’s put on my evening makeup upstairs.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Facing the crystal mirror, she finishes her evening makeup upstairs.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 在闺房的镜子前，我年轻的女主人刚刚穿上晚礼服．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 在她闺房的镜子前，我年轻的情妇刚刚穿上晚礼服。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在她闺房的镜子前，我的年轻小姐刚穿上她的晚礼服。

text.ori_cn: 不近喧哗，嫩绿池塘藏睡鸭。
text.man_en: From bustle far away, In the lightgreen pool the ducks sleep．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Not close to the noise, the tender green pond hides sleeping ducks.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Not close to the hustle and bustle, the tender green pond hides sleeping ducks.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Far from the clamor, a tender green pond hides sleeping ducks.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 远离喧嚣，鸭子在浅绿色的池塘里睡觉．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 远处的喧嚣， 鸭子在浅绿色的池子里睡觉。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 远离喧嚣，鸭子在碧绿的池塘里睡觉。

text.ori_cn: 自然幽雅，淡黄杨柳带栖鸦。
text.man_en: Beautiful is the day，On the pale yellow willow tree crows are perched deep．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Natural elegance, pale yellow willow with perching crows.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The nature is elegant, with light yellow willows and crows.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With natural grace and elegance, pale yellow willows host perching crows.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 今天天气很好，淡黄色的柳树上乌鸦栖息得很深。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 日子很美，淡黄的柳树上乌鸦栖息得很深。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 美丽的一天，苍黄的柳树上栖息着乌鸦。

text.ori_cn: 金莲蹴损牡丹芽，玉簪儿抓住茶蘼架。
text.man_en: She crushes peonies' young shoots with her small feet．Her jade hairpin entangled in red flowers sweet．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The Golden Lotus has damaged the peony buds, and the Jade Hairpin has captured the Gracilaria frame.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The golden lotus licks the peony buds, and the hosta grabs the tea stem.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Golden Lotus kicks and damages the peony buds, while the jade hairpin grasps the tea trellis.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她用小脚踩碎牡丹的嫩芽． 她的玉簪缠绕着甜蜜的红花．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她小脚踩碎牡丹嫩芽，玉簪缠红花香。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她用小脚踩碎了牡丹的嫩芽，她的玉簪纠缠在红花中。

text.ori_cn: 早苔径滑，露珠儿湿透凌波袜。
text.man_en: Slippery is the mossy way；Her stockings wet with pearls of dewdrops indiscreet．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Early moss path is slippery, dewdrops wet through the Lingbo socks.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The early moss is slippery, and dewdrops soak through Lingbo's socks.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The early moss-covered path is slippery, and dewdrops have soaked through the delicate lotus-patterned socks.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 长满青苔的小路滑溜溜的；她的丝袜被珍珠般的露珠打湿了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 湿滑的是长满青苔的路；她的长袜不慎沾满了珍珠般的露珠。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 滑溜的是苔藓路；她的长袜被不小心的露珠珍珠弄湿了。

text.ori_cn: 自从那日初时，想月华，捱一刻，似一夏。
text.man_en: E'er since sunriseThey have wearied their eyesFor the rising moon；A moment seems as long as the month of June．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Since the beginning of that day, I have thought about the moonlight, and I have endured a moment that seems to be a summer's day.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Since the beginning of that day, thinking about the moonlight, every moment feels like a summer.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Since that first day, thinking of the moonlit scene, each moment feels like a summer.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 从日出开始，他们就为冉冉升起的月亮而疲惫不堪；一瞬间就像六月一样漫长。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 自从日出以来，他们已经厌倦了初升的月亮；一刻似乎像六月一样漫长。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 自从日出起，他们就为盼望月亮升起而眼睛疲惫；一刻仿佛有六月那么长。

text.ori_cn: 见柳梢斜日迟迟下，道好教贤圣打。
text.man_en: Beyond the willow trees now slowly sinks the sun，They wish it buried by the Holy One．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Seeing the willow tip slanting the sun down late, the road is good to teach the sages to fight.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Seeing the sun setting slowly over the willow branches, I heard that the wise and sages were good at teaching.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Watching the sun slowly set behind the willow branches, it is said to teach virtues to the wise and the sage.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 柳树外的太阳正缓缓下沉，他们希望太阳被圣者埋葬。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 柳树外太阳已慢慢落下，他们希望它被圣者埋葬。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 夕阳缓缓隐入柳荫中，他们祈愿神圣之人将其埋葬。

text.ori_cn: 打扮得身子儿乍，准备来云雨会巫峡。
text.man_en: In bewitching attire，She brings her cloud and rain to quench his flame and fire．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Dress up your body and prepare for the rain and clouds to meet the Witch's Gap.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Dressed up and ready to go to Yunyuhui Wu Gorge.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Dressed up gracefully, getting ready for a romantic encounter at the Wu Gorge.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她身着魅惑的服饰，带着她的云和雨，来浇灭他的火焰和烈焰。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她身着妖艳的装束，带来云雨来扑灭他的火焰。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她穿着迷人的衣服，带来了她的云雨来消灭他的烈焰和火焰。

text.ori_cn: 为那燕侣莺俦，扯杀心猿意马。
text.man_en: Seeing the orioles and swallows in pairs，Could she not think of love affairs?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: For the swallows and warblers, the heart is ripped out of the mind.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: For that Yan couple and Ying couple, they are willing to kill each other.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: For those paired like swallows and warblers, quell the restless heart and unruly mind.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 看到成双成对的黄鹂和燕子，她能不遐想情事吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 看到黄莺与燕子成双成对，她难道不会想到爱情吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 见双双黄鹂燕雀，她怎能不想起情事？

text.ori_cn: 他水米不沾牙，越越的闭月羞花。
text.man_en: She will nor drink nor eat，And looks more bashful and sweet．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He doesn't touch his teeth with water and rice, and the more he closes his eyes.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: He has nothing to do with his life, and he is getting more and more ashamed of himself.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: She is so beautiful that even the moon hides in shame, and flowers are put to shame.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她不喝也不吃，显得更加腼腆和甜美。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她不喝酒也不吃东西，而且看起来更加害羞和甜蜜。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她既不喝也不吃，看起来更加害羞和甜美。

text.ori_cn: 小姐，这湖山下立地，我闭了角门儿，怕有人听咱说话。
text.man_en: She says:My young mistress，will you please stand below the poolside rock? I will shut the side door lest we should be overheard．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Miss, I've closed the door at the bottom of the hill for fear that someone might hear us.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Miss, this is a place under a lake and a mountain. I closed the corner door for fear that someone would listen to me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss, we are standing by the lake at the foot of the mountain. I have closed the corner gate, fearing someone might overhear our conversation.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她说：我年轻的情妇，请你站在池边的石头下面好吗？我会关上侧门，以免被人听到。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她说：我的少妇，请你站在池边的岩石下面好吗？我会关上侧门，以免我们被偷听。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她说：我的小女主人，请你站在泳池边的岩石下面好吗？我会关上旁边的门，以免我们被人听到。

text.ori_cn: (张生上云)此时正好过去也。
text.man_en: Master Zhang enters and says: It is time to go there．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng on the cloud) At this time just past also.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengshangyun) It’s time to pass by at this time.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Sheng starts his journey to the clouds) This moment is just the right time to go.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅进来说：该去那里了．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师进来说：该去那里了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师走进来说：该去那里了。

text.ori_cn: 是槐影风摇暮鸦，是玉人帽侧乌纱。
text.man_en: The evening crowAmid the treesSeems to shiver and throw Its shadow in the breeze．No，it's the scholar, I guess，In his black silk headdress．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It is the acacia shadow and wind shaking the twilight crows, and it is the jade man's hat flanking the black veil.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It is the shadow of the locust tree swaying in the wind, the crow at dusk, and the black gauze on the side of the beautiful lady's hat.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: It is the evening crows swaying in the locust shadows in the wind, it is the jade beauty with the black gauze hat tilted to the side.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 晚鸦在树丛中似乎在颤抖，在微风中投下它的影子． 不，我猜是学者，戴着他的黑丝头饰．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 傍晚的乌鸦在树林里似乎在颤抖，把它的影子投在微风中。不，我猜是那位学者，戴着他的黑色丝绸头饰。

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The warm fragrance of soft jade fills my arms.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With soft jade and gentle fragrance, I hold an embrace full.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 无香不温润，无玉不柔美。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 无香如此温润，无玉如此柔美，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 没有哪一种香味如此温馨，没有哪一种玉石如此柔软美好，

text.ori_cn: 呀，刘阮到天台，春至人间花弄色。
text.man_en: Ah! I am better than in paradise．Spring comes on earth with flowers dyed．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Liu Ruan went to the rooftop, and spring came to the earth to show the colours of the flowers.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Ah, Liu Ruan went to the rooftop, and the flowers in the world became colorful in spring.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ah, Liu Ruan arrives at Tiantai, spring arrives and colors the flowers of the mortal world.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 啊！我比在天堂还要好． 春天来到人间，鲜花染遍大地．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 啊!我比在天堂还要美好。春天降临人间，鲜花盛开。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 啊！我胜似在天堂。春天来到大地，百花盛开。

text.ori_cn: 柳腰款摆，花心轻拆，露滴牡丹开。
text.man_en: Her willowy waist close by my side，Her pistil plucked，my dewdrop drips And her peony sipsWith open lips．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The willow waist is swinging, the heart of the flower is gently unwrapped, and the dew drips on the peony.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The willow waist is placed, the flower heart is lightly removed, and the peonies are blooming with dewdrops.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: She swayed with a slender figure, flowers delicately unfurling, dew drops causing peonies to bloom.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她的柳腰在我身旁，她的花蕊被我摘下，我的露珠滴落，她的牡丹张开双唇啜饮。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她的柳腰紧靠在我身边，她的雌蕊被拔去，我的露珠滴落而她的牡丹啜饮着张开的嘴唇。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她那纤细的腰肢贴近我的身旁，她的花蕊被摘下，我的露珠滴落，她的牡丹花用开放的唇吮吸。

text.ori_cn: 蘸着些儿麻上来，鱼水得和谐。
text.man_en: O'er whelmed with ecstasy，I feel as happy and as free As a fish swimming in the sea．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Dipped in some hemp and came up, the fish and water had to be in harmony.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Dip it in some sesame, and the fish and water will be harmonious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Dip some sesame on it, and the fish and water will be harmonious.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 欣喜若狂，我感到像鱼儿在大海中畅游一样快乐和自由。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: O'er 沉浸在狂喜之中，我感到像一条在海里游泳的鱼一样快乐和自由。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 沉浸在狂喜中，我感到无比幸福与自由，就像鱼在海中游泳。

text.ori_cn: 嫩蕊娇香蝶恣采。
text.man_en: I gather your sweet fragrance like a butterfly
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The tender stamens are fragrant and the butterflies want to pick them.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The delicate pistils and fragrant butterflies are plentiful.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Tender fragrant blossoms attract butterflies to freely gather.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我像蝴蝶一样采集你甜美的芬芳
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我像蝴蝶一样收集你的甜香
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我像蝴蝶一样采集你的芳香

text.ori_cn: 你半推半就，我又惊又爱。
text.man_en: You half refuse and half comply．I'm filled with love as with surprise
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You half-assed it, and I was amazed and in love.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I was surprised and loved by you for half-heartedly.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You half resisted and half yielded; I was both surprised and enamored.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你半拒半从． 我充满了爱和惊喜
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你一半拒绝一半答应。我充满了爱和惊喜
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你半推半就，我既惊讶又充满爱意。

text.ori_cn: 檀口掘香腮。
text.man_en: And kiss your cheeks and eyes．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The sandalwood mouth digs into the fragrant cheeks.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The sandalwood mouth digs fragrant cheeks.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With ruby lips and fragrant cheeks.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 亲吻你的脸颊和眼睛．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 并亲吻你的脸颊和眼睛。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 亲吻你的脸颊和眼睛。

text.ori_cn: 我把你做心肝般看待，点污了小姐清白。
text.man_en: With heart and soul I've loved you deep；For you I have forgot to eat and sleep．Had I not borne this with sincerity,
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I treated you like a heart and soul, point-blank tainted the lady's innocence.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I treat you like a darling, and you have stained your innocence.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I treat you like my dearest, yet you tarnish the lady's reputation.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我全心全意地深爱着你；为了你，我废寝忘食、
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我全心全意地爱着你；为了你我废寝忘食。若非我真心承受，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我用心用情深深爱着你；为了你我忘了吃和睡。如果我没有以真诚对待,

text.ori_cn: 成就了今宵欢爱，魂飞在九霄云外。
text.man_en: I have completed my happiness tonight；Beyond the clouds my soul seems in flight．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Achievement of this night's love, the soul flies in the clouds.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I have made love tonight, and my soul is flying in the sky.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The achievements of tonight's passion send the soul soaring beyond the clouds.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 今夜我完成了我的幸福；云外我的灵魂似乎在飞翔。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 今夜我已完成我的幸福；云外我的灵魂似乎在飞翔。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 今晚我已经完成了我的幸福；在云端之上，我的灵魂仿佛在飞翔。

text.ori_cn: 投至得见你个多情小嫁嫁，你看憔悴形骸，瘦似麻秸。
text.man_en: I have met you so full of love，at last，Though I've become so lean and pined away so fast．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I've seen you with a lot of love, look at your emaciated body, as thin as a hemp straw.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When I meet you, this passionate little married woman, you look haggard and thin as straw.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I glimpsed you, a tender-hearted little bride, looking haggard, thin as a straw.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我终于遇见了你，如此充满爱意，尽管我已变得如此瘦弱，如此憔悴。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我终于遇见了充满爱的你，尽管我很快就变得如此瘦弱和憔悴。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我终于遇见了你，满怀爱意，虽然我已经变得如此消瘦，憔悴得如此之快.

text.ori_cn: 今夜和谐，犹是疑猜。
text.man_en: The happy union of tonight still seems untrue，But on the earth there's fragrant dew，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Tonight's harmony is still suspect.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is harmony tonight, but there is still doubt.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Tonight is harmonious, yet still filled with doubts.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 今夜的幸福结合似乎还不真实，但大地已绽放出芬芳的露珠。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 今夜的幸福结合似乎仍不真实，但大地上有香露，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 今夜欢乐的聚会似乎不真实，然而大地上却有芬芳的露珠。

text.ori_cn: 露滴香埃，风静闲阶，月射书斋，云锁阳台。
text.man_en: Over the lonely steps the wind dies away，Into my cabinet the moon sheds its ray．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The dew drips on the incense, the wind quiets the idle steps, the moon shoots at the study, and the clouds lock the balcony.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The dew drops are fragrant, the wind is quiet and leisurely on the steps, the moon shines in the study, and the clouds lock the balcony.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Dew drops on fragrant dust, wind ceases on quiet steps, moonlight shines into the study, clouds enshroud the balcony.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 风过寂寞的台阶，月光洒进我的橱柜。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 风过寂寞阶，月光入阁。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 风声渐息过孤阶，月光洒入书斋中。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺上云)张生病重，俺写一简，只说道药方，着红娘将去，与他做个道理。
text.man_en: Yingying enters and says:Master Zhang is very ill．I have written a letter forhim，and l will tell Rose to take it to him in the guiseof a prescription．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying on the cloud) Zhang is seriously ill, I write a brief, only to say that the prescription, the red lady will go, and he did a reason.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying Shangyun) Zhang was seriously ill, so I wrote a brief note, telling him only about the prescription, and that the matchmaker would leave to talk to him.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Yingying on stage) Zhang Sheng is seriously ill. I have written a letter, merely inquiring about his prescription, and have asked Hong Niang to deliver it to him and explain the situation.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺进来说："张老爷病得很重，我给他写了一封信，我让玫瑰用药方子送去给他。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹进来说：张师傅病得很重，我已经给他写了一封信，我会叫罗丝以处方的形式带去给他。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莺莺进来，说：张师傅病得很重。我已经替他写了封信，我会告诉玫瑰以药方的形式把信带给他。

text.ori_cn: (红应云)小姐，红娘来也。
text.man_en: Rose reenters and says:Here I am，my young mistress．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hong Ying Yun) Miss, Hong Niang is here.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hong Yingyun) Miss, the matchmaker is here.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Miss Hong Yingyun), the matchmaker is here.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰又进来了，她说：我来了，我的小情妇。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝重新进来并说：我在这里，我的年轻情妇。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗斯重新进入并说：我来了，我的小主人。

text.ori_cn: 也罢，夫人正使我去，我就与你将去波。
text.man_en: Very well，as my mistress has just ordered me to go there， I will take it for you．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Well, Madam is asking me to go, so I'll go with you.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Anyway, Madam is asking me to go, so I will go with you.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Very well, since the lady insists, I shall accompany you.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 很好，因为我的女主人刚刚命令我去那里，我帮你拿着。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 很好，既然我的女主人刚刚吩咐我去那儿，我就替你去吧。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 很好，既然我的主人刚刚命令我去那里，我就替你带过去。

text.ori_cn: 夫人着长老请太医来看我，我这恶证候，非是太医所治，除非小姐有甚好药方儿，这病便可了。
text.man_en: Madame has told the abbot to call in a doctor to see me，but mine is not a malady to be cured by a doctor but by some good prescription from Miss Oriole．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Madam asked the Elder to ask the Imperial Doctor to come to see me, but I am not cured by the Imperial Doctor, unless Miss has a good prescription, then this disease can be cured.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Madam asked the elder to ask the imperial doctor to see me. My bad syndrome cannot be cured by the imperial doctor. Unless the lady has a good prescription, the disease will be cured.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Madam asked the elder to invite the imperial physician to see me, but this severe condition of mine is not something that can be treated by the physician. Unless the young lady has some excellent remedy, this ailment cannot be cured.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 夫人让修道院长请医生来给我看病，但我的病不是医生能治好的，而是黄鹂小姐开的药方能治好的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 夫人吩咐方丈请医生来看我，但我的病不是靠医生就能治愈的，而是靠黄鹂小姐开出的良方才能治愈。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 夫人已经告诉修道院长叫医生来看我，但我的病不是医生可以治好的，而需要黄鹂小姐的一些好药方。

text.ori_cn: (红娘上云)俺小姐害得人一病郎当，如今又着俺送甚药方儿。
text.man_en: Rose enters and says:My young mistress has caused him such a terrible illness，yet she bids me to take this prescription to him．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang on the cloud) I Miss caused a person to be sick, and now I have to send me what medicine.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The matchmaker goes up to the cloud) My lady has made people sick, and now she is giving me a prescription.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The matchmaker goes on stage) My lady has caused someone to fall seriously ill, and now she sends me to deliver the prescription.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗丝进来说：我的小主人让他生了一场大病，却让我把这个药方拿给他。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝进来说：我年轻的情妇给他带来了如此可怕的疾病，但她却吩咐我把这个药方带给他。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝进来，说：我的小女主人让他病得如此严重，她却让我把这个处方带给他。

text.ori_cn: 异乡最有离愁病，妙药难医肠断人。
text.man_en: Homesickness in strange landCan't be cured by good hand；Nor can the finest art Heal a halfbroken heart．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: A foreign land is the most sickening place to be, and it is hard to cure a broken heart with a good medicine.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The disease of separation is most common in a foreign land, and it is difficult to cure a broken heart with good medicine.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The deepest sorrow in a foreign land, even the best remedy can't heal a broken heart.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 独在异乡为异客，每逢佳节倍思亲。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 异乡思乡，巧手无法治愈；艺术也无法治愈半破碎的心。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在异乡的思乡之情，优秀的手艺也无法治愈；即使是最精湛的艺术，也无法疗愈半颗破碎的心。

text.ori_cn: 先是你彩笔题诗，回文织锦，引得人卧枕着床，忘餐废寝。
text.man_en: You were the first to writeA poem to the scholar brightSo that he could not raise his headFrom the pillow of his bed，Forgetful of his food and sleep．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: First you wrote poems with colourful pencils and weaved brocade with echoes, attracting people to lie on their beds and forgetting to eat and sleep.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: First, you wrote poems in colored pens and weaved brocades with palindrome, which made people lie down on their pillows and forget about meals and sleep.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: First, you use your colored brush to compose poems and weave brocade with palindromes, captivating people to the point of lying in bed, forsaking meals and sleep.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你是第一个写诗给明亮的学者的人，以至于他不能从枕头上抬起头来，忘记了他的食物和睡眠。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你先作诗赠明书生，使他枕上抬不起头，废寝忘食。

text.ori_cn: 到如今鬓似愁潘，腰如病沈，恨已深，病已沉。
text.man_en: And now his hair turns gray, His figure wastes away，For his regret and illness are both deep．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Nowadays, my temples look like sad pans, my waist is like sick Shen, my hatred is already deep, and my sickness is already sinking.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Nowadays, my temples look like they are worried, my waist is like a disease, my hatred is deep and my disease is serious.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Now my temples resemble Pan's in sorrow, my waist like Shen's in illness; my regret is profound, and my ailment severe.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如今他头发花白，身形消瘦，因为他的遗憾和疾病都很深重。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 今头发花白，身形消瘦，悔病深重。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 而今鬓发斑白，形体消瘦，悔恨和病痛都很深。

text.ori_cn: 你倚着栊门儿待月，依着韵脚儿联诗，侧着耳朵儿听琴。
text.man_en: You leaned upon the door alone，Waiting for the rising moon；You wrote a poem fine To rhyme with his verse line；With ears intent，you listened muteTo his playing of lute．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You lean on the barred door to wait for the moon, follow the rhyme of the poem, and listen to the qin with your ears.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You lean against the gate to wait for the moon, couple poems in rhyme and rhyme, and listen to the piano with your ear bent.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You lean against the lattice door waiting for the moon, rhyme poems in succession, and incline your ear to listen to the qin.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你独自倚在门边，等待月亮升起；你写了一首好诗，与他的诗句押韵；你竖起耳朵，静静聆听他的琵琶演奏。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你独倚门，等明月；你写一首好诗，与他的诗句押韵；你用心，听他弹琵琶。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你独自倚在门边，等着月亮升起；你写了一首诗，和他的诗句押韵；你静静听着，专心地听他弹奏琵琶。

text.ori_cn: 昨夜忽然撇假偌多，说张生我与你兄妹之礼，甚么勾当。
text.man_en: She says:But last night you suddenly talked nonsense，asking him what he should do as a brother to a sister．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Last night, I suddenly took a leave of absence, saying that Zhang Sheng and I are your brother and sister, what kind of hook.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Last night, I suddenly gave up so many lies, talking about Zhang Sheng, me and your brother and sister.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Last night, you suddenly spoke falsely, claiming that you and I have a sibling-like relationship. What is this about?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她说：但昨天晚上你突然说胡话，问他作为哥哥对妹妹应该怎么做。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她说：但是昨晚你突然胡言乱语，问他作为兄弟姐妹应该做什么。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她说：但是昨晚你突然说起胡话，问他作为兄长应该对妹妹做些什么。

text.ori_cn: 忽把个书生来跌窨，今日又是"红娘，我有个好药方儿，你将去与了他"。
text.man_en: She continues to sing:You have entrapped the scholar bright．She says:Today you say you have a good prescription for me to take to him．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Suddenly, a scholar came to the manhole, and today it was "Hongniang, I have a good prescription, you will go with him".
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Suddenly a scholar came and fell, and today it was "Matchmaker, I have a good prescription, you are going to give it to him."
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Suddenly, a scholar stumbled. Today, it's again, 'Hong Niang, I have a good remedy. Please take it to him.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 她继续唱道：你诱得书生明． 她说：今天你说有好药方，让我拿去给他吃．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 她继续唱着：你把聪明的学者困住了。她说：今天你说你有一个好药方要我给他服用。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 她继续唱道：你已经引诱了那位才子。她说：今天你说你有一个好药方让我带给他。

text.ori_cn: 难禁，倒教俺似线脚儿般殷勤，不离了针。
text.man_en: It's hard to bear．I am kept going like the thread Which never leaves the needle bare．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It's hard to help, but I've been taught to be as attentive as a threaded foot, never leaving the needle.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I can't help but teach me to be as diligent as a thread and never leave the needle.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Couldn't help it, but made me as eager as a thread, never leaving the needle.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 难以忍受．我就像针尖上不离线一样，不停地穿梭．

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：我怎么才能摆脱困境呢？玫瑰小姐，能帮我筛选一下吗？
