text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师说：我该如何摆脱困境？罗斯小姐，请你帮我掩护一下，好吗？

text.ori_cn: 既然泄漏怎干休，是我先投首。
text.man_en: What leaked out could not be screened with successSo at once I had to confess
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Since the leakage is so serious, I am the one who threw myself in the first place.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Since it's leaked, what can I do? I'm the first to surrender.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Since the leak has happened, how can it be stopped? I am the first to take responsibility.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 泄露出去的东西无法成功甄别，所以我不得不立即承认
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 泄露出去的东西无法成功筛选所以我不得不立即承认
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 泄漏出来的东西无法成功掩盖，所以我不得不马上坦白。

text.ori_cn: 他如今赔酒赔茶倒搁就，你反担忧。
text.man_en: My mistress now would entertain you with wine and tea．Why should you anxious be?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: He is now compensating for the wine and tea, and you are worried.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Now that he is paying for wine and tea, you are worried.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Now he's offering wine and tea to make amends, yet you are still worried.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的情妇现在会用酒和茶招待你。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 夫人现在用酒喝茶招待你，你何必着急呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的主人现在要用酒和茶招待你。你为什么还要焦虑呢？

text.ori_cn: 我担着个部署不周。
text.man_en: Am I a chaperon obscene?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm burdened with a poor deployment.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I'm worried about a poor deployment.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I bear the responsibility for inadequate deployment.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我这个监护人淫秽吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我是一个猥亵的监护人吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我是一个猥亵的监护人吗？

text.ori_cn: 我便待送你到官府去，只辱没了我家门。
text.man_en: If I should hand you over to the court，that would bring disgrace to my family．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm going to send you to the government, but it's a disgrace to my family.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I will send you to the government, which will only disgrace my family.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If I were to send you to the authorities, it would only disgrace my family.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果我把你交给朝廷，那将使我的家族蒙羞。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果我把你交给法庭，那会给我的家人带来耻辱。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 如果我把你交给法庭，那会给我的家庭带来耻辱。

text.ori_cn: 我没奈何，把莺莺便配与你为妻。
text.man_en: There is left only for me to marry my daughter to you．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I had no choice but to take Yingying as your wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I have no choice but to make Yingying your wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I have no choice but to marry Yingying to you as your wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 只剩下我把女儿嫁给你了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我只剩下把我的女儿嫁给你了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我只剩下把女儿嫁给你这一条路了。

text.ori_cn: 相思事，一笔勾，早则展放从前眉儿皱，密爱幽欢恰动头。
text.man_en: Your love affair Has been forgiven．Your eyebrows knit with care May now be riven．Your lovesicknessEnds in your happiness．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The love affair, a hook, early to show the release of the former frowning, secret love and secret happiness just moving head.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The love affairs, a stroke of love, will soon show the wrinkles in the past, and the secret love and joy will just move the head.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Affectionate thoughts, erased with a stroke, early they ceased to crease the brow, secret loves and intimate joys just stirred.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你的爱恋已被原谅，你精心编织的眉毛现在可能已被撕裂，你的相思在你的幸福中结束。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你的恋情已被原谅。你小心翼翼地紧锁的眉毛现在可能已裂开。你的相思以你的幸福结束。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你的爱情已被原谅。你因担忧而紧锁的眉头，现在可以放松。你的相思病终将以幸福告终。

text.ori_cn: 谁能够，兀的般可喜娘庞儿也要人消受。
text.man_en: O who would not embraceSuch a delightful maiden with a lovely face!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Who can, Wood's like a happy Niang Pang'er also want to be consumed.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Who can, the joyful mother-in-law also wants to be tolerated.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Who could bear to enjoy such a captivating face?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 哦，谁不愿意拥抱如此美丽动人的少女呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 哦，谁不会拥抱这样一位有着可爱脸庞的可爱少女呢！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 谁会不拥抱如此可爱的少女，这张美丽的脸庞多么迷人啊！

text.ori_cn: 寄语西河堤畔柳，安排青眼送行人。
text.man_en: Yingying sings：Send word to riverside green willow trees To see the rider off in vernal breeze!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Send a message to the willows along the West River embankment and arrange for green eyes to see off the pedestrians.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Send a message to the willows on the west bank of the river, arrange green eyes to see off the passers-by.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Sending words to the willows by the West River embankment, arranging a fond gaze to bid farewell to the traveler.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺唱：寄语江边绿柳树，送君一程春风来！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莺莺唱：送话江边青柳，春风送行！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莺莺唱道：传话给江畔的绿柳，看那骑士在春风中告别！

text.ori_cn: 直要到归来时，画堂箫鼓鸣春昼，方是一对儿鸾交凤友。
text.man_en: We must just wait till you come back again，When flutes and drums will enliven the scene，And like two lovebirds you are joined in twain，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Until the time of their return, the painting hall will be filled with pipes and drums in the spring, and they will be a pair of luan and phoenix friends.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It was not until the time of return that the flutes and drums in the painting hall were playing in the spring day, and a pair of Erluan made friends with the Phoenix.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Only when they return will the hall echo with flutes and drums in the spring daytime, marking the reunion of a perfect couple.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们必须等待你再次归来，届时，笛声和鼓声将为现场增添活力，你们就像两只鸳鸯，紧紧地结合在一起。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我们必须等到你再次回来，当笛子和鼓声响起时，你们就像两只爱情鸟结成一对，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我们必须等待你再次归来时，笛声和鼓声将使场面欢快，并且像两只爱情鸟一样你们将重新相聚。

text.ori_cn: 如今还不受你说媒红，吃你谢亲酒。
text.man_en: Then I'll receive your reward for a gobetween And drink a cup of wine For your union divine．(Exeunt．)
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Now I'm not going to accept your matchmaking bonus and eat your thank-you wine.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Now I don't accept your matchmaking, so I'll thank you for your wine.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Even now, I have not accepted your matchmaking, nor have I attended your reception banquet.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 然后，我将接受你的赏赐，为你们神圣的结合喝一杯美酒．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 那我就收你的媒人酬劳，喝一杯酒，为你们的神圣结合。（下。）
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 那么我就作为你的媒人接受你的奖励，喝一杯酒，为你们神圣的结合庆祝。(退场。)

text.ori_cn: (夫人上云)今日送张生赴京，红娘，快催小姐同去十里长亭。我已吩咐人安排下筵席，一面去请张生，想亦必定收拾了也。
text.man_en: Madame Cui enters and says:We are going to see Master Zhang start for the capital today，and Rose has gone to tell my daughter to come with us to the Pavilion of Farewell．I have ordered a feast prepared and an invitation sent to Master Zhang，and I think he must have finished his packing by now．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady on the cloud) Today to send Zhang Sheng to the capital, red lady, quickly urge the lady to go to the Ten Mile Pavilion. I have ordered people to arrange a banquet, one side to invite Zhang Sheng, I think also must have packed also.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madam goes up to the cloud) I will send Zhang Sheng to Beijing today. Matchmaker, hurry up and urge the young lady to go to Shili Changting with you. I have ordered people to arrange a banquet, and I went to invite Zhang Sheng. I thought it would be arranged.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Lady rises) Today we send Mr. Zhang to the capital. Hongniang, quickly urge the young mistress to accompany us to the Ten-Mile Pavilion. I have already instructed people to prepare the banquet. Go invite Mr. Zhang, I believe he must be ready by now.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人进来说："今天我们要送张老爷进京，蔷薇已经去告诉我女儿，让她和我们一起去别馆。 我已经命人准备了酒席，给张老爷送了请柬，我想他现在一定已经收拾好了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人进来说：今天要见张老爷子启程去京城，蔷薇已经去吩咐女儿跟我们一起去送别阁了。 ，我想他现在一定已经收拾好了行李。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人进来说道：今天我们要送张大人启程去京城，玫瑰已经去叫我女儿跟我们一起到离别亭了。我已经准备了宴席，并邀请了张大人，我想他现在应该已经收拾完毕了。

text.ori_cn: (张生上云)夫人夜来，逼我上朝取应，得官回来，方把小姐配我。
text.man_en: Master Zhang enters and says:Madame told me last night to go to the capital for the civil service examinations．She would marry her daughter to me if I come back with an official rank．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng on the cloud) Madam night, forced me to go to the court to get the answer, get the official back, before the lady with me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengshangyun) My wife came at night and forced me to go to court to get my wife. After I got the official post, I would be matched with the lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Sheng speaking) Madam insisted last night that I should go to the court to take the examination. Only after I return as an official will she marry her daughter to me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张老爷进来说：夫人昨夜叫我进京赶考，说我若考个功名回来，她就把女儿嫁给我。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张老爷子进来说：夫人昨夜叫我去京城应试，如果我回来考官，她就把她女儿嫁给我。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅进来，说：夫人昨晚告诉我要到京城去参加科举考试。如果我考取了功名，她就把女儿嫁给我。

text.ori_cn: 没奈何，只得去走一遭。
text.man_en: What can I do but go as she directed?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: There was nothing to do but go for a walk.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I had no choice but to take a walk.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: There was no other choice but to go and take a look.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 除了按她说的去做，我还能做什么呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 除了按照她的指示我还能做什么呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我除了按她指示的去做还能怎么办呢？

text.ori_cn: 碧云天，黄花地，西风紧，北雁南飞。
text.man_en: With clouds the sky turns grey0'er yellowbloompaved way．How bitter blows the western breeze! From north to south fly the wild geese．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The sky of blue clouds, the land of yellow flowers, the west wind is tight, the north geese fly south.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The sky is blue and the sky is yellow, the ground is yellow, the west wind is strong, and the wild geese from the north are flying south.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The azure clouds fill the sky, the yellow flowers blanket the ground, the west wind blows fiercely, and the northern geese fly south.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 天空乌云密布． 西风凛冽．大雁从南飞到北．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 乌云密布，天空变得灰暗，道路泛黄。西风吹得多么刺骨！大雁从北向南飞。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 乌云密布天色灰，黄花遍地路难行。西风苦，南北飞，雁阵行。

text.ori_cn: 恨成就得迟，怨分去得疾。
text.man_en: It's my regret So late we met；It grieves my heartSo soon to part．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Hatred is late, and resentment is fast.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Hatred comes late, resentment fades quickly.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Hatred forms slowly, but grievances disperse quickly.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 相见恨晚，惜别心伤。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 相见得太晚，是我的遗憾；分离，是我的心伤痛。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 相见恨晚，别离心酸。

text.ori_cn: 柳丝长，玉骢难系。
text.man_en: Long as the willow branch may be，It cannot tie his parting steed to the tree．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The willow wire is long and the buckskin is hard to tie.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The willow silk is long and jade is difficult to tie.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The willow branches are long, making it hard to tether the jade-colored steed.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 柳枝再长，也拴不住离别的骏马。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 柳枝虽长，也不能将离别之马拴在树上。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 柳枝虽长，难系君马于此。

text.ori_cn: 马儿慢慢行，车儿快快随。
text.man_en: Go slowly，parting steed；Cab，follow it with speed!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The horse travelled slowly, the cart followed quickly.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The horse moves slowly and the car follows quickly.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The horse moves slowly, while the cart follows quickly.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 慢慢走，分开骏马；驾驶室，快速跟上！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 慢行，别马；驾驶室，快跟上！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 走慢点，离别的骏马；出租车，快跟上它！

text.ori_cn: 恰告了相思回避，破题儿又早别离。
text.man_en: Of lovesickness just cured，The grief of parting must now be endured．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I've been told to avoid it, but I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to say goodbye.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I just told you that I missed you and avoided it, but I broke up and left early.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Just as we were avoiding the pangs of longing, we were already facing an early parting.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 相思病刚刚治愈，离别的悲痛又要承受。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 相思刚刚痊愈，离别之愁又要忍。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 刚刚治愈相思病，又要忍受离别愁。

text.ori_cn: 猛听得一声去也，松了金钏。
text.man_en: "I'm going, "when a voice is heard to say．My body seems to waste away．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I heard a go-go sound and let go of Jinchuan.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Hearing a sudden sound, he let go of his golden bracelet.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Suddenly, a resounding departure was heard, and the golden hairpin was loosened.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: "我走了，"这时，一个声音传来："我的身体似乎在消瘦．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: “我要走了，”这时听到一个声音说。我的身体似乎日渐消瘦。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: “我要走了，”当一个声音传来时说。我的身体似乎在消瘦。

text.ori_cn: (红云)小姐，你今日竞不曾梳裹呵。
text.man_en: Rose says: You have not made your toilet today, my young mistress．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red Cloud) Miss, you have not combed your hair today.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) Miss, you haven’t combed your hair today.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss Hongyun, you didn't do your hair today, did you?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗斯说：你今天没有上厕所，我的小情人．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：我年轻的女主人，你今天还没上厕所。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗斯说：你今天还没有梳洗呢，我的小主人。

text.ori_cn: 见安排车儿马儿，不由不熬熬煎煎的气。
text.man_en: Seeing the cab and steed ready to start，How can I not feel grief and anguish gnaw my heart?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Seeing the arrangement of the car and horse, can not help but not simmering gas.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Seeing the arrangement of carriages and horses, I couldn't help but feel tormented.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Seeing the arrangements of carriages and horses, one cannot help but feel anxious and uneasy.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 看到驾驶室和骏马蓄势待发，我怎能不悲痛欲绝？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 看着车马准备出发，我怎能不感到悲伤和痛苦啃咬着我的心？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 看着马车和骏马准备出发，我怎能不感到悲伤和苦痛撕扯着我的心？

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)张生你近前来，自家骨肉，不须回避。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says：Come nearer, Master Zhang．Now that you are my flesh and blood，there is no need for you to avoid my daughter．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) Zhang Sheng, you come closer, your own flesh and blood, no need to avoid.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) Zhang Sheng, you come closer, you are your own flesh and blood, there is no need to shy away.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Madam says) Zhang Sheng, come closer. We are all family, no need to be so reserved.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：张大人，走近些，你既是我的骨肉，就不必躲避我的女儿了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：张老爷子，你再近一点，你既然是我的骨肉，就没有必要躲避我的女儿了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：张相公请走近些。既然你已是我的亲骨肉，就无需避着我女儿了。

text.ori_cn: 孩儿，你过来见了呵。
text.man_en: Come over here and meet him，my dear child!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Boy, you come over and see heh.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Baby, come here and see me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Child, come over here and greet us.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 过来见见他，我亲爱的孩子！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 过来见他吧，我亲爱的孩子！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 过来这边见见他，我亲爱的孩子！

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)张生这壁坐，老身这壁坐，孩儿这壁坐。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says：Sit down，Master Zhang．I will sit here and my child there．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) Zhang Sheng sits on this wall, the old body sits on this wall, and the child sits on this wall.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) Zhang Sheng sat on this wall, the old man sat on this wall, and the child sat on this wall.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Madam says) Zhang Sheng sits here, I sit here, and the child sits here.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：坐吧，张师傅，我坐这儿，孩子坐那儿。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：张老师请坐，我坐这儿，我的孩子坐那儿。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：张先生，请坐。我会坐在这里，我的孩子坐在那里。

text.ori_cn: 下西风黄叶纷飞，染寒烟衰草凄迷。
text.man_en: The west wind drives the withered leaves here and there；Decayed in mist，the grass has chilly, foggy air．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The yellow leaves fly in the west wind, and the cold smoke stains the grass.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: In the lower west wind, yellow leaves are flying, and the grass is faded and desolate due to the cold smoke.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The west wind blows leaves flying, dying grass shrouded in chilly mist, bleak and desolate.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 西风催枯叶，草色生寒雾。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 西风吹遍了枯叶，草枯了雾气。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 西风驱使枯叶四处飘散；雾气中腐朽的草地，充满了寒冷与潮湿的气息。

text.ori_cn: 酒席上斜签着坐的。
text.man_en: I see him sit at table，slanting his head，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The wine table sits diagonally signed.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Sitting diagonally at the banquet.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He was seated at the banquet slightly askew.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我看见他坐在桌边，歪着头，
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我看到他坐在桌边，歪着头，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我看到他歪着头坐在桌旁，

text.ori_cn: 我见他蹙愁眉，死临侵地。
text.man_en: Knitting his brows，as if halfdead．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I saw him frowning with sadness, dying on the ground.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I saw him frowning and dying.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I saw him frown with sorrow, as if death was approaching.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 拧着眉头，一副半死不活的样子．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他皱起眉头，像是半死不活。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他紧锁眉头，仿佛半死不活。

text.ori_cn: 阁泪汪汪不敢垂，恐怕人知。
text.man_en: He dare not let his tears fall from his brimful eyes For fear his grief be known．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The court is too tearful to hang down for fear of being known.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I don't dare to shed tears, for fear that others will know.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Tears welled up in her eyes but did not fall, for she feared others noticing.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他不敢让泪水从潋滟的双眸中滑落，生怕自己的悲伤被人知道．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他不敢让泪水从他的眼眶里流下来，因为他害怕他的悲伤被人知道。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他不敢让泪水从充满的眼眶中流出，怕被人发现他的悲伤。

text.ori_cn: 猛然见了把头低，长吁气，推整素罗衣。
text.man_en: Seeing himself observed，he utters sighs，Pretending to arrange his white silk gown．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Suddenly saw the head down, long breath, push the whole Su Luo clothes.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Suddenly he lowered his head, took a long breath, and straightened Su Luo's clothes.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Suddenly lowering his head, he let out a long sigh and adjusted his plain silk robe.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 看到自己被观察，他叹了口气，假装整理自己的白色丝绸长袍。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 见自己被人注视，他叹了口气，假装整理自己的白丝长袍。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 见自己被注视，他发出叹息，假装整理他的白色丝衣。

text.ori_cn: 意似痴，心如醉，只是昨宵今日清减了小腰围。
text.man_en: My mind with him infatuated，My heart with love intoxicated，Just overnightMy slender waist has grown more slight．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The intention is like obsession, the heart is like drunkenness, just last night and today, the clear reduction of the small waistline.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My mind is like crazy, my heart is like drunkenness, but my waistline has been slimmed down yesterday night and today.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The meaning seems foolish, the heart feels intoxicated, yet just from last night to today my waistline has slightly slimmed down.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的心被他迷恋，我的心被爱陶醉，就在一夜之间，我纤细的腰身变得更加苗条了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的心因他的痴情，我的心因爱的陶醉，就在一夜之间我纤细的腰变得更加纤细。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的心因他而痴迷，我的心因爱而陶醉，只是一夜之间，我纤细的腰变得更加苗条。

text.ori_cn: 我只为合欢未已，离愁相继，前暮私情，昨夜分明，今日别离。
text.man_en: Our joy of union not complete，Our grief of parting comes so fleet．You know how much for you l cared．It was not till last night was our love declared．But oh, todayYou' ll go away!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I am only for the joy of the merger has not yet been, the separation of sorrows, the former twilight of the private love, last night, the separation, today, parting.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I just feel that the joy is not over yet, the sadness of separation comes one after another, the secret love in the past and the last night is clear, and we are separated today.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I solely lingered for the unfulfilled joy, continuous parting sorrow, the private affection of the previous night, the clarity of last night, and the separation of today.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们结合的喜悦还没有结束，我们离别的悲伤来得如此之快。 你知道我是多么地在乎你。 直到昨天晚上，我们的爱才宣告成立。但哦，今天你就要离开了！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我们的结合的喜悦尚未完全，我们的离别的悲伤来得如此短暂。你知道我有多关心你。直到昨晚我们才宣布了爱情。但是哦，今天你会离开！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 相聚的欢乐尚未完全，离别的哀愁已然来得那么快。你知道我有多么在乎你。直到昨晚我们的爱才被宣告。但今天，你就要离开了！

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)红娘，服侍小姐把盏者。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:Help your young mistress to pour out wine，Rose．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) Hongniang, serve the young lady to hold the lamp.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) Matchmaker, the one who serves the young lady and holds the candle.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The lady says) Hongniang, serve the young lady her drink.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：帮少奶奶斟酒，玫瑰。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：罗斯，帮小姐倒酒吧。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：罗丝，帮你的小姐倒酒。

text.ori_cn: 你轻远别，便相掷，全不想腿儿相压，脸儿相偎，手儿相持。
text.man_en: While young，One makes light of a farewell long；Lighthearted，Lovers do not care to be parted．Canst thou forget thy leg across mine，My cheek against thine，Hand in hand we combine?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When you parted, you threw yourself at each other, not wanting to press your legs against each other, snuggle your face against each other, or hold your hands against each other.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You care to say goodbye, so you throw each other away. You don't want to have your legs pressing against each other, your faces leaning against each other, and your hands holding each other's hands.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: As you gently depart, you toss away any thoughts of your legs pressing together, faces snuggling close, and hands holding each other.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 年少时，人轻言别；轻狂时，恋人不惜别。 你能忘记你的腿跨过我的，我的脸颊贴着你的，我们手牵手吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 年轻的时候，告别的感觉很漫长；轻松的心情，恋人不介意分开。你能忘记你的腿跨过我的腿，我的脸颊贴着你的脸，我们手拉手结合在一起吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 年少时，人们轻视长别；心情愉快时，恋人们不在乎分离。你能忘记你的腿曾经搭在我的腿上，我的脸颊贴着你的脸颊，手牵着手，我们紧紧相拥吗？

text.ori_cn: 供食太急，你眼见须臾对面，顷刻别离。
text.man_en: So quickly passes the feast．We sit now face to face；We' ll then be west and east
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The food offering is so hasty that you see the opposite side of the world in a moment and part with it in a moment.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The supply of food is too urgent, and you see the other side for a moment, and you are separated in an instant.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The food is served in such haste that, in the blink of an eye, you find yourself facing someone, and in an instant, parting ways.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 宴席很快就过去了． 我们现在面对面坐着．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 盛宴很快就过去了。我们现在面对面坐着；然后我们就会向西和向东
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 盛宴如此匆匆结束。我们现在相对而坐；此后我们将东西各别。

text.ori_cn: 若不是席间子母当回避，有心待举案齐眉。
text.man_en: If Mother were not in her place，We might have enjoyed a bridal meal alone'
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If not for the fact that the children and mothers should be shunned at the table, there is a desire to be raised to the same level.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If it weren't for the fact that the mother-in-law should have avoided it during the dinner, they would have raised eyebrows if they were willing to file a case.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If not for the mother and child needing to avoid each other at the scene, one would have wished to lift the tray with mutual respect.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果母亲不在，我们可能会独自享用一顿新婚大餐。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果妈妈不在她的位置，我们可能会独自享受一顿喜宴。”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 要不是母亲在这里，我们可能就独自享用婚宴了。

text.ori_cn: 虽是厮守得一时半刻，也合教俺夫妻每共桌而食。
text.man_en: Although the time will soon pass by，It might be called a dinner of our own．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Although we have to stay together for a while, we can also teach our husband and wife to eat together at the same table.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Even though we only stay together for a short while, we still teach my husband and wife to eat at the same table.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Even if it's just for a moment, we ought to dine together as husband and wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 虽然时间很快就会过去，但这可能会被称为我们自己的晚餐。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 虽然时间很快就过去了，但这或许可以称为我们自己的晚餐了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 虽然时间很快就会过去，但这可能会被称为我们自己的晚餐。

text.ori_cn: (红把张生盏毕，把莺莺盏，云)小姐，你今早不曾用早饭，随意饮一口儿汤波。
text.man_en: Rose，pouring out a cup for Master Zhang and another for Yingying, says：You have not had breakfast this morning，my young mistress．Will you please drink a little?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red put Zhang Sheng marigold after, put Ying Ying marigold, cloud) Miss, you have not used breakfast this morning, feel free to drink a mouthful of soup wave.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The red cup is decorated with Zhang Sheng's cup, and the cup with Yingying cup is finished.) Miss, you didn't have breakfast this morning, so you just took a sip of soup.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hong places a cup before Zhang Sheng, then one before Yingying, and says) Miss, you haven't had breakfast this morning, please have a sip of soup.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰给张师傅倒了一杯，又给盈盈倒了一杯，说：我的小主人，你今天早上还没吃早饭呢。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝给张老爷倒了一杯，又给莹莹倒了一杯，说道：小姐，你今天早上还没吃早饭，请喝一点好吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 薇薇给张大师倒了一杯，又给莺莺倒了一杯，说：小姐，您早上还没用早餐，请喝一点吧。

text.ori_cn: 将来的酒共食，尝着似土和泥，假若便是土和泥，也有些土气息，泥滋味。
text.man_en: They offer me both food and wine，Which taste like muddy water' neath the feet：As mud the food is not so fine；As water the wine is not so sweet．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The wine of the future, when eaten together, tastes like earth and mud, and if it is earth and mud, it has some earthy flavour and taste.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The wine in the future will taste like earth and mud. If it is earth and mud, it will also have a smell of earth and a taste of mud.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The wine of the future, shared with food, tastes like earth and clay. Even if it is indeed earth and clay, it still carries some earthy scent and clay flavor.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他们为我提供美酒佳肴，却像脚下的泥水：菜如泥，不那么美味；酒如水，不那么甘甜。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他们给我提供食物和酒，其味道就像脚下的泥水：如泥食不那么细，如水酒不那么甜。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他们给我提供了食物和酒，它们的味道像脚下的泥水：食物不像泥那么好；酒不像水那么甜。

text.ori_cn: 暖溶溶玉醅，白泠泠似水，多半是相思泪。
text.man_en: E'en warmed wine as cold as ice appears：It is diluted with my lovesick tears．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Warm jade spirits, white water, most of them are tears of love.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Warm and melting jade fermented grains, white and cold like water, mostly tears of lovesickness.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Warm and mellow like jade brew, clear and cool like water, mostly like tears of longing.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 冷若冰霜的温酒出现了：它被我相思的泪水稀释．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 温热的酒冷如冰：它被我相思的泪水稀释了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 即使温暖的酒也如冰冷一般：因为它被我的相思泪水稀释了。

text.ori_cn: 面前茶饭不待吃，恨塞满愁肠胃。
text.man_en: Not that l will not eat the food before my eyes；But mat my stomach's filled with grief and sighs．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I don't want to eat the food in front of me, but I hate to fill my stomach with sadness.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is no food and tea in front of me, and my stomach is full of sorrow.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The meal before me remains untouched, for my sorrow fills my heart and stomach.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 不是我不吃眼前的食物；而是我的胃里充满了悲伤和叹息。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 并不是我不吃眼前的食物，而是遇见了我充满悲伤和叹息的胃。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 不是我不吃眼前的食物，而是我的胃充满了悲伤和叹息。

text.ori_cn: 只为蜗角虚名，蝇头微利，拆鸳鸯坐两下里。
text.man_en: For fame as empty as the horn of a snail，For profit trifling as the head of a fly，Two lovebirds torn apart bewail．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Just for the sake of snail's fame and petty profits, they break up the mandarin ducks and sit on the two sides of the table.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Just for the false reputation of the cochlear horn, and the meager profit of the petty head, the mandarin ducks can sit down for a few times.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Only for vain fame as small as a snail's horn and insignificant profits as tiny as a fly's head, they separate loving couples and make them sit apart.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 名如蜗牛角，利如苍蝇头，两情若是久长时，又岂在朝朝暮暮？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 为了名利如蜗牛角空，为了利微如苍蝇头，两只爱情鸟撕碎哀嚎。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 一为蜗角虚名忙，一为蝇头微利役。鸾凤分飞恨难平。

text.ori_cn: 霎时间杯盘狼藉，还要车儿投东，马儿向西，两处徘徊，大家是落日山横翠。
text.man_en: They remove in a moment dish and cup，The cab goes down，the horse goes up．Both linger tillThe sun sinks behind the bar of a green hill．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: All of a sudden the cups and plates are in a mess, but also the car cast east, the horse to the west, two wandering, everyone is the sunset mountain across the emerald.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: In an instant, the cups and plates were in a mess, the carriages turned east, the horses wandered west, and everyone was surrounded by green mountains and sunsets.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: In an instant, the table was a mess, with dishes scattered everywhere. The carriage headed east while the horses went west, wandering in two directions, all under the setting sun with mountains turning green.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 顷刻间，他们取走了盘子和杯子，马车下了车，马儿上了马。 两人都流连忘返，直到夕阳沉入青山的屏障之后。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他们立即移走盘子和杯子，马车下去，马上升。两者都持续到太阳落到青山的栏杆后面。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他们瞬间取走了盘子和杯子，马车缓缓行驶，马儿昂首向前。两者暂停，直到太阳在绿色山丘的边缘消失。

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)红娘，吩咐辆起车儿，请张生上马，我和小姐回去。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says：Rose，bid them to get ready the carriage and request Master Zhang to mount his horse．I am going back with your young mistress．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) Hongniang, order a car to get up and ask Zhang Sheng to get on the horse, I and Miss to go back.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) Matchmaker, order the car to start, and ask Mr. Zhang to get on the horse. The lady and I will go back.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The lady says) Hongniang, order the carriage and invite Zhang Sheng to mount. The young lady and I are returning.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：玫瑰，叫他们准备马车，请张老爷上马。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人道：玫瑰，吩咐他们备好马车，请张老爷上马。我要随少夫人回去了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：玫瑰，叫他们准备好马车，告诉张少爷上马。我和你家小姐要一起回去。

text.ori_cn: (莺莺云)住者，君行别无所赠，口占一绝，为君送行：弃掷今何道，当时且自亲。还将旧来意，怜取眼前人!
text.man_en: Yingying says:I have no other farewell gift for you but an impromptu quatrain：Now left alone，what can I say, I whom you loved deep night and day?Do not bestow your love of oldUpon another whom you behold!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Yingying Yun) I have nothing to give to you, so I'll give you a goodbye by saying: "I'm not going to throw it away, but I'm going to kiss you. I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to do that, but I'm going to be able to do it," she said.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Yingying cloud) You, you, have nothing to give me when you go out, but I have the best of my words to see you off: What's the point of abandoning me now? I'll do it myself at that time. Repay the old intention and take pity on the people in front of you!
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Ying Ying said) Since you're leaving, I have nothing else to offer you. I composed a short verse to see you off: Where our paths diverge today, remember our closeness. Cherish the ones before you, as we once cherished each other!
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺说：我没有别的送别礼物，只有一首即兴四言诗：如今只剩下我一个人，你日夜深爱的我，还能说什么呢？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 莹莹说：除了即兴绝句，我没有别的告别礼物给你：如今独自一人，我能说什么呢，你日夜深爱的我？不要把你的旧爱赐给你所见的另一个人！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莹莹说：我没有其他的送别礼物给你，只有一首即兴的绝句：如今独自留下，我还能说什么呢？你曾日日夜夜深爱我的人啊，别将你的旧爱给予他人！

text.ori_cn: 此诗，一来小生此时方寸已乱，二来小姐心中到底不信。
text.man_en: As I am in a confused state of mind and you may not believe what I say，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: This poem, firstly, I have been confused at this time, secondly, Miss heart in the end do not believe.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: This poem, first of all, Xiaosheng is already confused, and secondly, the young lady doesn’t believe it in her heart.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Firstly, this poem, my mind is in disarray at this moment; secondly, the lady still harbors doubts in her heart.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我现在头脑不清，我说的话你们可能不相信。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 由于我现在心情很混乱，你可能不相信我说的话，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 由于我现在处于一种困惑的心境，你可能不会相信我所说的话，

text.ori_cn: 且等即口状元及第回来，那时敬和小姐。
text.man_en: I will not respond to your poem until I come back with the highest literary honor．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: And wait for the mouth of the scholar and the first to come back, then respect and Miss.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Waiting for the first prize to come back, then Miss Jinghe.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Let us wait for the top scholar to return, and then pay respects to the lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 在我带着最高文学荣誉回来之前，我不会回应你的诗．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 在我带着最高的文学荣誉回来之前，我不会回应你的诗。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我不会回复你的诗，直到我带着最高的文学荣誉回来。

text.ori_cn: 淋漓红袖淹情泪，知你的青衫更湿。
text.man_en: My sleeves in crimson tears of love are drowned；I know more soaked are yours，those of the bluegowned．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Drenched in red sleeves and drowning in tears of love, I know your green shirt is even wetter.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The dripping red sleeves are flooded with tears of love, knowing that your green shirt is even wetter.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Tears soaked my red sleeves, knowing your green robe is even wetter.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的衣袖浸满了深红的相思泪；我知道你的衣袖浸满了更多的相思泪。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的袖子被爱的深红色泪水淹没；我知道你的，蓝色长袍的袖子被浸湿了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我袖子上的红色泪水为爱消磨，我知道你蓝衫上的泪水更多。

text.ori_cn: 伯劳东去燕西飞，未登程先问归期。
text.man_en: Eastward the oriole and westward the swallow flies；Before you start I ask when you' I I return．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Burroughs went east and swallows flew west, asking for a return date before he embarked on his journey.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Shrike flew east to Yanxi and asked about his return date before embarking on the journey.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The shrike heads east while the swallow flies west; before the journey begins, the return date is asked.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 黄鹂东去，燕子西飞；君行早，我问君归期。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 黄雀东飞，燕子西飞；出发前问你何时归来。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 东飞黄鹂西飞燕，动身先问归何时。

text.ori_cn: 分明眼底人千里，已过尊前酒一杯。
text.man_en: Although afar, still you will be before my eyes；I'll drink a cup of wine to show my deep concern．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The people under my eyes are a thousand miles away, and I have already drunk a cup of wine before my honour.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It is clear that people thousands of miles away from the eyes have already passed a glass of wine in front of me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: People appear vividly in my eyes from a thousand miles away, as I have already drunk a cup of wine in front of me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 虽在远方，但你仍在我眼前；我要饮一杯酒，表达我深深的牵挂．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 虽远隔重洋，你仍在我眼前；我饮一杯酒，深情相思。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 纵然远在天边，依旧在我眼前；我当举杯饮酒，以表我深切的关怀。

text.ori_cn: 我未饮心先醉，眼中流血，心内成灰。
text.man_en: Before I drink，my heart is drunk，My eyes shed blood，in ash my feeling's sunk．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I was drunk before I drank, bleeding in my eyes and turning grey inside.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My heart is drunk before I drink, my eyes bleed, and my heart turns to ashes.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Without drinking, my heart is already intoxicated; blood flows from my eyes, my heart turns to ashes.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 酒未醒，心已醉，眼流血，情已灰。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 喝酒之前，我的心已醉，我的眼睛流血，我的感情沉入灰烬。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 未饮心已醉，眼泪血沁，诗情消沉于灰烬。

text.ori_cn: 到京师，服水土，趁程途，节饮食，顺时自保千金体。
text.man_en: Before your arrival，get used to harsh climate；When you pursue your way, in food be moderate! Take care of your own health，Which is a mine of wealth!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When you arrive at the capital, take advantage of the water and the soil, take advantage of the journey, save your food and drink, and keep your body in good time.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When arriving in the capital, obey the soil and water, take advantage of the journey, eat sparingly, and protect yourself in time.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Upon arriving in the capital, adapt to the local conditions, take advantage of the journey, regulate your diet, and take care of your precious health according to the season.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 来之前，要适应恶劣的气候；走的时候，饮食要适中！保重身体，健康是财富的源泉！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 来之前，适应恶劣的气候；追求自己的路，饮食要节制！照顾好自己的健康，这是一座财富的矿井！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在你到来之前，先适应恶劣的气候；当你追求自己的道路时，在饮食上要适度！注意你的健康，它是财富的宝库！

text.ori_cn: 荒村雨露眠宜早，野店风霜起要迟。
text.man_en: Early to bed on journey long in rainy daysAnd late to rise at country inn in wind and haze!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It is better to sleep early in a deserted village in the rain and dew, and to get up late in a wild shop in the wind and frost.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It is better to go to bed early in the rain and dew in a deserted village, but it is later to get wind and frost in a wild store.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: In the desolate village, it's best to sleep early with the rain and dew, while at the rustic inn, one should rise late in the wind and frost.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 在雨天的长途旅行中早睡，在风霾中的乡村客栈里晚起！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 雨天长途旅行早睡，风霾乡村客栈晚起！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 一路风雨早眠长途，客栈醒迟伴风雾！

text.ori_cn: 相思只自知，老天不管人憔悴。
text.man_en: Alone I know the pain．Should I complain to Heaven? O to what avail?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The love affair is only known to oneself, and God does not care that people are emaciated.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I only know myself when I love you, but God doesn’t care about how haggard I am.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Only those who are lovesick know their sorrow, Heaven does not care about human weariness.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我一个人知道这种痛苦．又有何用？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我独自知道痛苦。我应该向天堂抱怨吗？哦有什么用呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 独自一人，我知道这痛苦，我该向天诉说吗？唉，这又有什么用呢？

text.ori_cn: 泪添九曲黄河溢，恨压三峰华岳低。
text.man_en: My tears would make the Yellow River overflow；My grief would make three mountain peaks bend low．At dusk I' ll lean on western tower's rail
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Tears add to the overflow of the Yellow River in nine curves, and hatred presses down on the three peaks of Huayue.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Tears add to the nine bends of the Yellow River and overflow, and hatred overwhelms the three peaks of Huayue.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Tears add to the overflowing Yellow River, and hatred weighs down the three peaks of Mount Hua.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的泪水会让黄河泛滥；我的悲伤会让三座山峰低垂。 黄昏时分，我将倚在西楼的栏杆上
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的泪使黄河泛滥，我的悲伤使三座山峰低垂，黄昏时我将倚在西楼栏杆上。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的眼泪会让黄河泛滥，我的悲伤会使三座山峰低垂。黄昏时，我将倚靠在西楼的栏杆上。

text.ori_cn: 到晚西楼倚，看那夕阳古道，衰柳长堤。
text.man_en: To watch the setting sun o'er ancient way And withered willow trees along the bay．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: In the evening, I leaned on the west tower and watched the sunset on the old road and the long embankment of decaying willows.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: In the evening, you can lean against the west tower and watch the setting sun on the ancient road and the long embankment of declining willow trees.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Leaning on the western tower till dusk, observing the ancient pathway under the setting sun and the withered willows lining the long embankment.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 看夕阳西下的古道和海湾边枯萎的柳树．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 看古道夕阳，湾边柳树枯萎。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 看夕阳落在古老的道路上，沿着海湾枯萎的柳树。

text.ori_cn: 方才还是一处来，如今竟是独自归。
text.man_en: Not long ago we came in laughter；Alone l' I I be back shortly after．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Just now he came from one place, but now he is returning alone.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I came from the same place just now, but now I am returning alone.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Just earlier we were together, but now I am returning alone.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 不一会儿，我们就笑着进来了；一个人，我很快就回来了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 不久前，我们在笑声中进来；独自一人，不久之后我就回来了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 不久前我们带着笑声来到这里；不一会儿，我将独自一人归来。

text.ori_cn: 留恋应无计，一个据鞍上马，两个泪眼愁眉。
text.man_en: Can I detain you any longer here?You have mounted your steed now．Both of us are in tearWith a knitted eyebrow．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: There should be no plan to stay, one saddled up on a horse, two tearful eyes and worried brows.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There should be no regrets, one saddled the horse and the other two frowned with tears in their eyes.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Lingering sentiments seem futile; one mounts the horse, while two remain with tearful eyes and worried brows.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你已经骑上了你的骏马，我们都在流泪。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我还能在这里再耽搁你吗？你现在已经上马了。我们俩都泪流满面，眉头紧锁。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我还能再留你片刻吗？此刻你已上马出发。我们俩都黯然泪下，双眉紧锁。

text.ori_cn: 不忧文齐福不齐，只忧停妻再娶妻。
text.man_en: I care not if your talent won't build a career．But fear you may give up the old wife for the new．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I don't worry about Wenqi and Fuqi, I only worry about stopping my wife and marrying her again.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Don't worry about whether you are well-educated or blessed, just worry about stopping your wife and getting married again.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Don't worry if the family's blessings come unevenly, just worry about having to remarry if your wife leaves you.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我不在乎你的才华不能建功立业，只怕你为了新欢而放弃旧妻。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我不在乎你的才华是否能成就事业。但担心你可能会为了新妻而放弃旧妻。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我不在乎你的才华是否能成就事业，但我担心你会为了新人而抛弃旧妻。

text.ori_cn: 河鱼天雁多消息。
text.man_en: I wish wild geese and fish would bring your letters here．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: River fish and sky geese are much in the news.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: River fish and wild geese have lots of news.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: There are many messages from river fish and heavenly swans.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我希望大雁和鱼儿能把你的信带到这里来．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我希望大雁和鱼能把你的信带到这里。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我希望鸿雁与鱼传来你的书信。

text.ori_cn: 我这里青鸾有信频须寄，你切莫金榜无名誓不归。
text.man_en: While I shall send you tidings by the Phoenix BlueO do not swearYou won't come back unless you win the laurel crown!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have a letter from the Green Luan that I must send frequently, so don't vow not to return without the gold list.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I have letters from Qingluan that need to be sent frequently, so you must not return without a name on the gold list.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I often send letters with the Blue Luan from my place; you mustn't swear not to return unless your name is on the golden list.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我将用凤凰蓝给你送信，但你不要发誓，除非你赢得桂冠，否则不会回来！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 虽然我会通过凤凰蓝给你带来消息，但不要发誓，除非你赢得桂冠，否则你不会回来！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我会通过凤凰蓝将消息传递给你，不要发誓，除非你赢得了月桂冠，否则不要回来！

text.ori_cn: (张生云)小姐金玉之言，小生一一铭之肺腑。
text.man_en: Master Zhang says: My dear, your words as precious as gold and jade are imprinted on my heart．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) Miss words of gold and jade, I remembered one by one from the bottom of my heart.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) The lady’s golden words are remembered in the heart of the young lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Miss Zhang Shengyun, your words of wisdom are deeply engraved in my heart.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅说：亲爱的，你的话像金和玉一样珍贵，深深地印在我的心里。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张老师说：亲爱的，您的话如金玉良言，铭刻在我的心上。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大师说：亲爱的，您的金玉良言已印在我心。

text.ori_cn: 忍泪佯低面，含情假放眉。
text.man_en: Holding back tears，I pretended to make bows；Though feeling sad，I tried to unknit my brows．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Hold back your tears and pretend to keep your face down, and release your eyebrows with affection.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: She pretended to lower her face while holding back tears, and raised her eyebrows affectionately.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With tears held back, she feigns a lowered face, and with emotions suppressed, she falsely relaxes her brows.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我强忍着泪水，假装做蝴蝶结的样子；虽然心里很难过，但我还是努力地解开眉头。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我忍住泪水，假装鞠躬；虽然悲伤，我却努力解开眉头。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 强忍泪水，我假装作揖；虽然感到悲伤，我努力皱眉放松。

text.ori_cn: 青山隔送行，疏林不做美，淡烟暮霭相遮蔽。
text.man_en: Green hills and forests standing between him and me Seem to extend a thousand li．Thin mist and evening vapours screen him from my view．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The green mountains send us on our way, the sparse forests don't do anything beautiful, and the light smoke and twilight mist hide us from each other.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The green mountains separated us, the sparse forest was not beautiful, and the light smoke and dusk covered each other.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Green hills obstruct the departing view, sparse woods fail to offer beauty, and light smoke and twilight haze obscure each other.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他和我之间的青山和森林仿佛绵延千里． 薄薄的雾气和傍晚的水汽将他从我眼前遮挡住．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我与他之间，青山绿林，仿佛绵延千里。薄雾晚霞，将他挡在我的视线之外。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 青山与森林将他我隔开，似乎延伸了千里。薄雾和晚间的烟云将他隐没于我的视线之外。

text.ori_cn: 夕阳古道无人语，禾黍秋风听马嘶。
text.man_en: No human voice is heard on sunlit ancient way But rustling of the crops in autumn wind and horse's neigh．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: No one speaks on the ancient road at sunset, and the autumn wind in the corn hears the horses neighing.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is no one talking on the ancient road at sunset, and the autumn wind listens to the neighing of horses.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: On the ancient path under the setting sun, no one speaks; in the autumn wind over the fields, only the horses' neighs can be heard.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 阳光下的古道上没有人声，只有秋风中庄稼的沙沙声和马儿的嘶鸣声。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 阳光照射下的古道上听不到人声，只有秋风里庄稼的沙沙声和马嘶声。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 阳光照耀着的古道上没有人声，只有秋风中庄稼的沙沙声和马的嘶鸣.

text.ori_cn: 终然宛转从娇女，算是端严做老娘。
text.man_en: Although to give way to my daughter I appear, I've acted after all as proper mother dear．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I've never been a girl before, but I'm an old lady now.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Finally, she changed from a spoiled girl to a strict old lady.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ultimately, she gracefully submits to her charming daughter, yet endeavors to uphold her serious demeanor as a respected mother.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 虽然我是为了让位给女儿，但我毕竟还是尽到了母亲的责任。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 虽然我是为了让位给我的女儿而出现的，但我毕竟已经表现得像个合格的母亲了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 虽然我似乎为了让步于我的女儿，但我毕竟还是表现得像一个合适的母亲。

text.ori_cn: 四围山色中，一鞭残照里。
text.man_en: Surrounded by mountains east and west，He flips his whip on sunlit road．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: In the colour of the surrounding mountains, in the remnants of the light of a whip.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: In the surrounding mountains, a whip shines.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Amidst the surrounding mountain scenery, in the fading light of dusk with a single whip.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 东西群山环绕，他在阳光照耀下的道路上扬鞭奋蹄。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 东西三面环山，甩鞭日光路。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 东南西北山环绕，他扬鞭于阳光大道上。

text.ori_cn: (张生引琴童上，云)离了蒲东，早二十里也。
text.man_en: Master Zhang enters with his LuteBearer and says：We are already twenty li east to the Pu District，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng led the piano player to the stage and said, "I'm 20 miles away from Pudong.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Sheng leads the harp boy up, saying: We left Pudong twenty miles earlier.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Sheng enters with his young attendant carrying a zither, saying) We've already traveled twenty li from Pudong.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅带着琵琶郎走进来，说：我们已经向东走了二十里，到了蒲区。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师带着琵琶人进来，说道：我们已经到了浦区东二十里了，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张师傅带着他的琵琶手进来，说：我们已经在蒲区以东二十里了，

text.ori_cn: 兀的前面是草桥店，宿一宵，明日早行。
text.man_en: and before us appears the thatchroofed Inn at the Bridge．I will pass the night there and go on early tomorrow morning．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Woods in front of the grass bridge shop, stay overnight, tomorrow morning line.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: In front of Wu is the Caoqiao store, where we can stay overnight and leave early tomorrow.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Ahead lies the Caichao Inn, where we will rest for the night and set off early tomorrow.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我将在那里过夜，明天一早继续前行。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 在我们面前出现了桥上的茅草屋顶客栈。我将在那里过夜，明天一早继续前进。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在我们面前出现了桥边的茅草屋旅店。我会在那里过夜，明天一早继续上路。

text.ori_cn: 这马百般的不肯走呵。
text.man_en: My horse is unwilling to go further at any price．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: This horse won't go away for a hundred years.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: This horse refused to go away at all costs.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: This horse stubbornly refuses to move.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的马无论如何也不愿意走得更远。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的马不惜任何代价都不愿意走得更远。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的马无论付出什么代价都不愿意再走了。

text.ori_cn: 望蒲东萧寺暮云遮，惨离情半林黄叶。
text.man_en: The distant temple in a shroud Of evening cloud，My parting griefArises from each faded leaf．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Looking at Pudong Xiao Temple twilight clouds cover, miserable feelings of separation half of the forest yellow leaves.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Looking at Pudong Xiao Temple, the dusk clouds cover it, and half of the forest is filled with yellow leaves.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Looking towards Puyuan Temple in the east, evening clouds obscure the view, sorrowful departure fills the scene, with half the forest's leaves turned yellow.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 远处的寺庙在晚云的笼罩下，我离别的哀伤从每一片凋零的树叶中升起。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 远庙暮云缭绕，离别愁从每一片枯叶中升起。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 远寺在傍晚的云雾中，离别的愁绪从每一片落叶中升起。

text.ori_cn: 马迟人意懒，风急雁行斜。
text.man_en: The horse goes slow；The rider in a spirit low．Strong is the breeze，And broken the row of wild geese．

text.ori_cn: 呆打孩店房里没话说，闷对如年夜。
text.man_en: Dull am I in this lonely room．With none to speak to in the gloom．The night appearsAs long as years．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I stayed in the children's shop room with nothing to say, bored as the night.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我在这间孤独的房间里感到沉闷。在黑暗中没有人可以说话。夜色如岁月般漫长。

text.ori_cn: 竞不知此时，是甚时候了。

text.ori_cn: 听说罢，将香罗袖儿拽，原来是小姐。小姐!

text.man_en: Your broidered shoes covered with mud and dew，Outworn the soles of your cold feet．

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你的锦鞋沾满了泥水和露水，冰冷的脚底也磨破了。

text.ori_cn: 你当初废寝忘餐，香消玉减，比花开花谢犹自较争些。
text.man_en: When you forgot to sleep and eat，You looked like discolored jade，E'en worse than flowers that fade．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When you were in the beginning, you were more contented with your sleep and food than with the blossoming of a flower.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 当你废寝忘食时，你看起来就像褪了色的玉石，比凋谢的花朵还难看。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当你忘记睡觉和吃饭时，你就像变色的玉石，甚至比凋谢的花还要糟糕。

text.ori_cn: 想人生最苦是离别，你怜我千里关山，独自跋涉，似这般挂肚牵肠，倒不如义断恩绝。
text.man_en: I think the saddest thing to human heart Is to be torn apart．You pity me going afarAnd all aloneO'er hill and dale, 'neath moon and star．If I had knownOur love would cause such worry and regret， I'd wish we should never have met．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I think life is the most bitter parting, you pity me thousands of miles off the mountain, trekking alone, like this hanging heart, it is better to cut off the righteousness.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I think the most painful thing in life is parting. You pity me thousands of miles away from the mountain, trekking alone, so worried about me, it is better to cut off the kindness.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I think the hardest thing in life is parting. You felt sorry for me traveling alone across a thousand miles of mountains and rivers, enduring such longing and worry. It would be better to sever our ties decisively.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我想人世间最悲哀的事莫过于生离死别。 你怜我远行，孤身一人，走遍山山水水，披星戴月。 如果我知道我们的爱情会带来如此的烦恼和遗憾，我真希望我们永远不会相遇。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我想人心最悲伤的事莫过于心碎。你可怜我远行，孤身一人，漫山遍野，星月之下。如果早知道我们的爱会如此牵挂和遗憾，我希望我们不应该相遇。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我认为对人心最悲哀的事就是被撕裂。你怜惜我独自远行，翻越山丘和峡谷，在月亮和星星下。如果我早知道我们的爱情会带来如此的担忧和遗憾，我倒宁愿我们从未相遇。

text.ori_cn: 这一番花残月缺，怕便是瓶坠簪折。

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 只恐月残花败，我辈岂是蓬蒿人。

text.ori_cn: 小姐，你靠后些，我自与他话。
text.man_en: Stand behind me and l will speak to him．

text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You are hard around the Pu save the spade pout, strong when I throat battle sword and battle-axe, thieves heart thieves brain born inferior.

text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You stubbornly gathered around Pujiu with a shovel, forcefully blocking my throat with sword and axe, a naturally treacherous and vile mind.

text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It hurts so much to say goodbye, and it's hard to let go of a good dream.

text.ori_cn: (童云)天明也，早行一程儿，前面打火去。

text.man_en: My grief lasts longer than the weeping willow long；The rippling water sounds like my love's sobbing song．

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的忧伤比垂柳还长；荡漾的水声像我爱人的泣歌。

text.ori_cn: 别恨离愁，满肺腑难陶写。
text.man_en: My parting griefBitter beyond belief．

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的离愁别绪苦不堪言．

text.ori_cn: 跳东墙脚儿占了鳌头，惜花心养成折桂手，脂粉丛里包藏着锦绣。
text.man_en: His feet which jumped O'er east wall in foremost place stand；His heart which loves flowers wins laurels with his hand．Nor rouge nor powder could conceal his talent fine；
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The foot of the east wall jumped to take the lead, and the heart of the flower was nurtured to become the hand of the laurel, and the fat and powder bushes hid the embroidery.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 因为我的主人让我尽快带着你的信回去．

text.ori_cn: 这汗衫，若是和衣卧，便是和我一处宿，贴着他皮肉，不信不想我温柔。

text.ori_cn2dpl_en: This sweatshirt, if you are lying with the clothes, that is, with me a place to stay, close to his flesh, do not believe that I do not want to be gentle.

text.ori_cn: 这琴，当初五言诗紧趁逐，后来七弦琴成配偶。

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我们初恋的琵琶在歌唱，然后用它的琴弦把我们连在一起．

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我送他玉簪，是怕他忘了我；我送他玉簪，是怕他忘了我；我送他玉簪，是怕他忘了我；我送他玉簪，是怕他忘了我；我送他玉簪，是怕他忘了我；我送他玉簪，是怕他忘了我。

text.ori_cn: 这斑管儿，湘江两岸秋，当日娥皇因虞舜愁，今日莺莺为君瑞忧。

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我送他秋日江边的斑竹笔，好让他在看到皇后的踪迹时，想起我的泪容。

text.ori_cn: 这九嶷山下竹，共香罗衫袖口。

text.man_en2gpt_cn: 为生者流泪如同为逝者流泪一样，都是泪如泉涌。

text.ori_cn: 你逐宵野店上宿，休将包袱做枕头，怕油脂沾污恐难酬。

text.ori_cn: 书封雁足此时修，情系人心早晚休。
text.man_en: I would confide my letter to the wild geese，But I'm afraid love from his heart Would sooner or later be kept apart．

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我想把我的信告诉大雁，但我怕他心中的爱迟早会被分开。

text.ori_cn: 长安望来天际头，倚遍西楼，人不见，水空流。
text.man_en: I look for the capital ill at ease：It seems as far as the end of the sky．I lean on railings at the western tower's height，But still he's out of sight；In vain I see but water flowing by．
