text.man_en2gpt_cn: 自从我来到这里，即使有闲暇的时候，我何曾寻过欢？

text.ori_cn: 只在书房中颠倒个藤箱子，向里面铺几张纸。
text.man_en: Go to my study，empty a rattan box there，And spread a few sheets of paper inside!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Just turn a rattan box upside down in the study and lay a few sheets of paper into it.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Just turn a rattan box upside down in the study and put a few pieces of paper inside.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Just overturn a rattan box in the study and lay a few sheets of paper inside.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 去我的书房，在那里放一个藤箱，然后在里面铺上几张纸！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 去我的书房，清空那里的一个藤箱，并在里面铺上几张纸！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 去我的书房，把那里的一个藤盒清空，并在里面铺上几张纸！

text.ori_cn: 放时须索用心思，休教藤刺儿抓住绵丝。
text.man_en: When you put in these things，take care The pricks of rattan should not collide
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When you put it down, use your mind, and don't let the thorns of the vine catch the silk.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You have to use your mind when putting it down, don't teach the vine thorns to catch the silk.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: When placing it, you must use caution, so that the thorns do not catch the silk threads.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 放这些东西的时候，要注意藤条的刺不要相撞
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当你放入这些东西时，注意藤条的刺不要碰撞
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你放这些东西时，要小心藤条的刺不要碰撞。

text.ori_cn: 高摊在衣架上，怕风吹了颜色，乱穰在包袱中，怕挫了褶儿。
text.man_en: Or tangle with the silk and cotton thread!If on the clothesrack they're hung and spread，I am afraid Their color in the wind will fade．If in a bundle they are kept pellmell．Their folds will be creased, I fear．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Spread high on a hanger for fear of the wind blowing the colours away, and messily ranged in a bundle for fear of thwarting the folds.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It is spread out on a hanger for fear that the wind will blow away the color, and it is scattered among the baggage for fear of getting wrinkled.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Spreading it high on the clothes rack, fearing the wind might fade its color; packing it carelessly in the bundle, fearing the creases might get ruined.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果把它们挂在衣架上摊开，我担心它们的颜色会在风中褪色；如果把它们捆成一捆，我担心它们的褶皱会被折皱。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 或者用丝绸和棉线缠结！如果把它们挂在衣架上摊开，我担心它们的颜色在风中会褪色。如果把它们捆成一团，我担心它们的褶皱会被折皱。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 或是与丝线和棉线纠缠不清！如果挂在衣架上晾晒，我担心在风中它们的颜色会褪去。如果随意捆扎成一捆，我怕它们的折痕会变得明显。

text.ori_cn: 当如是，切须爱护，勿得因而。
text.man_en: You must do as I tellYou and hold these thing dear!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When this is the case, it must be loved and not be used as a result.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If this is the case, you must cherish it and don't let it happen.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If you do so, you must cherish it and not spoil it.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你必须按我说的去做，并珍视这些东西！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你必须按照我告诉你的去做，并珍惜这些东西！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你必须按我说的做，珍惜这些东西！

text.ori_cn: 恰新婚才燕尔，为功名来到此。
text.man_en: I had just won her handAnd came here to seek fame．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I came here for the sake of fame and fortune.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I just got married and came here for fame.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Just newlywed and full of affection, come here for fame and fortune.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我刚刚赢得了她的芳心，就来这里寻求功名．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我刚刚赢得了她的芳心，来到这里寻求名誉。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我刚刚赢得了她的芳心，来到这里寻求名望。

text.ori_cn: 长安忆念蒲东寺。
text.man_en: Can I forget the temple in the eastern land?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Chang'an remembers the Pudong Temple.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Chang'an recalls Pudong Temple.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Chang'an recalls Pudu Temple.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我能忘记东土的神庙吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我能忘记东方大地的寺庙吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 怎能忘记那东土的寺庙？

text.ori_cn: 昨宵个春风桃李花开夜，今日个秋雨梧桐叶落时。
text.man_en: Peach and plum burst in flameLast night in vernal breeze；In autumn rain today Leaves fall from the plane trees．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Last night's spring breeze brought peach and plum blossoms, and today's autumn rain brought sycamore leaves.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Last night there was a spring breeze and the peach and plum blossoms were in bloom; today there was an autumn rain and the sycamore leaves were falling.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Last night's spring breezes saw peach and plum blossoms bloom; today, autumn rains bring sycamore leaves to the ground.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 春风昨夜桃李绽，秋雨今日梧桐落。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 昨夜春风中桃李绽放，今秋雨中梧桐落叶。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 昨夜春风桃李一时新，今朝秋雨梧桐叶落纷。

text.ori_cn: 这天高地厚情，到海枯石烂时，直到烛灰眼下才无泪，蚕老心中罢却丝。
text.man_en: My love fulfilling earth and skyWill last till rocks are melted and the sea runs dryCould I cease to think of my dear?Could the burnt candle shed no tear?Could the silkworm cease to spin in its life?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: This heaven and earth love, to the sea withered and rotted, until the candle grey eyes without tears, the silkworm old heart strike but silk.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The sky is full of kindness, but when the sea is dry and the rocks are rotting, there will be no tears in the eyes until the candles are gray, and the silkworm heart is gone.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: This deep affection, lasting until seas dry up and rocks crumble, remains tearless until the candle burns out and the silkworm’s heart is spent.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的爱充实了大地和天空，直到岩石融化，海水干涸。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的爱填满天地 直到岩石融化，大海干涸 我是否可以不再想念我的亲人？燃烧的蜡烛是否可以不流泪？蚕是否可以停止一生的旋转？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我那充满天地的爱将永存，直到岩石溶解、大海枯竭。我能停止思念我的亲爱吗？燃尽的蜡烛能不流泪吗？蚕在生命期间能不作茧吗？

text.ori_cn: 不比轻薄子，抛夫妻琴瑟，拆鸾凤雄雌。
text.man_en: Could I be like the fickle sonWho would desert his wife．Severed from his dear one?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It is not like the light-hearted son, who throws away the couple's qin and se, and breaks up the luan and phoenix and the male and female.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: No more frivolous than a frivolous child, throwing away husband and wife, playing harp and harp, and tearing apart the male and female phoenixes.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Do not compare oneself to a frivolous person, who disregards the harmony between husband and wife, and separates the male and female phoenixes.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 难道我会像那个善变的儿子一样抛弃自己的妻子．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 难道我会像那个善变的儿子一样抛弃妻子，与心爱的人断绝关系吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 难道我会像那个反复无常的儿子，抛弃他的妻子，与他心爱的人分离？

text.ori_cn: 不闻黄犬音，难传红叶诗，路长不遇梅花使。
text.man_en: No yellow dog brought news to me；No verse was sent on a red leaf．No bloom was plucked by messenger from mume tree
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I don't hear the sound of yellow dogs, it's hard to pass on poems about red leaves, and I don't meet plum blossom ambassadors on long roads.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If you don't hear the sound of the yellow dog, it's hard to convey the poem of red leaves. The road is long without encountering the messenger of plum blossoms.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Without the sound of the yellow dog, it's hard to pass on poems written on red leaves; the journey is long, and there's no encounter with the plum blossom messenger.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 没有黄狗给我带来消息；没有红叶寄来诗句；没有信使从梅树上摘下花朵
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 没有黄狗给我带来消息；没有红叶上的诗句；没有梅花被使者摘下。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 没有黄狗给我带来消息；没有红叶上的诗句传来；没有使者从梅树上摘取花朵

text.ori_cn: 孤身作客三千里，一日思归十二时。
text.man_en: On the long，long road，to my grief．Lonely in a strange land three thousand miles away, I think of my return twentyfour hours a day．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: A lone guest for 3,000 miles, thinking of returning home at twelve o'clock in a day.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I am a solitary guest for three thousand miles, thinking about my return home twelve times a day.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: A solitary traveler three thousand miles away, yearning to return home every hour of the day.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 长路漫漫，悲从中来。 独在异乡为异客，每逢佳节倍思亲。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 漫漫漫长的路途，我的悲伤。孤独在三千里之外的异乡，我每天二十四小时都在想着我的归来。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在这漫长的道路上，我的悲伤一路相随。身处三千里外的异乡，我昼夜不停地想着我的归期。

text.ori_cn: 凭栏视，听江声浩荡，看山色参差。
text.man_en: Upon the balustrades I leanTo hear the river's song and see different shades Of mountains green．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When you look over the fence, you can hear the sound of the river and see the different colours of the mountains.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Standing on the railing, you can listen to the mighty sound of the river and see the varied colors of the mountains.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Leaning against the railing, I listen to the majestic sound of the river and gaze at the uneven hues of the mountains.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我倚在栏杆上，聆听河水的吟唱，观赏不同色调的绿色山峦．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我倚在栏杆上，聆听河流的歌声，看到深浅不一的绿色山脉。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我依靠在栏杆上，倾听河流的歌唱，看见绿色山峦的不同色调。

text.ori_cn: 忧则忧我病中，喜则喜你来到此。
text.man_en: My sickness makes me sad；Your letter makes me glad．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Worried that I'm sick, happy that you're here.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If you are worried, I am worried about my illness. If you are happy, I am happy that you are here.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If you worry, worry about my illness; if you rejoice, rejoice in your arrival here.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的病使我悲伤；你的信使我高兴．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的病使我悲伤；你的信使我高兴。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的病让我难过；你的信让我高兴。

text.ori_cn: (郑恒上云)自家姓郑，名恒，字伯常。
text.man_en: heng Heng enters and says: I am Zheng Heng，styled Bochang．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zheng Heng on the cloud) My family name is Zheng, name Heng, character Bo Chang.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zheng Heng Shangyun) His family name is Zheng, his given name is Heng, and his courtesy name is Bo Chang.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zheng Heng takes the stage) My family name is Zheng, my given name is Heng, and my courtesy name is Bochang.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 恒入曰：臣郑恒，字伯常。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 衡衡进来说道：我是郑衡，字伯昌。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 衡衡进来说：我是郑衡，字伯昌。

text.ori_cn: 先人拜礼部尚书，在时曾定下俺姑娘的女儿莺莺为妻。
text.man_en: My late father was president of the Board of Rites．While alive，he betrothed me to Yingying，daughter of my paternal aunt．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: My ancestor was the Minister of Rites, and when he was there, he had set my girl's daughter Yingying as his wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My ancestors were ministers of the Ministry of Rites, and at that time they made my daughter Yingying my wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The previous minister of the Ministry of Rites once arranged for my lady's daughter, Yingying, to be married.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 先父是礼部尚书，在世时将我许配给姑母的女儿盈盈。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我已故的父亲是礼部尚书。在世时，他把我许配给我姑姑的女儿莹莹。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 亡父曾任礼部尚书。生前，他将我许配给我的堂妹，盈盈。

text.ori_cn: 不想姑夫去世，莺莺孝服未满，不曾成亲。
text.man_en: Unexpectedly，my uncle died and Yingying had to go into mourning，so our marriage was not carried out．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I didn't want my aunt to die, but Yingying had not completed her mourning dress and was not married.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I don't want my uncle to pass away. Yingying has not yet fulfilled her filial piety and has never gotten married.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Unexpectedly, her uncle passed away, and before her mourning period ended, she hadn't gotten married.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 不料，我舅舅去世了，莹莹要去奔丧，所以我们的婚事就没有办成。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 不料舅舅去世，莹莹守丧，我们的婚事就没有举行。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 出乎意料，我叔叔去世了，莹莹不得不守孝，我们的婚事因此没有进行。

text.ori_cn: 俺姑娘引着莺莺扶灵柩回博陵安葬，为因路阻，寄居河中府。
text.man_en: My aunt along with Yingying，conveying my uncle's coffin to be buried in Boling，was stopped on the way and is staying in the MidRiver Prefecture．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: My girl led Yingying to take the coffin back to Boling for burial, and because of the road block, she stayed in Hezhongfu.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: My girl led Yingying to carry the coffin back to Boling for burial. Because the road was blocked, she stayed in Hezhong Mansion.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: My daughter escorted Yingying to take the coffin back to be buried in Boling. Due to blocked roads, they temporarily stayed in Hezhong Prefecture.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 姨妈带着莺莺，送姨父的灵柩去博陵下葬，途中被拦住了，现在住在中江县。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 姑姑与莺莺，运送姑父的灵柩去博陵安葬，途中被拦住，留在了中江府。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的阿姨和莹莹一起运送我叔叔的棺材去博陵埋葬，在路上被拦住了，现在停留在中河府。

text.ori_cn: 数月前，写书来唤俺，因家中无人，来迟了一步。
text.man_en: A few months ago she sent me a letter, telling me to go to her place．But as there was no one to look after my house，I have delayed my coming．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: A few months ago, I wrote a letter to summon me, but I was late because there was no one at home.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: A few months ago, I wrote a letter to call me, but because there was no one at home, I came a step late.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: A few months ago, I was summoned to write a book. However, due to being alone at home, I arrived a bit late.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 几个月前，她给我寄了一封信，让我去她家，但因为家里没人照看，我就推迟了来的时间。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 几个月前，她给我发了一封信，让我去她那儿。但由于没有人看管我的房子，我推迟了来。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 几个月前，她给我寄了一封信，让我去她那里。但是因为没有人照看我的房子，我一直推迟着没去。

text.ori_cn: 不想到这里，听说孙飞虎要掳莺莺，得一秀才张君瑞，退了贼兵，俺姑娘把莺莺又许了他。
text.man_en: 0n my arrival，I was told，to my surprise，that Sun Feihu wanted to carry Yingying off and a scholar named Zhang Junrui succeeded in making him retreat and won the hand of Yingying．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I don't want to come here, I heard that Sun Feihu wanted to take Yingying captive, got a scholar Zhang Junrui, retreated the thieves, my girl promised Yingying to him again.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I didn't expect to come here, but I heard that Sun Feihu wanted to kidnap Yingying, and he got a scholar named Zhang Junrui. After the rebels retreated, my girl promised Yingying to him again.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Unexpectedly, it was learned that Sun Feihu intended to abduct Yingying, but a scholar named Zhang Junrui repelled the bandits, and my mistress promised Yingying to him.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我一到，就被告知，孙飞虎想把莺莺带走，一个叫张君瑞的书生成功地让他退了回去，并赢得了莺莺的芳心。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当我到达时，令我惊讶的是，孙飞虎想把莺莺带走，一个名叫张君瑞的学者成功地让他撤退，并赢得了莺莺的手。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 出乎我意料的是，我一到达就被告知孙飞虎想要带走莺莺，而一位名叫张君瑞的学者成功让他退缩，并赢得了莺莺的芳心。

text.ori_cn: 俺如今便撞将去呵，恐没意思。
text.man_en: I think it would be unsuitable to intrude now．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm afraid it's not going to be fun for me to go there now.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I'm going to hit him now, I'm afraid it won't be interesting.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If I rush headlong into it now, I'm afraid it would be pointless.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我认为现在不宜打扰．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我认为现在不适合介入。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我认为现在打扰不合适。

text.ori_cn: 这一件事都在红娘身上。
text.man_en: So I sent for the maid Rose，on whom may depend my affair．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: This one thing is all on the redneck.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It's all on the matchmaker.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: This whole matter rests on the matchmaker.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 于是我叫来了女仆罗丝，我的事就靠她了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 于是我派人去叫女仆罗丝来，我的事情就得靠她了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 于是我派人去叫女仆罗丝，她可能会影响我的事情。

text.ori_cn: 俺且着人去唤他，只说哥哥从京师来，不敢造次来见姑娘，着红娘到下处来，有话对姑娘行说。
text.man_en: I would tell her I have just come from the capital and dare not visit my aunt without her permission，so I ask her to come to my place in order that she may inform my aunt of my arrival．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have someone to call him, just say brother from the capital, do not dare to make a fuss to see the girl, the red lady to the next place, have something to say to the girl line.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I went to call him, saying that my brother came from the capital and I didn't dare to make a mistake to see the girl. I asked the matchmaker to come downstairs and say something to the girl.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I will send someone to call him, telling him that my brother has arrived from the capital and does not dare to visit the young lady hastily. Let Hongniang come to the lodging; there are matters to discuss with the young lady.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我想告诉她我刚从首都来，没有她的允许，我不敢去看望我的姑姑，所以我请她到我的住处来，以便她通知我的姑姑我到了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我会告诉她我刚从京城来，未经她的允许不敢去看望姑姑，所以我请她来我家，以便她通知我姑姑我的到来。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我会告诉她我刚从京城回来，不敢不经她允许就去拜访姑姑，所以请她来我这里，以便她能告知姑姑我的到来。

text.ori_cn: (红娘上云)郑恒哥哥在下处，不来见夫人，却唤俺说话。
text.man_en: Rose enters and says:Master Zheng Heng has arrived but has not come to see my mistress．He summoned me to have a talk with him，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang Shangyun) Zheng Heng's brother is down there, not coming to see Madam, but calling me to speak.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The matchmaker goes up to the cloud) Brother Zheng Heng is down below. He didn't come to see my wife, but he called me to talk.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Red Matchmaker enters) Brother Zheng Heng is at our place and has not come to see the mistress, but has called me to speak.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 蔷薇进来说："郑恒老爷来了，但没有来见我的女主人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝进来说：郑衡先生已经到了，但没有来见我的主母。他召我来与他谈话，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 玫瑰走进来，说：郑恒大师已经到了，但没有来看我的小姐。他召唤我去与他谈话。

text.ori_cn: (郑云)我怎么好就见姑娘，我唤你来说。
text.man_en: Zheng Heng says:I thought it unsuitable to intrude on my aunt，that is the reason why I sent for you．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zheng Yun) How can I just see the girl, I call you to say.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zheng Yun) Just see the girl if you want me to, and I'll call you to tell her.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zheng Yun) How could I go to see the girl? I asked you to come and tell me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 郑恒说：我觉得不应该打扰我的姑姑，这就是我找你来的原因。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 郑衡说：我觉得打扰我姨妈不合适，所以才派人来找你。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 郑衡说：我觉得贸然拜访我姑姑不合适，所以我才叫你来的。

text.ori_cn: 当日姑夫在时，曾许下亲事，我今到这里，姑夫孝已满了，特地央你去夫人行说知，拣一个吉日，成合了这件事，好和一搭里下葬去。
text.man_en: You remember while my uncle was alive，he had betrothed me to your young mistress．Now the period of mourning is over．I come here to request my aunt to select a lucky day for accomplishing our union．Then we may go together to have my uncle's coffin buried．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: When the aunt husband in the day, had promised marriage, I am here today, aunt husband filial piety has been full, specially begged you to go to the lady line to talk about, choose an auspicious day, into the matter, and a good and a hitch in the burial to go.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When my uncle was here that day, he promised to get married. Now that I'm here, my uncle's filial piety has been fulfilled. I specifically ask you to go to Madam's house to tell me that we can choose an auspicious day to consummate the matter so that we can be buried together.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: On that day when Uncle was still alive, he arranged a marriage proposal. Now that I am here and his mourning period is over, I specifically ask you to inform the Madam to choose an auspicious date to complete this matter, so we can proceed with the burial together.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你还记得我舅舅在世时，曾把我许配给你的小老婆吧？ 现在丧期已过，我来是想请我舅母择个吉日，让我们结成连理。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你记得我舅舅在世的时候，已经把我许配给你的少妇了。现在服丧期已经过去了，我来这里是请舅舅选个吉日来成亲的。然后我们就可以一起去拜年了。叔叔的棺材埋了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你记得在我叔叔还在世的时候，他已将我许配给你的小姐。现在服丧期已过。我来这里是请求婶婶选一个吉日来完成我们的婚事。然后我们可以一起去安葬我叔叔的棺木。

text.ori_cn: 不争不成合，一路上难厮见。
text.man_en: If our union were postponed，it would be inconvenient for me to see your young mistress．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: It's hard to see each other along the way without fighting.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If there is no fight, there will be no cooperation, and it will be difficult to see each other along the way.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Without conflict, there is no union; thus, it's hard to meet closely along the way.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果我们的结合推迟了，我就不方便见你的年轻情妇了。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果我们的结合推迟了，我就不方便去见你的少妇了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 如果我们的结合被推迟，我见到你的小主人会很不方便。

text.ori_cn: 又不曾羔雁邀媒，币帛问肯，恰洗了尘，便待要过门。
text.man_en: There has never beenEngaged a gobetween；Nor have betrothal gifts been sent To ask the family's consent．You have just come from your landAnd claim my young mistress' hand．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have never been invited by a wild goose, or asked for a favour, but I have just washed my hands of the dust, and I'm about to get married.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Not once did Gao Yan invite a matchmaker, and he asked for money and silk. He just washed his hands and was about to pass the door.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Never before had there been a matchmaker to propose, nor had there been any dowry negotiations. As soon as the dust was settled, they were ready to tie the knot.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你刚从你的家乡来，向我的女主人求婚。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 从来没有订过媒人，也没有送过彩礼来征得家人的同意。你刚刚从你的土地上来，夺走了我少妇的手。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 从未有过媒人；也没有送过订婚礼物来获得家庭的同意。你刚刚从你的家乡来，就要求我家小姐的手。

text.ori_cn: 枉腌了他金屋银屏，枉污了他锦衾绣捆。
text.man_en: How dare you thus profane her golden bower with such a sudden shower?How dare you dirty the coverlet spread on her embroidered bed!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: In vain he salted his golden house and silver screen, and in vain he defiled his brocade coverlet and embroidered bundle.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It was a waste to pickle his golden house and silver screen, and it was a waste to stain his brocade quilt.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: He wasted his golden abode and silver screens, and tarnished his luxurious brocade quilts and embroidered wraps in vain.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你竟敢如此肆无忌惮地亵渎她金色的花房？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 竟敢用如此突如其来的阵雨亵渎她的金凉亭？竟敢玷污她绣花床上的被单！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你怎么敢用如此突然的阵雨玷污她的金色闺房？你怎么敢弄脏铺在她绣花床上的被褥！

text.ori_cn: 枉蠢了他梳云掠月，枉羞了他惜玉怜香，枉村了他带雨尤云。
text.man_en: Are you worthy of her cloudlike hairAnd moonlike laceTo my mistress tender and fairYou are but a disgrace．How dare you bring a sudden shower to her fragrant jade bower!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: In vain he combed the clouds and swept the moon, in vain he was ashamed of the jade and pity, in vain he brought the rain to the village.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: It was in vain that he combed the clouds and skimmed the moon, it was in vain that he cherished the jade and cherished the fragrance, it was in vain that he brought the rain and the clouds.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: In vain did he smooth clouds and skim the moon, in vain did he pity jade and cherish fragrance, in vain did he accompany rain and follow clouds.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你配得上她如云的秀发和如月的蕾丝吗？对我温柔美丽的女主人来说，你不过是个耻辱。 你怎么敢给她芬芳的琼楼玉宇带来骤雨！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你配得上她那如云般的头发和如月般的花边吗？对我的主妇来说，你只是一个耻辱。你竟敢给她的香玉阁带来突然的阵雨！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你配得上她那云一般的秀发和月一般的蕾丝吗？对于我那温柔美丽的情人来说，你只不过是个耻辱。你怎敢给她那芬芳的玉阁带来一场突如其来的暴雨！

text.ori_cn: 当日三才始判，两仪初分。
text.man_en: When the earth was first separated from the skyAnd then divided into low and high，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: On that day the three talents were first judged and the two instruments were first divided.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: On that day, Sancai began to judge and Liangyi began to separate.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: On that day, the three elements were first distinguished, and the two primal forces were initially divided.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 当大地最初从天空中分离出来，然后被分成低处和高处时，
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 当大地最初与天空分离，然后分为低地和高地时，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当大地初次与天空分离，然后分成低与高，

text.ori_cn: 乾坤，清者为乾，浊者为坤。
text.man_en: The light became the day，And the heavy the night．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Qiankun, the clear one is Qian, the turbid one is Kun.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Qian and Kun, the pure ones are called Qian, and the turbid ones are called Kun.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The cosmos, with clarity as Heaven, and turbidity as Earth.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 轻者为昼，重者为夜。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 光变成了白天，而沉重变成了黑夜。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 轻变成了白天，重变成了黑夜。

text.ori_cn: 人在其中相混，君瑞是君子清贤，郑恒是小人浊民。
text.man_en: Between the sky and earth men stay;Junrui like the day is bright；Zheng Heng is dark like night．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: People are mixed up in it, Junrui is a gentleman Qingxian, Zheng Heng is a villain turbid people.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: People mix among them, Junrui is a gentleman and a virtuous man, while Zheng Heng is a villain and a common man.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: People mingle among them, Junrui is a virtuous gentleman, while Zheng Heng is a vile commoner.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 人在天地间，君瑞如白昼，郑恒如黑夜。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 天地间人留；君睿如昼明；郑横暗如夜。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 人与天地间停留；君瑞如日般光明；正恒如夜般黑暗。

text.ori_cn: 把河桥飞虎将军，叛蒲东掳掠人民，半万贼屯合寺门，手横着霜刃，高叫道，要莺莺做压寨夫人。
text.man_en: Sun Feihu guarding the Bridge on the RiverRevolted east of Pu and made the people shiver；With five thousand men he besieged the temple's land．With a frostbright sword in his handHe shouted and swore by his lifeThat he must have Yingying as mistress or wife．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Put the river bridge flying tiger general, rebel Pudong captive people, half a million thieves tuned together the temple door, hand across the frost blade, shouting, want Yingying to be the lady of the fortress.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: General Feihu of Baohe Bridge rebelled against Pudong and robbed the people. Half a million thieves gathered at the temple gate, holding frost blades across their hands, shouting that they wanted Yingying to be the wife of the village.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: General Yu Qiao Feihu, who rebelled in Pu Dong and plundered the people, stationed five thousand bandits at the He Temple. Brandishing a frosty blade, he loudly demanded that Ying Ying become the bandits' wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 孙飞虎镇守江桥，濮东起义，百姓闻风丧胆；他率领五千人马，围攻庙堂之上；他手持寒光闪闪的宝剑，大喊大叫，以生命发誓，一定要娶莺莺为妻。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 孙飞虎守江桥，濮东叛，民不寒而栗；率五千人，围困寺地。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 孙飞虎守卫着江上的桥，东起蒲地反叛，震惊了人们，用五千兵力围攻了寺庙的土地。手持光寒的剑，他叫喊并誓以性命，非得迎迎做情人或妻子不可。

text.ori_cn: (红云)贼围甚迫，夫人慌了，和长老商议，高叫两廊，不论僧俗，如退得贼兵者，便将莺莺小姐与之为妻。
text.man_en: Rose says:Then the situation was critical．My mistress badly frightened consulted with the abbot and told him to announce that to anyone，priest or layman，who was able to induce the bandits away，Yingying would be made his wife．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (red clouds) the thief siege is very pressing, the lady panicked, and the elders discussed, called the two corridors, regardless of the monks and laymen, such as retreating from the thieves, they will be Miss Ying Ying and his wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) The bandit siege was so tight that my wife panicked. She discussed with the elders and shouted to the two corridors. Regardless of the monks or laymen, if the thieves retreated, Miss Yingying would be made his wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongyun) The bandits were closing in, and the lady, in a panic, conferred with the elder. She loudly declared to both the monks and the laypeople in the two corridors that whoever could drive away the bandits would be given the hand of Miss Yingying in marriage.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 蔷薇说："当时情况危急，我的女主人吓坏了，她请示了方丈，并告诉他说，不管是神职人员还是普通人，只要能把匪徒引开，就把盈盈许配给他。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：那么情况就很危急了。我的情妇非常害怕，与方丈商量，让他宣布，无论是神父还是俗人，只要能把强盗赶走，就娶盈盈为妻。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 玫瑰说：当时情况非常危急。我被吓坏了的主人咨询了住持，并告诉他宣布，无论是僧人还是俗人，只要能引开强盗，莹莹就会嫁给他。

text.ori_cn: 夫人大喜，就问其计安在。
text.man_en: My mistress over delighted asked about his plan．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The lady was delighted, and asked him where his plan was.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The lady was overjoyed and asked him what his plan was.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The lady was overjoyed and asked what his plan was.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的情妇高兴地问他的计划．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的女主人非常高兴地询问他的计划。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的女主人非常高兴地询问了他的计划。

text.ori_cn: 张生道："我有故人白马将军，见统十万大兵，镇守蒲关。
text.man_en: Master Zhang then said that he had a friend，the General on the White Horse，in command of a hundred thousand soldiers guarding the Pu Pass．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Zhang Sheng said, "I have an old friend, General Baima, who is seen uniting 100,000 troops to guard Pu Pass.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Zhang Sheng said: "I have an old friend, General Baima, who commanded a hundred thousand troops and guarded Puguan.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Zhang Sheng said, 'I have an old friend who is the White Horse General, commanding an army of 100,000 soldiers, stationed at Pu Pass.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张大人又说，他有一个朋友，白马将军，统领十万大军，把守蒲关。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师又说，他有一个朋友，白马将军，统领十万士兵，镇守濮关。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 然后，张大师说他有一个朋友，白马将军，指挥着十万士兵，守卫蒲关。

text.ori_cn: 我修书一封，着人传去，必来救我。
text.man_en: He would write a letter and send it to the general，who was sure to come to our rescue．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'll write a letter and ask someone to pass it on, and they'll come and save me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If I write a book and pass it around, they will come to save me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I wrote a letter and sent it through someone, and they are sure to come and rescue me.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他会写一封信寄给将军，将军一定会来救我们的。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他会写一封信寄给将军，他一定会来救我们的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他会写一封信并把它寄给将军，那位一定会来救我们的将军。

text.ori_cn: "不想书到兵来，其困即解。
text.man_en: Indeed as soon as the letter was received，the general's troops were dispatched and the critical situation was relieved．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: "I don't want the book to come to the soldiers, and their difficulties will be solved.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: "If you don't want to write, when the soldiers come, your difficulties will be solved.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: One does not wish to wait for the soldiers to come before resolving the distress.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 的确，一收到信，将军的部队就被派出去了，危急的局势得到了缓解。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 果然，接到信后，将军的军队就出动了，危急的局势才得以解除。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 的确，一收到信，將军的部队就被派遣出去，危急的局势得到了缓解。

text.ori_cn: 洛阳才子善属文，火急修书信。
text.man_en: The scholar of the capital was bright indeed;He wrote a letter at lightning speed．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The talented man from Luoyang is good at writing, and he repairs his letters in a hurry.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The talented man from Luoyang was good at writing and was eager to write letters.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The talented scholar of Luoyang excels in writing, urgently composing letters.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 京师之士，果然聪慧，以迅雷不及掩耳之势写了一封信．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 京城的学者真是聪明，他写信的速度快如闪电。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 京城学士才华横溢，写信如雷霆之速。

text.ori_cn: 白马将军到时分，灭了烟尘。
text.man_en: The General on the White Horse came And put out at once the bandits' flame．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: General Whitehorse extinguished the smoke when the time came.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: General White Horse arrived and put out the smoke.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: When the White Horse General arrives, the dust will be cleared.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 白马将军来了，一下子就扑灭了强盗的火焰。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 白马将军来了，立刻扑灭了土匪的火焰。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 白马将军来了，立刻扑灭了盗贼的火焰。

text.ori_cn: 夫人小姐都心顺，则为他威而不猛，言而有信，因此上不敢慢于人。
text.man_en: My mistresses old and young were filled with delightTo find a man who helped with main and might．In word and deed he's true，So he has won the heart of the two．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The lady and the young lady are all obedient to the heart, then for him to be powerful but not fierce, words have faith, so on dare not slow to people.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If the lady and the lady are all compliant, it means that he is powerful but not aggressive, and he keeps his word, so he does not dare to be rude to others.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: When both the mistress and the young lady are content and cooperative, he commands respect without being severe, speaks with integrity, and as a result, does not dare to be disrespectful to others.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我的情妇们老的老，小的小，满心欢喜地找到了一个既能帮大忙又能帮大忙的人。 他言行一致，因此赢得了两人的芳心。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我的老老少少的情妇们都充满了喜悦，因为找到了一个能提供主要帮助和力量的男人。他的言语和行为都是真实的，所以他赢得了两人的心。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我的年轻和年老的情妇们充满了喜悦，因为找到了一个尽全力帮忙的人。他言行一致，所以赢得了她们的心。

text.ori_cn: 凭着他讲性理齐论鲁论，作词赋韩文柳文，识道理为人做人，俺家里有信行，知恩报恩。
text.man_en: He knows the fight from wrong；He writes verse and prose，short or long．He knows what is manhood．How could our family Not act with sincerity And return good for good?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: By virtue of the fact that he preached the theory of sex Qi Lu theory, make words and gifts Han Wen Liu Wen, knowledge of reason as a person to do people, my family has the faith line, know the grace and repay the grace.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Thanks to his lectures on human nature and the theory of Lu, his lyrics and poems in Korean and Liu, his knowledge of principles and conduct as a human being, my family has faith and deeds, and knows how to repay kindness.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: By discussing Neo-Confucianism and the teachings of Confucius, composing essays in the styles of Han Yu and Liu Zongyuan, understanding the principles of being human and conducting oneself, our family holds the virtues of trustworthiness and gratitude.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他知错就改；他写诗写散文，或短或长；他懂得什么是男子汉气概；我们的家族怎能不以诚待人，以德报怨？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他识辨正误；他写诗文，或短或长。他懂得什么是男子气概。我们一家人怎能不以诚相待，以德报德？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他知道区分对错；他写诗和散文，短或长。他知道何为男子汉。我们的家庭怎么能不真诚行事，并以善报善呢？

text.ori_cn: 高低远近都休论，我拆白道字辨个清浑。
text.man_en: I will not talk about what's low and high Or far and nigh．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm not going to talk about high and low, but I'm going to break down the word "white" and make a clear distinction.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There is no need to discuss whether it is high or low, far or near. I will break down the white words and make a clear distinction.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Do not argue about heights, distances, or proximities; I shall discern the clear from the muddled by examining the words in detail.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 郑衡进来说：我在这里

text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zheng Yun) What face does my child have to meet the girl.

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)莺莺为孙飞虎一节，无可解危，许了张生也。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:You know Yingying was betrothed to Master Zhang who had raised the siege of Sun Feihu．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) Yingying for Sun Feihu section, there is no way to solve the danger, promised Zhang Sheng also.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) Yingying made a sacrifice for Sun Feihu, but could not solve the crisis, so she agreed to Zhang Sheng.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The lady said) Yingying made a promise to Zhang Sheng due to Sun Feihu's situation, as there was no way to resolve the crisis.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：你知道莺莺许配给了围攻孙飞虎的张员外吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：你知道莺莺是与围攻孙飞虎的张老爷订婚的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说: 你知道莺莺早已许配给张生，那人曾经解救了孙飞虎的围困。

text.ori_cn: 我在京师看榜来，年纪有二十三四岁，洛阳张珙。
text.man_en: When I was in the capital, I saw him．He is about twentythree or twentyfour years old，a native of Luoyang，and his name is Zhang Gong．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I look at the list in the capital to come, the age of twenty-three or twenty-four years old, Luoyang Zhang Gong.

text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I went to the capital to check the list. I am around 23 or 24 years old, Zhang Gong from Luoyang.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我在京城时见过他． 他大约二十三四岁，洛阳人，名叫张珙．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我在京城的时候，见过他。他大约二十三、二十四岁，洛阳人，号张恭。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 当我在首都的时候，我见到了他。他大约二十三或二十四岁，是洛阳人，名字叫张公。

text.ori_cn: 夸官游街三日，第二口头踏正来到卫尚书家门首，尚书的小姐，结着彩楼，在那御街上，只一球，正打着他。
text.man_en: Parading the streets for three days，he came on the second day to the residence of President Wei，whose daughter in a pavilion on the Imperial Street hit him with an embroidered ball．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Kwa official tour of the street for three days, the second oral tread is coming to Wei Shangshu home gate, Shangshu's miss, knot colourful building, in that imperial street, only a ball, is hitting him.

The minister’s young lady, adorned in a colorful tower, merely struck a ball from the imperial street, hitting him right on target.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他游街三天，第二天来到魏大总统府邸，魏大总统在御街亭子里的女儿用绣球打他。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 游街三天，第二天来到魏总统府，魏总统的女儿在御街亭子里用绣花球打他。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 游街三日，他在第二天来到魏总统的宅邸，魏总统的女儿在皇街上的一个亭子里用绣球打中了他。

text.ori_cn: 我也骑着马看，险些打着我。
text.man_en: Looking on horse，I was almost hit．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I rode to see it too, and it nearly hit me.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I also watched it on horseback, and it almost hit me.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I was also riding a horse and watching, narrowly missing me.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 看着马，我差点被击中。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 看马时，我差点被撞到。

text.ori_cn: 怕你不休了莺莺。

text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I'm afraid you might not let Yingying rest.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果打中了，应该是我脱离了盈盈．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果被击中，应该是我和盈盈脱离。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 若遭受打击，应该是我与莹莹分开。

text.ori_cn: 他家粗使梅香十来个，把张生横拖倒拽入去。
text.man_en: But on that day about ten maids seized Master Zhang，pulled him off the horse and dragged him into the residence of President Wei．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: His family's rough servants Meixiang ten or so, Zhang Sheng horizontal dragged down into.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 那天，十来个丫鬟抓住了张师傅，把他拉下马，拖进了魏大总统的官邸。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 那天，十几个丫鬟抓住了张老爷子，把他从马背上拉下来，拖进了魏总的府邸。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 但在那一天，约十名侍女抓住了张大师，把他从马背上拉下来，拖进了魏总统的府邸。

text.ori_cn: 那尚书那里肯听，说道："我女奉圣旨结彩楼招你，莺莺是先奸后娶的，只好做个次妻罢。"
text.man_en: The president would not listen but said， "My daughter has this pavilion erected by Imperial Decree，so she should be your first wife．Cui Yingying who had surrendered to you before your marriage is only fit to be a second wife．

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The minister was willing to listen and said, "My daughter is recruiting you under the imperial edict. Yingying raped her first and then married her. She has no choice but to be a second wife."
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The minister was in no mood to listen and said, 'I was given the imperial edict to arrange the festive pavilion for you to marry my daughter. As for Yingying, since you took her before the marriage, she can only be a concubine.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 总统不听，说："我的女儿有这座圣旨所建的亭子，所以她应该是你的正室，而在你结婚前投靠你的崔莺莺只适合做二房。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 总统不听，道：“我女儿有圣旨立此亭，当为正妻。未婚前臣服于你的崔莺莺，只配为次妻。”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 总统不愿听，并说：“我女儿是奉皇命建这个亭子的，所以她应该是你的正妻。崔莺莺在你婚前就向你投靠，只能做妾。”

text.ori_cn: 因此闹动京师，侄儿认得他。
text.man_en: This news spread from mouth to mouth in the capital，so I know of this Master Zhang．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The nephew recognises him.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Because of this, he caused a stir in the capital, and his nephew recognized him.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Thus, he caused a commotion in the capital, and my nephew recognized him.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 这个消息在京城里传得沸沸扬扬，所以我知道了这个张老爷子。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 这个消息在京城口耳相传，所以我知道这位张大师。

text.ori_cn: (夫人怒云)我说这秀才不中抬举，今日果然负了俺家。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says angrily:I fear this student is not worthy of our family and he has indeed betrayed our trust．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Angrily) I said that this Xiu Cai is not a good candidate, and today he has really betrayed my family.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madame said angrily) I said this scholar was not worthy of the promotion, and today he really failed my family.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Lady Nu Yun) I said this scholar didn't deserve praise, and today he truly let our family down.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人生气地说：这个学生恐怕配不上我们家，他确实辜负了我们的信任。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人愤怒地说：我担心这个学生配不上我们家，他确实辜负了我们的信任。

text.ori_cn: 既然张生娶了妻，不要了孩儿，你拣个吉日良辰，依旧入来做女婿者。
text.man_en: Since Master Zhang has deserted my daughter and made another marriage，my dear nephew，you may select a lucky day and become my soninlaw as prearranged．

text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Since Zhangsheng has married and doesn't want the child, you should choose an auspicious day and come back to be my son-in-law.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 既然张老爷抛弃了我的女儿，另结新欢，我亲爱的侄儿，你可以择个吉日，按约定做我的女婿。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 既然张老爷抛弃了我的女儿另娶，亲爱的侄子，你就择吉日，如约做我的女婿吧。

text.ori_cn: (郑喜云)中了俺的计了。
text.man_en: Zheng Heng says joyfully She is caught in my trap．

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zheng Xiyun) You fell into my trap.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zheng Xiyun) fell for my trick.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 郑恒高兴地说，她中了我的圈套。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 郑恒高兴地说，她中了我的圈套。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 郑恒欣喜地说：“她落入了我的陷阱。”

text.ori_cn: (法本上云)老僧昨日买登科录，看张先生果然及第，除授河中府尹。
text.man_en: Faben the Abbot enters and says:Yesterday I bought a list of winners at the imperial examinations and found Master Zhang's name in it．He has been appointed prefect of the MidRiver Prefecture．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Fa Ben on the cloud) the old monk yesterday to buy the book, see Mr Zhang really and the first, in addition to the award of Hezhong Prefectural Yin.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The book says) The old monk bought the imperial examination registration yesterday and saw that Mr. Zhang had indeed passed the exam and was awarded the title of Governor of Hezhong.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 方丈法本进来说："昨天我买了一张科举中举的榜单，发现张大人的名字在上面。 他被任命为中江县县令。

text.ori_cn: 谁想夫人没主张，又许了郑恒亲事，不肯去接。

text.ori_cn: 老僧将着肴馔，直至十里长亭，接官走一遭。

text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The old monk took the delicacies to the pavilion ten miles away to meet the official for a walk.

text.ori_cn: (杜将军上云)奉圣旨，着小官主兵蒲关，提调河中府事。
text.man_en: General Du enters and says:By imperial decree I was appointed commander at the Pu Pass in charge of military affairs in the MidRiver Prefecture．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (General Du Shangyun) By the holy decree, I have been instructed to take charge of the troops at Pu Guan, and to bring up the affairs of the Hezhong Prefecture.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (General Du went up to the cloud) In accordance with the imperial edict, I sent a small official to lead the army at Puguan to improve the affairs of the Hezhong government.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (General Du steps forward) By imperial decree, I am assigned to command troops at Puguan and oversee affairs in Hezhong Prefecture.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 杜将军进来说：奉圣旨，我被任命为蒲关总兵，总管中江府军务。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 杜将军进曰：奉旨为濮关都尉，掌中江州军事。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 杜将军上场说道：奉圣旨，小将接任潼关都统，掌管中河州的军事事务。

text.ori_cn: 谁想君瑞兄弟，一举及第，正授河中府尹，一定乘此机会成亲。

text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Who would have thought that the Junrui brothers, a successful candidate, is being awarded the Hezhong prefectural magistrate, must take this opportunity to marry.

text.ori_cn: 小官牵羊担酒，直至老夫人宅上，一来贺喜，二来主亲。
text.man_en: I am going with the presents of sheep and wine to the residence of Madame Cui so as to offer her my congratulations on the one hand and to act as gobetween on the other．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The young official took the sheep and wine until the old lady's house, first to congratulate her and secondly, to be the master of the marriage.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The junior officials led sheep and wine to the old lady's house, first to congratulate her and secondly to host the wedding.

text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我要带着羊和酒去崔夫人的府邸，一方面向她表示祝贺，另一方面充当中间人。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我带着羊和酒去崔夫人府，一方面向她表示祝贺，另一方面也做个牵线搭桥。

text.ori_cn: (夫人上云)谁想张生负了俺家，去卫尚书家做女婿去了。
text.man_en: Madame Cui enters and says:Who would have thought that Master Zhang has betrayed our trust and become soninlaw of President Wei?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Shangyun) Who would have thought that Zhang Sheng would lose my family and go to Wei Shangshu's family to be his son-in-law.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madam goes up to the cloud) Who would have thought that Zhang Sheng betrayed our family and went to be the son-in-law of Wei Shangshu's family.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人进来说：谁想张老爷子竟然背叛了我们的信任，成了魏总的女婿？

text.ori_cn: 只索不负老相公遗言，还招郑恒为婿。
text.man_en: What can I do but marry my daughter to Zheng Heng in accordance with the dying wish of my late husband?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I just want to live up to the old sangha's last words and also recruit Zheng Heng as my son-in-law.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Just to live up to his old husband's last words, he also recruited Zheng Heng as his son-in-law.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Zisuo did not fail her late husband's last words and even took Zheng Heng as her husband.

text.man_en2gpt_cn: 除了按照我亡夫的遗愿将女儿嫁给郑恒，我还能怎么办呢？

text.ori_cn: 今日是个好日子过门，准备下筵席，郑恒敢待来也。
text.man_en: Today is a lucky date for marriage．I will get ready the wedding feast for Zheng Heng．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Today is a good day to cross the door, prepare the next feast, Zheng Heng dare to wait to come also.

text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Today is an auspicious day for a wedding. Prepare the banquet; Zheng Heng will be arriving.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 今天是结婚的吉日． 我要为郑恒准备婚宴．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 今天是结婚吉日，我去给郑恒准备婚宴。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 今天是一个适合结婚的吉日。我会为郑恒准备婚宴。

text.ori_cn: (张生上云)小官奉圣旨，正授河中府尹。
text.man_en: Master Zhang enters and says:Appointed prefect of the MidRiver Prefecture by the imperial decree，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng on the cloud) The young official was given the imperial decree, and was being granted the title of Prefect of Hezhong.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengshangyun) The junior official was awarded the title of Yin of Hezhong Prefecture according to the imperial edict.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Zhang Sheng goes upstage: As an official, I have been given the imperial decree to be appointed the Magistrate of Hezhong Prefecture.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张师傅进门说道：奉天承运，皇帝诏曰，任命我为中江县县令。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张师进曰：圣旨任中江太守，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张大人进来说：奉天子诏书，任命为中河府知府，

text.ori_cn: 今日衣锦还乡，小姐凤冠霞帔都将着，见呵，双手索送过去。
text.man_en: I am returning in glory today．My dear Oriole will wear her phoenix headdress and rainbow veil，which I will present to her with both hands．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Today, the clothes return home, Miss Phoenix Xiapi will be, see heh, hands to send over.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Today, when I return to my hometown in fine clothes, the young lady will be wearing her phoenix crown and harem. Seeing this, I send her over with both hands.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Today, as you return home in glory, Miss, you shall don your phoenix coronet and ceremonial attire. Upon seeing you, they will eagerly usher you forward with both hands.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 今天，我将荣归故里。我亲爱的黄鹂将戴上她的凤凰头饰和彩虹面纱，我将双手把它献给她。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 今天我光荣归来，我亲爱的黄鹂将戴上她的凤凰头饰和彩虹面纱，我将用双手献给她。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 今天我荣耀归来。我的亲爱的黄莺将佩戴她的凤凰头饰和彩虹面纱，我将双手呈送给她。

text.ori_cn: 谁想有今日也呵!文章旧冠乾坤内，姓字新闻日月边。
text.man_en: Who would have thought today would arrive at last! (Singing) My writing outshone earth and sky；My name is well known far and nigh．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Who wants to have today also heh! The article old crown within the Qiankun, the name of the news by the sun and the moon.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Who would have thought that today would happen! Articles are in the world, and news about every name is beside the sun and the moon.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Who would have expected today! Once crowned in the literary world, now my name and reputation are known across the universe.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 谁会想到今天终于到来！(唱）我的文章胜过天与地；我的名字远近闻名。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 谁想到今天终于到来了！ （唱）我的文字胜过天地，我的名字远近闻名。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 谁会想到今天终于到来了！（歌唱）我的文采辉煌天地；我的名字远近皆知。

text.ori_cn: 一鞭骄马出皇都，畅风流玉堂人物。
text.man_en: Whip in hand，on proud steed I leave the capital to be a gallant husband in Jade Hall．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: A whip of proud horses out of the royal capital, smooth wind flow jade hall characters.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: A whip of arrogant horses came out of the imperial capital, and the figures in the palace were free.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: A proud steed leaves the imperial city with a single whip, the elegant figures of the Jade Hall enjoying the flowing breeze.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 策马扬鞭，离京赴翠微。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 鞭在手，骏马出京，玉堂为侠夫。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 鞭在手，骑骏马，我离开京城，去玉堂成为英勇丈夫。

text.ori_cn: 今朝三品职，昨日一寒儒。
text.man_en: Poor student yesterday, I hold the third rank today．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Three ranks today, one cold scholar yesterday.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Today I am a third-grade official, but yesterday I was a Han Confucian.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Today, a third-ranking official; yesterday, an impoverished scholar.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 昨日差生，今日三甲．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 昨天的可怜学生，今天我排名第三。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 昨天是差生，今天我名列第三。

text.ori_cn: 御笔新除，将姓名翰林注。
text.man_en: By His Majesty's decree My name is in Imperial Academy
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The new removal of the imperial pen will be the name Hanlin Note.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The imperial pen was newly removed, and the name was noted by Hanlin.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With the Emperor's new decree, the Hanlin Academy inscribed his name.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 奉陛下旨意 我的名字出现在帝国学院
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 奉陛下旨，吾名入国子监
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 奉陛下谕旨，吾名列入皇家学院

text.ori_cn: 张珙如愚，酬志了三尺龙泉万卷书。
text.man_en: Foolish as Zhang Gong looks，He's not belied his precious sword and countless books．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Zhang Gong, like a fool, rewarded the ambition of three feet Longquan ten thousand volumes of books.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Zhang Gong was like a fool, and he rewarded his ambition with thousands of books in Longquan.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Zhang Gong, as if foolish, achieved his ambition with a three-foot dragon spring sword and a myriad of scrolls.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 张珙看似愚笨，却不负宝剑和无数书籍。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 张弓虽然看上去很愚蠢，但他并没有辜负他的宝剑和无数的书籍。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 张公虽看起来愚蠢，但他从未辜负过他的宝剑和无数书籍。

text.ori_cn: 莺莺有福，稳受了五花官诰七香车。
text.man_en: Happy will Yingying be found；To receive FiveFlowered rank and chariot she's bound．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Ying Ying is blessed to have received the five-flower official grant and seven fragrant cars.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Yingying is blessed to receive the five-flowered official imperial edict and the seven-flavored car.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Yingying is fortunate, receiving with grace the grand official title and the carriage adorned with seven fragrances.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 莺莺觅得，喜上眉梢；五福临门，车载斗量。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 找到莹莹会很高兴；为了获得五花爵位和战车，她已经被束缚了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 莺莺应喜始相逢，车马五花得意荣。

text.ori_cn: 身荣难忘借僧居，愁来犹记题诗处。
text.man_en: In glory I can't forget the temple remoteNor the poems which in sorrow l wrote．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The honour of the body is unforgettable, the monk's residence is unforgettable, and the sadness is still remembering the place where the poem was written.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: When I am honored, I will never forget to stay in the monk's residence. When I am sad, I will still remember the place where I wrote my poems.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The honor of staying in a monk's abode is hard to forget, and I still recall the place where I inscribed my poem when sorrow visited.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 荣光中我忘不了遥远的庙宇，悲伤中我忘不了写下的诗篇．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 在荣耀中我不能忘记遥远的寺庙，也不能忘记我在悲伤中写下的诗。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 在荣耀中我不能忘记那远处的寺庙，也不能忘记我在悲伤时写的诗。

text.ori_cn: 从应举，梦魂不离蒲东路。
text.man_en: Since l went to the capital，My dream has never left the temple hall．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: From the time I was a candidate for the imperial examination, my dreams never left Pudong Road.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: From Yingju, the dream soul never leaves Pudong Road.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Since taking the imperial examination, my dreams have never left the road to Pudong.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 自从我进京，我的梦就没有离开过庙堂。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 自从我到了京城，我的梦想就没有离开过寺庙大殿。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 自从我去了首都，我的梦想从未离开过庙堂。

text.ori_cn: (见夫人拜云)新探花河中府尹张珙参见。
text.man_en: (Seeing Madame Cui and bowing)Zhang Gong who has passed with honor the imperial examinations and has been appointed prefect of the MidRiver Prefecture makes his bows to Madame．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (See the lady worship cloud) new scout Hezhong Fu Yin Zhang Gong see.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (See Madam Baiyun) See Zhang Gong, the governor of the newly explored Huahe River.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Bowing to the lady) Newly appointed top scholar and prefect of Hezhong, Zhang Gong, at your service.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: (看到崔夫人，鞠躬）张恭光荣地通过了科举考试，被任命为中河县令，向崔夫人鞠躬。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: （见崔夫人躬身）张恭考中进士，为中州太守，向夫人行礼。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: （见到崔夫人并鞠躬）张公，已经通过科举考试，并被任命为中河府知府，向夫人行礼。

text.ori_cn: (张生云)小生去时，承夫人亲自饯行，喜不自胜。
text.man_en: He says:When I left，Madame，you were delighted to give mea farewell feast．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Zhang Sheng Yun) When I went, I was so happy to see you off in person.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Zhang Shengyun) When Xiaosheng left, Mrs. Cheng went to see him personally and was overjoyed.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Zhang Shengyun) When I was about to leave, Madam personally saw me off, filling me with indescribable joy.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他说：我走的时候，夫人，您很高兴为我饯行。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他说：夫人，当我离开时，您很高兴为我举办告别宴会。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他说：当我离开时，夫人，您曾欣然为我送行设宴。

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)你如今那里想俺家，道不得个"靡不有初，鲜克有终"。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:What do you care about my family now? It is said in the Book of Poetry："At first they're good on earth，But few last to the end．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) you now where I think of my family, can not say a "not have the beginning, fresh grams have the end".
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Mrs. Yun) How do you think about my family now? You can’t say that "there is no beginning, and there is an end."
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The lady said) Nowadays, you no longer think of my family, failing to understand the saying 'Though all may have a beginning, few can achieve an end.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说："你现在还管我的家事？诗经》上说："初善其身，终恶其身。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：你现在关心我家什么？ 《诗经》云：“人间初善，终者寥寥。”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：你现在为什么关心我的家人？诗经上说：“初善于地，但少能得终。”

text.ori_cn: 我一个女孩儿，虽然妆残貌陋，他父为前朝相国。
text.man_en: At first you loved my daughter who，though not beautiful enough，had as father a prime minister．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm a girl, though my make-up is broken and ugly, his father was a minister in the former dynasty.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I am a girl, although my makeup is ugly, my father is the former prime minister.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: I am a girl, though my makeup is ruined and my appearance plain, my father was a chancellor of the former dynasty.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 起初你爱我的女儿，虽然她不够美丽，但她的父亲是一位首相。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 起初你爱我的女儿，她虽然不够漂亮，但父亲是一位首相。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 起初你爱上了我的女儿，虽然她不够漂亮，但她的父亲是一位总理。

text.ori_cn: 若说丝鞭仕女图，端的是塞满章台路。
text.man_en: ‘Tis said there're maidens beautiful with silken whipIn the capital where one makes a trip．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If we talk about the silk whip ladies picture, the end is stuffed with Zhangtai Road.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If we talk about the pictures of ladies with silk whips, they are full of Zhangtai Road.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If we were to speak of the image of ladies with silk whips, it truly fills the streets of Zhangtai.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 据说，在京城旅行的人都会遇到美丽的少女，她们手持丝鞭，翩翩起舞。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 据说，游京城，有丝鞭美女。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 据说京城里有美丽的少女，手持丝鞭。

text.ori_cn: 小生向此间怀旧恩，怎肯别处寻亲去。
text.man_en: But my mind dwells on my young lady kind．Could I seek another hand and leave her behind?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I'm so nostalgic for the old days, I'm not willing to look for my family elsewhere.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Xiaosheng feels nostalgic for this place, so how can he be willing to look for relatives elsewhere.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: How could I seek connections elsewhere, when I cherish the fond memories and deep affections I have here?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 但我的心还惦记着我的小姑娘。 我是否可以另寻他手，把她抛在脑后？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 但我的心思全在我的年轻女士身上。我能寻求另一只手，把她抛在身后吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 但我的心始终想着我的年轻女士。难道我能寻求另一只手而将她抛在脑后吗？

text.ori_cn: 岂不闻君子断其初，我怎肯忘了有恩处。
text.man_en: A good man should be true from end to end．Could I forget the one who was my friend?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I have heard that a gentleman breaks his beginning; how can I forget the place where I have been gracious?
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: How can I forget my kindness if I don’t hear that a gentleman has cut off his roots?
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Haven't you heard that a gentleman always remembers his initial benefactor? How could I possibly forget a place of kindness?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 一个好人应该从一而终．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 好人应该自始至终真诚。我能忘记那个曾经是我朋友的人吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 一个好人从始至终都应该是真诚的。我怎么能忘记那个曾经是我朋友的人呢？

text.ori_cn: 那一个贼畜生行嫉妒，走将来厮间阻。
text.man_en: What rascal out of jealousyHas come to sever her from me?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The thief was jealous of the beast, and came to stop him.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: That thief and beast is jealous and blocks the future.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: That despicable thief, driven by jealousy, comes to interfere.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 是哪个无赖出于嫉妒，要把她从我身边夺走？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 哪个恶棍出于嫉妒而来断绝她与我的关系？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 是哪一个嫉妒的恶棍，把她从我身边夺走？

text.ori_cn: 不能够娇姝，早晚施心数。
text.man_en: He could not win my lady fair and brightBut used foul means from mom to night．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You can't be a Jiao Shu, and you can give the number of your heart in the morning and in the evening.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If you can't spoil your concubine, give your heart to her in the morning and evening.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: One must not be overly delicate; keep a vigilant heart at all times.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他不能赢得我美丽的夫人，却从早到晚使用卑鄙的手段．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他无法赢得我美丽而聪明的女士，但从妈妈到晚上都用了卑鄙的手段。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他不能赢得我那美丽动人的女士的芳心，于是从早到晚都使用了卑鄙手段。

text.ori_cn: 说来的无徒，迟和疾上木驴。
text.man_en: This man must be a rogue of deepest dye；Sooner or later on the gallows he will die．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Said to come without an apprentice, late and fast on a wooden donkey.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: There was no disciple who came, Chi Heji got on the wooden donkey.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Talking is futile; slow or fast, it leads to the wooden donkey.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 这个人一定是个深藏不露的流氓；他迟早会死在绞刑架上。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 此人一定是个血色最深的无赖；迟早他会死在绞刑架上。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 这个人必定是一个罪大恶极的流氓；他早晚会在绞刑架上死去。

text.ori_cn: (夫)是郑恒说来，绣球儿打着马，做了女婿也。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:It was Zheng Heng who told me this．The embroidered ball hit your horse and you became the soninlaw of President Wei．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Husband) is Zheng Heng said to come, the embroidered ball child hit the horse, made a son-in-law also.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Husband) Zheng Heng said that Hydrangea was riding a horse and became his son-in-law.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (It was) as Zheng Heng said, the embroidered ball hit the horse, and he became the son-in-law.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：这是郑亨告诉我的，绣球打在你的马上，你就成了魏国总统的女婿。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：是郑恒告诉我的。绣球撞了你的马，你就成了魏总的女婿。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：这件事是郑恒告诉我的。绣球打中了你的马，你就成了魏主席的女婿。

text.ori_cn: (红娘上云)我巴不得见他，元来得官回来，惭愧，这是非对着也。
text.man_en: Rose enters and says:How anxious I am to see him!After all，he has comeback，appointed to a high post．Now, we'll know right from wrong．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Hongniang on the cloud) I can't wait to see him, Yuan came to get the official back, shame, this is not the right also.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (The matchmaker goes up to the cloud) I long to see him. Yuan Lai comes back with an official position. I feel ashamed. This is wrong.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongniang comes on stage) I am eager to see him, realizing he has returned with an official title. Shameful as it is, this matter is right before us.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 罗丝走进来，说："我多么渴望见到他啊！毕竟，他回来了，被任命为高官。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗斯进来说：我多么渴望见到他啊！毕竟，他回来了，被任命为高职。现在，我们就知道是非了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝进来说：我多么焦急想见到他啊！毕竟，他已经回来了，而且还被委任了一个高位。现在，我们终于能明辨是非了。

text.ori_cn: (红云)为你做了卫尚书女婿，俺小姐依旧嫁郑恒去了也。
text.man_en: Rose says:As you are now the soninlaw of President Wei，my young mistress will be married to Zheng Heng as formerly arranged．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Red clouds) for you to be the son-in-law of Wei Shangshu, my lady still married Zheng Heng went also.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Hongyun) I became the son-in-law of Wei Shangshu for you, and my lady still married Zheng Heng.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (Hongyun) became the son-in-law of Minister Wei for you, but my lady still married Zheng Heng.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 玫瑰说：你现在是魏总统的女婿，我的小情人将按照以前的安排嫁给郑恒。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 罗丝说：既然你现在是魏总的女婿，我的少奶奶就按照之前的安排嫁给郑恒。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 罗丝说: 既然你现在是魏总的女婿，我的小小姐将按原计划嫁给郑恒。

text.ori_cn: 那里有粪堆上长出连枝树，淤泥中双游比目鱼。
text.man_en: How could true lover's tree from dung heap grow? How could flatfish in dirty mud swim to and fro?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: There are lengthening trees growing out of dung heaps and double swimming flounder in the muck.

text.man_en2ggl_cn: 今天是吉日，牵着羊，挑着酒，来到新娘家。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 今天是个幸运的日子。牵着羊，带着酒，我正走向我新娘的家。

text.ori_cn: (杜云)你这厮怎么要诓骗良人的妻子，行不仁之事，我奏闻朝廷，诛此贼子。
text.man_en: General Du says:How dare you come to swindle an honest man out of his fiancée? I will report to the court the wrong you have done to the newly appointed prefect and have you punished．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Du Yun) Why do you want to swindle a good man's wife and do unkind things? I will report to the court and put this thief to death.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Du Yun) Why do you want to deceive your husband's wife and do unkind things? I will report to the court and punish this traitor.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Du Yun, how dare you deceive an honest man's wife and commit such an unrighteous act. I will report this to the court and have this scoundrel punished.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 杜将军说：你竟敢来骗老实人的未婚妻？我会向朝廷报告你对新上任的县令所做的错事，并将你治罪。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 杜将军说：你竟敢来骗一个老实人的未婚妻？我会将你所犯下的错误向新任命的太守报告给法庭，并惩罚你。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 杜将军说：你竟敢欺骗一个诚实的人的未婚妻？我要向法院报告你对新任太守所做的错事，并让你受到惩罚。

text.ori_cn: 你硬撞入桃源路，不言个谁是主，被东君把你个蜜蜂儿拦住。
text.man_en: You want to force your way into the fairylands，Regardless of the master who there stands．The bee's prevented by the eastern breeze．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: You have entered the Tao Yuan Road without saying who is the master, and you have been stopped by Dongjun, a bee in your bonnet.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: You ran into Taoyuan Road without saying who was the master, but Dongjun stopped you like a bee.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: You forcefully entered Taoyuan Road without mentioning who the master is, only to be blocked by the spring god like a bee.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你想强行进入仙境，不管站在那里的主人是谁。 东风阻挡了蜜蜂的脚步。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你想强行进入仙境，不管那儿的主人是谁。蜜蜂被东风挡住了。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你想强行闯入仙境，不顾那里的主人。蜜蜂被东风挡住了。

text.ori_cn: 不信呵你去绿杨阴里听杜宇，一声声道"不如归去"。
text.man_en: If you do not believe，listen' neath willow treesTo the cuckoo which will not roam Keep on singing "Better go home!"
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: If you don't believe me, you can listen to Du Yu in the shade of the green poplars, and say "It's better to go home".
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: If you don't believe it, go and listen to Du Yu in the green poplar shade. He kept saying, "It's better to go back."
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If you don't believe it, go to the shady green willows and listen to the cuckoo calling ceaselessly, 'Why not return home?'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果你不相信，就听 "柳树下 "的布谷鸟继续唱 "还是回家吧！"
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果你不相信，听听柳树下的杜鹃，不会漫游的继续唱“最好回家！”
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 如果你不相信，听一听垂柳下的杜鹃，它不会四处游荡，一直在唱“最好回家！”

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)将军息怒，赶出去便罢。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says：Calm your anger, General! Just turn him out!
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) General calm down, just drive out.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madam said) The general calms down and drives him out.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Madam said, 'General, please calm your anger, just have him thrown out.'
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说：将军息怒！把他赶出去吧！
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：将军息怒！把他赶出去吧！
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：将军息怒！把他赶出去就行了！

text.ori_cn: 我要这性命何用，不如触树身死。
text.man_en: I would dash my brains out against a tree rather than live in shame．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: What do I want with my life? I might as well touch the tree and die.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: What use is my life? It would be better to touch a tree and die.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: What's the use of my life? I'd rather die by hitting a tree.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 我宁愿把脑袋撞在树上，也不愿意羞愧地活着．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 我宁愿把脑袋撞到树上，也不愿生活在耻辱中。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 我宁愿把自己的脑袋撞在树上，也不愿意活在耻辱中。

text.ori_cn: 妻子空争不到手，风流自古恋风流。
text.man_en: (Singing)I've striven for a wife in vain；Only the gallant deserve the fair．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Wife empty fight can't hand, wind flow since ancient times love wind flow.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: I can't get my wife in vain, and I have been in love with romance since ancient times.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: A wife may strive in vain to keep her husband's affections; since ancient times, romance has always been fond of romance.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: (唱)我为妻子白费力气；只有英勇的人才配得上美丽的姑娘。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: （唱）我苦苦求妻，唯有侠士才配得上公平。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: （唱）我为妻子奋斗却徒劳无功；唯有勇士才配得上美人。

text.ori_cn: 何须苦用千般计，一旦无常万事休。
text.man_en: What use to scheme with might and main? When I die，all will be nowhere．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: There is no need for a thousand schemes, but once there is no change, all things are over.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Why bother to use all kinds of tricks, once everything is impermanent, everything will stop.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Why worry and toil with a thousand plans, when in the face of impermanence all things shall cease?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 用强权和主力又有何用？我死后，一切都将无影无踪．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 以威力和主要来策划有什么用呢？当我死后，一切都将化为乌有。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 拼尽全力谋划，有何用？我死之后一切将归于虚无。

text.ori_cn: (夫人云)俺虽不曾逼死他，可怜他无父母，我做主葬了者。
text.man_en: Madame Cui says:Though he takes his own life without being forced to，out of pity for his being fatherless and motherless，I will take charge of his burial．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: (Lady Yun) although I have not forced him to die, poor him no parents, I do the Lord buried the person.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: (Madam said) Although I didn't force him to death, it was pity that he had no parents, so I decided to bury him.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: (The lady says) Although I didn't force him to his death, pitying that he had no parents, I took it upon myself to arrange his burial.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 崔夫人说："虽然他是被迫自尽的，但出于对他无父无母的怜悯，我将负责安葬他。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 崔夫人说：虽然他非被迫而自杀，但出于怜悯他的无父无母，我会负责他的安葬。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 崔夫人说：虽然他没有被逼迫就自杀了，但由于他是个没有父亲和母亲的可怜孩子，我会负责他的葬礼。

text.ori_cn: 门迎驷马车，户列八椒图。
text.man_en: Fourhorsed chariots crowd the gate；Eight young dragons adorn the door．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The door welcomes a team of horses and carts, and the house is lined with eight peppercorns.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The door welcomes the horse-drawn carriage, and the house is lined with pictures of eight peppers.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: With gates welcoming carriages of four horses, and doors adorned with paintings of eight peppers.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 四匹战车挤满了大门；八条幼龙装饰着大门。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 四马车挤门，八幼龙饰门。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 四马战车挤满了大门；八条小龙装饰着门口。

text.ori_cn: 娶了个四德三从宰相女，平生愿足，托赖着众亲故。
text.man_en: You marry the daughter of a prime minister lateWho has all virtues women adore．You have achieved your endsThrough the aid of your friends．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Married to a four virtues and three from the prime minister's daughter, the life wish is enough, relying on all the relatives.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Married to a prime minister's daughter with four virtues and three obediences, she has been willing to fulfill her life and rely on all her relatives.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Having married the prime minister's daughter, embodying the Four Virtues and the Three Obediences, my lifelong wish is fulfilled, thanks to the support of many relatives and friends.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 你娶了一位宰相的女儿，这位宰相的女儿拥有女人所喜爱的一切美德． 你在朋友的帮助下达到了目的．
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 你很晚才娶了一位首相的女儿，她拥有女性所喜爱的所有美德。在朋友的帮助下，你已经达到了目的。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 你娶了一位总理的女儿，一个拥有所有女人赞美的美德的女子。在朋友们的帮助下，你达到了你的目的。

text.ori_cn: 若不是大恩人拔刀相助，怎能个好夫妻似水如鱼。
text.man_en: Had General Du not come to save their life．Could they become husband and wife?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: How can a good couple be like fish in water if it is not for the great benefactor who pulls out the sword to help them?
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: How could a good couple be as good as fish in water if it wasn't for the help of a great benefactor.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: If it weren't for the great benefactor's timely assistance, how could the good couple be as harmonious as water and fish?
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 如果不是杜将军来救了他们的性命，他们能成为夫妻吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 如果不是杜将军来救他们的命，他们能成为夫妻吗？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 要不是杜将军来救他们的性命，他们能成为夫妻吗？

text.ori_cn: 好意也当时题目，正酬了今生夫妇。
text.man_en: Could they fulfill their wishAnd be as happy as in water swim the fish?
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The good intention of the title at that time was to reward the couple in this life.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Good intentions are also the topic at that time, and they will be rewarded in this life.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Kind intentions were then the topic, truly reciprocated in this life as husband and wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 他们能实现自己的愿望，像鱼儿在水中游泳一样快乐吗？
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 他们能否实现自己的愿望，像水中游鱼一样快乐呢？
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 他们能实现愿望，像鱼儿在水中游泳一样快乐吗？

text.ori_cn: 自古相女配夫，新探花新探花路。
text.man_en: Since olden days a worthy maidShould be her worthy husband's aid．Who wins success in court aboveWill win success below in love．
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: Since ancient times, a woman has been paired with her husband, and a new scout is on the way to a new scout.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Since ancient times, women have been matched with husbands, and new flowers have been explored.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: From ancient times, matching daughters to husbands has been an exploration, like the path of a new flower-seeker.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 自古以来，一个称职的女仆应该是她称职丈夫的助手。 谁在宫廷中赢得成功，谁就会在爱情中赢得成功。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 自古贤女当贤夫之辅。上得宫廷，下得爱情。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 自古贤妻良母，应助夫君事业。上得朝廷宠荣，下得人间之爱。

text.ori_cn: 谢当今垂帘双圣主，敕赐为夫妇。
text.man_en: The emperor sacred and wise Sanctions your marriage ties，
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: I am grateful to the two Holy Lords of today's Curtain, who have given me the gift of being husband and wife.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Thanks to the two holy masters of today's curtain curtain, they are given as husband and wife.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Thank the current dual-saint sovereigns behind the curtain for bestowing us as husband and wife.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 皇上圣明，制裁你们的婚姻关系。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 神圣英明的皇帝批准你们的婚姻关系，
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 圣明的皇帝批准了你们的婚姻关系，

text.ori_cn: 小琴童传捷报，崔莺莺寄汗衫。
text.man_en: The LuteBearer reports Master Zhang's success Cui Yingying sends to Zhang Junrui a vest；
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The little piano boy spreads the news of success, and Cui Yingying sends her sweatshirt.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: The little harp boy passed on the good news, and Cui Yingying sent her an undershirt.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: The young musician delivered good news, while Cui Yingying sent a sweat-drenched shirt.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 琵琶客报捷 崔莺莺给张君瑞送马甲
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 琵琶人报告张师傅成功崔莺莺送张君瑞一件背心；
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 琵琶手报告张大师成功，崔莺莺送给张君瑞一件马甲；

text.ori_cn: 正名郑伯常干舍命，张君瑞庆团圆。
text.man_en: Zheng Heng lost his life in distress. The lover'union blessed.
text.ori_cn2dpl_en: The proper name Zheng Bo Chang Gan sacrificed his life, and Zhang Junrui celebrated the reunion.
text.ori_cn2ggl_en: Zheng Bo Changgan sacrificed his life to correct his name, and Zhang Jun was reunited with Ruiqing.
text.ori_cn2gpt_en: Zheng Bo often risked his life to uphold his name; Zhang Junrui celebrated the reunion with joy.
text.man_en2dpl_cn: 郑恒在危难中丧生。有情人终成眷属。
text.man_en2ggl_cn: 郑亨在危难中丢掉了性命。恋人的结合受到了祝福。
text.man_en2gpt_cn: 郑恒在困境中失去了生命。恋人的团聚受到祝福。
